zo: Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Hih hun tomno sungin Khristian hong suaksakzo dingin kingaihsun na hi hiam?” a cih ciangin

en: Everyone must submit himself to the governing authorities, for there is no authority except that which God has established. The authorities that exist have been established by God.
zo: A kuamah peuh in hong ukte’ thu na mang ciat un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thukimpih lohin kuamah in ukna thu nei lo hi; ukna thu nei i cih mite pen Pasian’ koih mite ahi hi.

en: So whether you eat or drink or whatever you do, do it all for the glory of God.
zo: Tua ahih manin keimah in ka hong gennop thu in: Na hihna khempeuh uh, nekna dawnna-ah ahi zongin Pasian’ minthan nadingin na hih un.

en: For we do not preach ourselves, but Jesus Christ as Lord, and ourselves as your servants for Jesus’ sake.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh kote’ hilh thu pen komau’ thu hi lo a, Khrih Jesuh pen Topa ahi hi, ci-in a hilh ka hi uh a, kote pen Khrih hangin nomau’ na a semte ka hi uh hi.

en: But may I never boast except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.
zo: Ahi zongin keimah in ahihleh, singlamteh tungah i Topa Jesuh a sihna thu bek ka kisialhpih ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh singlamteh tungah ama sihna hangin kei a dingin leitung thute misi bang a, kei zong, leitung thu-ah misi mah ka bang hi.

en: Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.
zo: Kha Siangtho kimakai sakin, khatlekhat kilemin pawlkhat na hihna uh na kipsak tawntung un.

en: Do everything without complaining or arguing,
zo: Na khempeuh phun lo, thu nial loin sem un.

en: And whatever you do, in word or deed, do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through Him.
zo: Na kampauna, na gamtatnate khempeuh uhah, Topa Jesuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Jesuh min paulamin na hih ding uh hi.

en: but test all things. Hold fast to what is good.
zo: Thu khempeuh entel pha unla, a hoihte kemin,

en: Finally, brothers, pray for us that the message of the Lord may spread rapidly and be honored, just as it was with you.
zo: Sanggamte aw, tu-in note lak mah bangin mun dangah zong Topa’ thu manlang takin kizel pakin lungdam takin a kisan’ theih nadingin kote a’ ding thu hong ngetsak un.

en: The goal of our instruction is love from a pure heart, a good conscience, and a sincere faith.
zo: Hih bangin thupiakna pen, upna taktak le kisuanna om hetloin lungsim siangtho taktak tawh ngaihsutna panin a hong piangkhia ki-itna a khantheih nading deihna ahi hi.

en: In fact, everyone who wants to live a godly life in Christ Jesus will be persecuted.
zo: Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin Pasian’ deihna bangin a nungta nuam khempeuh in bawlsiatna a thuak ding mah hi a,

en: To the pure, all things are pure, but to those who are corrupted and do not believe, nothing is pure. In fact, both their minds and consciences are corrupted.
zo: Lungsim siangthote a dingin na khempeuh a siang hi a, ahi zongin thu um lote a lungsim ngaihsutnate uh siakhin ahih manin amaute a dingin a siang bangmah om lo hi.

en: By faith we understand that the universe was formed at God’s command, so that what is seen was not made out of what was visible.
zo: Pasian’ kampauna tawh leitung le vantung piang a, tu-a i muhtheih nate a om nai lopi panin hong piang hi, ci-in i upna bek mah tawh a thei ihi hi.

en: Anyone, then, who knows the good he ought to do and doesn’t do it, sins.
zo: A hoih a manin gamtat ding thei napi-in a gamta lote a khial ahi hi.

en: So then, those who suffer according to God’s will should entrust their souls to their faithful Creator and continue to do good.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Pasian’ deihna bangin gimna a thuak mite gamtat hoihin, a kamciam a tangtungsak tawntung hong Piangsak pa muangin ama khut sungah a ki-ap ding uh ahi hi.

en: Grace and peace be yours in abundance through the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord.
zo: Pasian le i Topa Jesuh na theihna uh hangin hehpihna le nopsakna thupha note tungah tampi tak hong tung tahen.

en: For this is the love of God, that we keep His commandments. And His commandments are not burdensome.
zo: Pasian i it ciangin ama thupiakte a zui ihi hi. Eite a dingin ama thupiakte zuih ding a haksa lua hi lo hi.

en: This calls for wisdom. If anyone has insight, let him calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. That number is 666.
zo: Hih thu-ah pilna kisam hi. Hih nambat pen 666 hi a, mihing khat min tangin a ding hi a, mipil mitei peuhpeuhte in hih ganhing nambat a cihnopna thei ding uh hi.

en: Then Joseph said to his brothers, “I am about to die. But God will surely come to your aid and take you up out of this land to the land He promised on oath to Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob.”
zo: Josef in a sanggamte kiangah, “Kei a si ding ka hi ta hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in note hong kem ding a, hih leitang panin amah in Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob tunga a ciamsa leitangah note hong paikhiatpih to ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: The LORD replied, “My presence will go with you, and I will give you rest.”
zo: Topa in Moses kiangah, “Nang tawh kong pai ding a, lungsim tawlngakna hun nang kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: This day I call heaven and earth as witnesses against you that I have set before you life and death, blessings and curses. Now choose life, so that you and your children may live,
zo: Tuni-in note’ langkhatah teci a pang dingin vantung le leitung ka sam a, note’ mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna le sihna, thupha le samsiatna ka koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note le na suanlekhakte uh na hintheih nadingun nuntakna teel unla,

en: Better is one day in Your courts than a thousand elsewhere; I would rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God than dwell in the tents of the wicked.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh mun dangah ni tulkhat om sangin nangma huang sungah ni khat om hoihzaw hi. Gitlohna inn sungah ka ten sangin ka Pasian’ inn kongcing pa ka hi nuamzaw hi.

en: Every word of God is flawless; He is a shield to those who take refuge in Him.
zo: “Pasian in a thugen khempeuh a manna laktel a, amah a belte a dingin kidalna lum ahi hi.

en: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with My righteous right hand.
zo: nang hong ompih ka hih manin lau kei in. Na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in. Nang hong thakhauhsakin ka hong huh ding a, nang hong huhin ka hong honkhia ding hi.

en: The LORD appeared to us in the past, saying: “I have loved you with an everlasting love; I have drawn you with loving devotion.
zo: gamlapi pek panin Topa ka kilang hi. Keimah in nang kong it tawntung a, tua ahih manin nang’ tungah kong thuman tawntung hi.

en: So in everything, do to others what you would have them do to you, for this sums up the Law and the Prophets.
zo: Tua ahih manin note tungah hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah na bawl un. Moses Thukhamte le kamsangte’ thuhilhnate pen hih mah a deihna ahi hi.

en: He must increase; I must decrease.”
zo: Amah lian semsem ding a, kei ka hih leh ka neu semsem ding hi.

en: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love Him, who have been called according to His purpose.
zo: Ama deihna bang a sem dingin Pasian in a hong sap, amah a it eite a dingin na khempeuh a hoihlamin piangsak hi, ci-in i thei hi.

en: It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
zo: Itna neite lungkia cih om ngei lo hi; a upna, a lametna, lungduai takin a ngaknate uh a mawkna cih om ngei lo hi.

en: That is why, for Christ’s sake, I delight in weaknesses, in insults, in hardships, in persecutions, in difficulties. For when I am weak, then I am strong.
zo: Kei ka thaneem mahmah laitakin a thahat mahmah suak ka hih manin Khrih hangin ka thaneemna, simmawh ka thuakna, haksatna, bawlsiatna le lungkhamna ka thuaknate tawh ka lung a kim mahmah hi.

en: Finally, be strong in the Lord and in His mighty power.
zo: Tu a kipanin Topa tawh na kipawlna uh le ama vangliatna hangin na tha uh khauhsak ta un.

en: Command those who are rich in this present world not to be arrogant nor to put their hope in wealth, which is so uncertain, but to put their hope in God, who richly provides us with everything for our enjoyment.
zo: Tuhuna a hau mite kisatheikha loin, a kip lo hauhnate muan le suanin neikha loin, eite in nuamtakin i zat theih dingin citna tawh a hong pia Pasian a muan a suan nadingun na hilh in.

en: Therefore, since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses, let us throw off everything that hinders and the sin that so easily entangles, and let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us,
zo: Tua hi a, eite in i kiim i pamah hih zahin a tam teci nei ihih ciangin eite a hong dongtangsak thei nate khempeuh le eite a hong gakcip mawhna le khialhnate khempeuh paikhia-in, i mai-ah a om tai nading lampi a mong dongin lungsim kiptakin tai ni.

en: and he blessed Abram, saying, “Blessed be Abram by God Most High, Creator of heaven and earth.
zo: Amah in thupha pia a, “Vantung le leitung a bawl, Sang Pen Pasian in Abram thupha pia hen!

en: And when the Israelites saw the great power the LORD had displayed against the Egyptians, the people feared the LORD and put their trust in Him and in His servant Moses.
zo: Israel mite in Egypt mite’ tungah Topa’ bawl nasepna lianpi mu uh a, mite in Topa a zahtak uh hi. Amaute in Topa le ama nasem Moses a um uh hi.

en: so that your descendants will know that I had the Israelites live in booths when I brought them out of the land of Egypt. I am the LORD your God.”
zo: Tua pen keimah in Egypt gam panin amaute ka paikhiatpih lai-in Israel mite, buk sungah ka tensakna thu note’ suanlekhakte in a theih nading uh ahi hi; kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

en: Only do not rebel against the LORD, and do not be afraid of the people of the land, for they will be our bread. Their protection is gone, but the LORD is with us. Do not be afraid of them.”
zo: Topa phunsan kei hamtang un. Amaute pen zialmang pak ding ihih manin tua gam mite kihta kei un. Amau’ kiang panin amau’ kidalna kilakhia khin a, eite tawh Topa hong om hi; amaute kihta kei un,” a ci uh hi.

en: Impress them on your children. Talk about them when you sit at home and when you walk along the road, when you lie down and when you get up.
zo: Na tate uh tungah limtakin na hilh ding uh a, na innsung uhah na tut uh ciang, lampi-ah na pai uh ciang, na lup ciang uh le na thawh ciangun tua thute na gengen ding uh hi.

en: So be very careful to love the LORD your God.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Topa na Pasian uh na it ding uh hoihtakin ngaihsun un.

en: But Gideon told them, “I will not rule over you, nor will my son rule over you. The LORD will rule over you.”
zo: Gideon in amaute kiangah, “Note kong uk kei ding a, ka tapa in zong note hong uk lo ding hi. Topa in note hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Above all, fear the LORD and serve Him faithfully with all your heart; consider what great things He has done for you.
zo: Topa zahtak unla, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh citakin ama na sem un; bang hang hiam cih leh note a dingin amah in na lian hong bawlsaksate ngaihsun un.

en: my God is my rock, in whom I take refuge, my shield and the horn of my salvation. He is my stronghold, my refuge, and my savior—from violent men You save me.
zo: ka Pasian, ka kihutna, ka bukna pa, lum bangin kei a hong dal, ka munmuanhuai le ka belh, keimah hong honkhia pa hi a, ngong hihna panin hong hon hi.

en: Then you call on the name of your god, and I will call on the name of the LORD. The god who answers by fire—he is God.” And all the people said, “That is a good idea.”
zo: Tua ciangin note in na pasian tung uhah thu ngen unla, keimah in zong Topa’ tungah thu ka ngen ding hi. Tua ciangin thungetna mei tawh hong pia pasian pen Pasian taktak ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, “Hih na thugen hoih hi,” a ci uh hi.

en: All this took place because the Israelites had sinned against the LORD their God, who had brought them up out of Egypt from under the hand of Pharaoh king of Egypt. And they had worshiped other gods
zo: Hih thu a pianna pen Egypt kumpi Faro’ khutnuai Egypt gam panin amaute a paikhiatpih a Pasian uh Topa’ tungah Israel mite khial a, pasian dangte kihta-in

en: Ascribe to the LORD the glory due His name; bring an offering and come before Him. Worship the LORD in the splendor of His holiness.
zo: Amah in a ngah ding a kilawm minthanna Topa’ tungah pia un. Biakna puak unla, ama mai-ah pai un! Biakna puan silhin Topa bia un.

en: When Solomon finished praying, fire came down from heaven and consumed the burnt offering and the sacrifices, and the glory of the LORD filled the temple.
zo: Solomon a thunget a tawp ciangin, vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin meihal biakna le biakpiaknate kangtum a, tua ciangin Topa’ minthanna vang biakinn sung hong dim hi.

en: Despite their fear of the peoples around them, they built the altar on its foundation and sacrificed burnt offerings on it to the LORD—both the morning and evening sacrifices.
zo: Amaute in tua gam a midang tengte kihta uh ahih manin a mun lui mahah biakna tau phut pahin zing le nitak simin Topa’ tungah meihal biakna a pia uh hi.

en: And Ezra blessed the LORD, the great God, and all the people answered, “Amen, Amen!” as they lifted their hands. Then they bowed down and worshiped the LORD with their faces to the ground.
zo: Tua ciangin Ezra in a lian Pasian, Topa thupha pia a, mi khempeuh in a khut uh laamto-in, “Hi tahen. Hi ta hen,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Tua ciangin a lu uh kunin leilam maingatin Topa a bia uh hi.

en: But Mordecai found out about the plot and told Queen Esther, who in turn reported it to the king in Mordecai’s name.
zo: Hih thu Mordekai in phawkin Kumpinu Esther kiangah ko a, Esther in Mordekai’ hong thupuak, ci-in kumpipa kiangah a gensawn hi.

en: “Behold, blessed is the man whom God corrects; so do not despise the discipline of the Almighty.
zo: “Pasian in a taii mite mi nuamsa hizaw ahih manin, Vanglianpa’ taiina thupi san in.

en: Delight yourself in the LORD, and He will give you the desires of your heart.
zo: Topa sungah lungkim in; amah in na deihna hong pia ding hi.

en: I have hidden Your word in my heart that I might not sin against You.
zo: Nangma tungah kong khialh loh nadingin ka lungsim sungah nangma thu ka khol hi.

en: A man who is patient has great understanding, but a man who is quick-tempered displays folly.
zo: A lungduaite mipil hi a, lungtomna pen haina kilatna ahi hi.

en: Whatever your hand finds to do, do it with all your might, for in the grave, where you are going, there is neither working nor planning nor knowledge nor wisdom.
zo: Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Bang hang hiam cih leh na zuat ding sihna gam sungah nasepna le thungaihsutna, pilna le theihna cihte om lo hi.

en: Then I heard the voice of the Lord saying, “Whom shall I send? And who will go for Us?” And I said, “Here am I. Send me!”
zo: Tua ciangin, “Kua sawl ding a, eite a dingin kua va pai ding ahi hiam?” Topa’ cihna aw ka za hi. Tua ciangin ke’n, “Hih lai-ah kei om ing! Kei hong sawl in,” ka ci hi.

en: “Is not My word like fire,” declares the LORD, “and like a hammer that breaks a rock in pieces?
zo: Ka kammal pen mei tawh ahi a, suangtum a satnenzo sek tawh ahi zongin kibang hi lo ahi hiam, Topa in kong ci hi.

en: They are new every morning; great is Your faithfulness.
zo: zing nisuak bangin thaksuak tawntung a, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah tawh a kibang ahi hi.

en: You must speak My words to them, whether they listen or fail to listen, for they are rebellious.
zo: Amaute in hong mang a, hong mang kei zongin, nang tungah kong gen khempeuh amaute tungah va gen in. Amaute pen a lehdo thei mi ahihna uh phawk in.

en: With flattery he will corrupt those who have violated the covenant, but the people who know their God will firmly resist him.
zo: Kumpipa in tua biakna a nusia mite a thuzawh theih nadingin zuaugen siamna a zang ding hi. Ahih hangin Pasian’ nung a zui mite ahih uhleh thahatin a gualzo ding uh hi.

en: Sow for yourselves righteousness, reap the fruit of loving devotion, and break up your unplowed ground. For it is time to seek the LORD, until He comes and showers righteousness on you.
zo: Khai tuh bangin thuman tuhin, kei nong itna hangun a piang thuphate at un. Note’ Topa keima lamah nong kihei ding uh a hun hita ahih manin lo thak lei kalkham un. Tua hileh kei hong pai-in note tungah thupha kong pia ding hi, ka ci hi.

en: And everyone who calls on the name of the LORD will be saved; for on Mount Zion and in Jerusalem there will be deliverance, as the LORD has said, among the survivors whom the LORD calls.
zo: Ahi zongin Topa’ tungah huhna a ngen khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngah ding uh hi. Topa’ gensa bangmahin Zion Mual le Jerusalem khua sungah a suakta mi om ding uh hi. Topa in a teel mite, suakta ding uh hi.

en: Do two walk together unless they have agreed to do so?
zo: Mi nih, thukimna om masa lopi-in lampi-ah tonkhawm thei uh ahi hiam?

en: Deliverers will go up on Mount Zion to govern the mountains of Esau. And the kingdom will be the LORD’s.
zo: A gualzo Jerusalem khuamite in Esau’ gam simin uk ding uh a, tua gam pen Topa’ gam ahi ding hi.

en: But I, with a song of thanksgiving, will sacrifice to You. What I have vowed I will make good. Salvation comes from the LORD.”
zo: Ahih hangin ke’n ahihleh lungdamna aw tawh biakna kong pia ding a, ka ciamsa thu ka tangtungsak ding hi. Topa’ kiang pan hotkhiatna hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

en: Who is a God like You, who pardons iniquity and passes over the transgression of the remnant of His inheritance? He does not retain His anger forever, because He delights in loving devotion.
zo: Topa aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang om lo a, a omlai na mite’ mawhna nangmah in na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi.

en: Whatever they plot against the LORD, He will bring to an end. Affliction will not rise up a second time.
zo: Bang hangin Topa sawm ngam na hi hiam? Amah in nang hong susia ding hi. Amah a su peuhpeuh a dingkikzo om ngei lo hi.

en: But the LORD is in His holy temple; let all the earth be silent before Him.
zo: Topa , a biakinn siangtho sungah om hi; leitung mi khempeuh ama mai-ah dai dide-in om ta uh hen.

en: “For then I will restore to the peoples a pure language, that they all may call upon the name of the LORD, to serve Him shoulder to shoulder.
zo: “Tua ciangin minamte’ lungsim ka hei ding a, amaute in keima tung bekah thu hong ngenin, lungsim kikhatin ka na hong sem ding uh hi.

en: I will shake all the nations, and the desired of all nations will come, and I will fill this house with glory,’ says the LORD of Hosts.
zo: Minam dang khempeuh lokgawp ding ka hih manin a neihsa uh sum le paite, hih munah hong kipuak ding a, biakinn sungah a dimin van hong om ding hi.

en: And the LORD will be king over all the earth. On that day the LORD will be one, and His name the only name.
zo: Tua ciangin Topa pen leitung khempeuh’ kumpi suak ding a, mi khempeuh in amah bek thei-in bia ding uh hi.

en: “For I, the LORD, do not change; therefore you, O sons of Jacob, are not consumed.
zo: “Kei, Topa ka hi a, lungsim a kheel lo mi ka hi hi. No Jakob suanlekhakte aw, a siacimit na hi nai kei uh hi.

en: “Watch and pray so that you will not enter into temptation. The spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak.”
zo: Ze-etna-ah na puk khak loh nadingun thu ngen un. Lungsim in ze-etna nang nuam napi-in pumpi in nangzo lo hi,” a ci hi.

en: Very early in the morning, while it was still dark, Jesus got up, left the house, and went off to a solitary place, where He prayed.
zo: A zing ciang phalvak ma-in Jesuh tho-in gamdaihna mun khatah na pai-in thu a ngen hi.

en: They asked each other, “Were not our hearts burning within us while He talked with us on the road and opened the Scriptures to us?”
zo: Amau tegel in, “Lampi-ah i paikawmin Lai Siangtho khiatna hong gen laitakin i lungsim hong lawpsak mahmah hi mah lo ahi hiam?” a kici uh hi.

en: Now this is eternal life, that they may know You, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom You have sent.
zo: Nang bek a man Pasian na hihna thu le nangmah in na hong sawl Jesuh Khrih hong theihna pen amaute a dingin nuntak tawntung ngah nading lampi ahi hi.

en: All the believers were one in heart and mind. No one claimed that any of his possessions was his own, but they shared everything they had.
zo: Thu um mi khempeuh a lungsim uh le a ngaihsutna uh kikhat uh a, kuamah in ama neihsa kei-a’ tuam ci loin, a neih khempeuh uh a neikhawm ciat uh hi.

en: Consequently, faith comes from hearing the message, and the message is heard through the word of Christ.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin zakna panin upna hong piangthei a, Khrih thu up nading pen hilhna panin hong piangthei pan hi.

en: Now you are the body of Christ, and each one of you is a part of it.
zo: Tu-in note khempeuh pen Khrih pumpi na hi uh a, na vekpi-un a pumpi na khat ciat na hi uh hi.

en: Godly sorrow brings repentance that leads to salvation without regret, but worldly sorrow brings death.
zo: Tua na dahna uh hotkhiatna ngahtheih nadingin na lungsim uh na kheel nadingun Pasian in hong zang ahih manin dah nading bangmah om lo hi. Ahi zongin hih leitung dahna lelte in ahihleh sihna piangsak hi.

en: know that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by faith in Jesus Christ. So we, too, have put our faith in Christ Jesus that we may be justified by faith in Christ and not by the works of the law, because by the works of the law no one will be justified.
zo: Ahi zongin Jesuh Khrih upna hang bek tawh Pasian tawh kipawl theihna kingahin, Thukham zuihna hang tawh kingah ngei lo hi, ci-in ka thei uh hi. Kote mahmah in zong, Khrih hangin Pasian tawh ka kipawl theih nadingun Jesuh Khrih ka um uh a, Thukham deihna ka zuihna hang uh tawh hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham zuihna hang tawh kuamah in Pasian tawh kipawl theihna ngah zo lo hi.

en: As a prisoner for the Lord, then, I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ na ka sepna hangin thong a kia keimah in note’ nuntakzia dingin a hong deihna tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntak nadingun ka hong hanthawn hi.

en: Only let your manner of life be worthy of the gospel of Christ, so that whether I come and see you or am absent, I may hear of you that you are standing firm in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel.
zo: Note tawh a omkhawm dingin ka hong paithei a, ka hong paithei kei zongin note in lungdamna thu tawh kipawl upna thu-ah ngimna kikhatin kiptakin na om nading uh le deihna kikhatin na dokhawmna thu uh ka zak theih nadingin Khrih hanga lungdamna thu tawh a kilawm a kituakin na nuntak ding uh a thupi pen ahi hi.

en: so that you may live a life worthy of the Lord and please Him in every way: bearing fruit in every good work, growing in the knowledge of God,
zo: Tua bang hileh Topa’ deihna bangin nungta-in, amah a lungkimsak ding thute bek na sem tawntung ding uh a, na gamtatnate uh a hoih bekbek hong hi-in, Pasian’ thu na theihna uh hong khang semsem ding hi.

en: And we urge you, brothers, warn those who are idle, encourage the timid, help the weak, be patient with everyone.
zo: Sanggamte aw, a thadah mite hilh unla, a meidawite hanthawnin, a zawngkhal mite huh unla, hih bang mite ngongbawl kei un.

en: So then, brothers, stand firm and hold to the traditions that you were taught, whether by word of mouth or by our letter.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, kam tawh ahi a, lai tawh ahi zongin ka hong hilh uh thumante limtakin zui unla, kiptakin om un.

en: if I am delayed, you will know how people ought to conduct themselves in God’s household, which is the church of the living God, the pillar and foundation of the truth.
zo: Ahi zongin ka hong zekai khak zenzen leh thuman thutak khuampi le bulpi, a nungta Pasian’ pawlpi ahi Pasian’ innkuan sungah bangci gamtat ding cih na theih nadingin hih ka hong laikhak in lam hong lak ding hi.

en: if we are faithless, He remains faithful, for He cannot deny Himself.
zo: Amah le amah kikhem thei lo ahih manin eite i citak kei zongin amah citak veve ding hi,” ci-in a kigenna thu man mahmah hi.

en: He gave Himself for us to redeem us from all wickedness and to purify for Himself a people of His very own, zealous for good works.
zo: I mawhna khempeuh panin hong honkhia ding le ama neihtuam i suahtheih nadingin Jesuh amahmah hong kipumpiak a, eite pen gamtat hoih gamtat ding a lawp mahmah ihi hi.

en: Confident of your obedience, I write to you, knowing that you will do even more than I ask.
zo: Ka hong genna sangin a hoihzaw a phazaw-in na gamta ding, ci-in muan mahmahna tawh hih lai a hong gelh ka hi hi.

en: For here we do not have an enduring city, but we are looking for the city that is to come.
zo: Eite a dingin hih leitungah a kip khuapi om lo ahih manin a hong piang lai ding khuapi a zong ihi hi.

en: For whoever keeps the whole law and yet stumbles at just one point is guilty of breaking all of it.
zo: Mi khatpeuh in thukham dang khempeuh a zuih hangin khat a khialh nakleh a vekpi-in a khial mah ahi hi.

en: For to this you were called, because Christ also suffered for you, leaving you an example, that you should follow in His steps.
zo: Khrih mahmah in zong note a dingin thuakin, ama khekhap na zuihtheih nadingun etteh ding lim hong nusiat ahih manin hih bangin a thuak ding mahin Pasian in note a hong sam ahi hi.

en: But the day of the Lord will come like a thief. The heavens will disappear with a roar, the elements will be destroyed by fire, and the earth and its works will be laid bare.
zo: Ahi zongin theihkholh lohpi-in guta bangin Topa hong pai ding Ni hong tung ding hi. Tua Ni ciangin nakpitakin a ging in vantungte maimang sakin, vantung nate mei in kangtumin maimang ding a, leitung le a tunga om na khempeuh a mangthang ding hi.

en: There is no fear in love, but perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment. The one who fears is not made perfect in love.
zo: Itna nei lehang launa om lo a, itna cingtaak nei peuh lehang launa beimangta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh launa i cih pen gimthuak ding kihtakna hi a, gimthuak ding a laute pen itna cingtaak a nei lote ahi hi.

en: And I saw the dead, great and small, standing before the throne, and books were opened. Another book was opened, which is the book of life. The dead were judged according to their deeds, as recorded in the books.
zo: A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu a dang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi.

en: down the middle of the great street of the city. On each side of the river stood the tree of life, bearing twelve crops of fruit, yielding its fruit every month. And the leaves of the tree are for the healing of the nations.
zo: khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna dam nading zatui-in kizang hi.

en: and said, “Blessed be the LORD, the God of my master Abraham, who has not withheld His kindness and faithfulness from my master. As for me, the LORD has led me on the journey to the house of my master’s relatives.”
zo: “Ka topa’ tungah a itna kip le a thumanna a pelh lo, ka topa Abraham’ Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah tahen. Kei ka hih leh, ka topa’ behte’ inn zuatna lampi-ah Topa in hong paipih hi,” a ci hi.

en: “Behold, I am sending an angel ahead of you to guard you along the way and to bring you to the place I have prepared.
zo: “En un, keimah in ka bawlsa munah note hong paipih ding le lamkalah note hong cing dingin note’ mai-ah vantungmi khat ka sawl hi.

en: “The land must not be sold permanently, because the land is Mine, and you are but aliens and tenants with Me.
zo: “Leitang pen keima-a’ ahih manin neihsuak dingin leitang kizuak lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note pen kei tawh a omkhawm khualmi leh peemtate na hi uh hi.

en: “The daughters of Zelophehad speak what is right. You must surely give them property as an inheritance among their father’s brothers and transfer their father’s inheritance to them.
zo: “Zelofehad’ tanute’ thugen man hi. Amau’ pa’ sanggamte lakah neihsa gamh amaute tungah na pia ding a, amau’ pa’ gamh amaute’ tungah na tungsak ding hi.

en: For there will never cease to be poor in the land. Therefore I command you, ‘You shall open wide your hand to your brother, to the needy and to the poor in your land.’
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh leitang tungah mizawng bei ngei lo ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Gam sungah a om na sanggampa, na a kisam mite le mizawngte tungah na cingh mahmah ding uh hi,’ ci-in thu kong pia hi.

en: Not one of all the LORD’s good promises to the house of Israel failed; every one was fulfilled.
zo: Topa in Israel mite tungah a ciamsa thuhoih khempeuh khat zong a mawkna om lo a, a vekpi-in tangtung kim hi.

en: After that whole generation had been gathered to their fathers, another generation grew up who did not know the LORD or the work that He had done for Israel.
zo: Tua ciangin tua khangmite khempeuh zong si khin uh a, amaute’ khit ciangin Topa hitaleh, Israel-te a dingin a septe hitaleh a thei lo khangthak hong piang uh hi.

en: So Samuel took the horn of oil and anointed him in the presence of his brothers, and from that day on the Spirit of the LORD came powerfully upon David. Then Samuel set out and went to Ramah.
zo: Tua ciangin Samuel in a sathau biing sunga sathau la-in a sanggamte laizangah amah sathau a nilh hi. Tua ni a kipanin Topa’ kha in khauhtakin David hong uk hi. Tua ciangin Samuel dingin Ramah-ah a ciah hi.

en: How the mighty have fallen! The weapons of war have perished!”
zo: “A vanglianpa bangci-in tuk, galhiamte bangci-in sia!” a ci hi.

en: “Have you seen how Ahab has humbled himself before Me? Because he has humbled himself before Me, I will not bring this disaster in his day, but I will bring it on his house in the days of his son.”
zo: “Keima mai-ah bangzahin Ahab a kiniamkhiatna na mu hiam? Keima mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat ahih manin ama hun sungin siatna ka tungsak kei ding hi. Ahih hangin a tapa’ hun sungin ama innkuan tungah siatna ka tungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: In the thirty-seventh year of the exile of Jehoiachin king of Judah, in the year Evil-merodach became king of Babylon, he released Jehoiachin king of Judah from prison on the twenty-seventh day of the twelfth month.
zo: Judah kumpi Jehoiakhin thong sungah a omzawh kum sawmthum le kum sagihna kum, kha sawm le nihna, tua kha ni sawmnih le sagih ni, Babylon kumpipa Evilmerodak in uk ding a kipat kumin, hehpihna tawh thong panin Judah kumpi Jehoiakhin a khah hi.

en: For we are aliens and pilgrims before You, as were all our fathers. Our days on earth are like a shadow, without hope.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pu ka pate khempeuh uh mah bangin kote pen nangma mai-ah khualmite le pemtate ka hi uh hi. Ka hunte uh leitungah niliim bang hi a, sih ding ka pelh thei kei uh hi.

en: O our God, will You not judge them? For we have no power to face this vast army that is attacking us. We do not know what to do, but our eyes are upon You.”
zo: Kote’ Pasian aw, amaute tungah thu khen lo ding na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh kote a sim dingin a hong pai hih mihon tampite a do dingin thahatna ka nei kei uh hi. Ka cih nading uh ka thei kei uh a, nangmah bek kong mitsuan uh hi,” a ci hi.

en: And after all that has come upon us for our evil deeds and our great guilt—though You, our God, have punished us less than our iniquities deserve and have given us a remnant like this—
zo: Tu-in kote’ gamtatsiate le a lian ka mawhnate uh hangin hih bang gimna lian ka thuak uh hi; ahi zongin nangmah in kote’ tuah dinga kilawmzah gimna hong tuaksak loin, tu-a banga a nungta lai-in nong omsak zaw hi.

en: O Lord, let Your ear be attentive to the prayer of this Your servant and to the prayer of Your servants who delight in revering Your name. Give Your servant success today and grant him favor in the presence of this man.” At the time, I was cupbearer to the king.
zo: Keima hong thungetna le nangma min a zahtak nuam na nasemte’ thungetna na bil hong ngat in. Tu-in kei tungah maavanna hong pia inla, kei tungah hih kumpipa hong migitna ding lungsim hong guan in,” ka ci hi. Tua hun laitakin kei pen kumpipa’ an a piapa ka hi hi.

en: And He said to man, ‘Behold, the fear of the Lord, that is wisdom, and to turn away from evil is understanding.’”
zo: “Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah thu genin, ‘Topa zahtakna, pilna hi a, siatna pelhna pen thutheihna hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

en: The LORD is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear? The LORD is the stronghold of my life—of whom shall I be afraid?
zo: Topa, ka khuavak le hong honpa ahi hi. Kua kihta ding ka hi hiam? Topa, kei a dingin munmuanhuai ahi hi. Bang laupih ding ka hi hiam?

en: Before the mountains were born or You brought forth the earth and the world, from everlasting to everlasting You are God.
zo: Mual liante a kipiansak ma, leitang le leitung na bawl ma pek, a tawntung a kipan a tawntung dongin Pasian na hi hi.

en: The fear of the LORD is the instruction of wisdom, and humility comes before honor.
zo: Topa zahtakna pen pilna mah hi pah a, kiniamkhiatna in pahtawina hong ngahsak hi.

en: and the dust returns to the ground it came from, and the spirit returns to God who gave it.
zo: I pumpi, lei suakkik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ kiangah i kha ciahkik ta ding hi.

en: He sits enthroned above the circle of the earth, and its people are like grasshoppers. He stretches out the heavens like a canopy, and spreads them out like a tent to live in.
zo: Leitung a a teng mite kauphe tawh kibang lel hi. Leitung kimkot tungah a tupa, vantungte puan bangin zalin, a sungah a om theih nadingin puanbuk bangin a zal pa,

en: “O house of Israel, can I not do with you as this potter does?” declares the LORD. “Like clay in the hand of the potter, so are you in My hand, O house of Israel.
zo: “Israel mite aw, Topa in kong cihin-ah, hih beelseek pa’ hih bangin note zong hong hih thei lo ding ka hi hiam? En un, beelseek pa’ khutsunga buan tawh kibangin, Israel mite aw, kei’ khut sungah note na om uh hi.

en: And I will put My Spirit in you and move you to follow My decrees and be careful to keep My laws.
zo: Note sungah keima kha kong guang ding a, note tungah kong piak ka thukhamte le ka thupiakte limtakin kong zuisak ding hi.

en: But there is a God in heaven who reveals mysteries. He has shown King Nebuchadnezzar what will happen in the days to come.
zo: Ahih hangin thusim a lak thei vantungah Pasian khat a om hi. Amah in mai lamah bang thu hong piang ding cih nangmah Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa tungah a hong hilhzo hi.

en: Let us know; let us press on to know the LORD. As surely as the sun rises, He will appear; He will come to us like the rain, like the spring showers that water the earth.”
zo: Topa i theihzawh nadingin hanciam ni. Zingsang sialin pel loin khua a vak mah bangin pel loin eite kiangah amah hong pai ding a, lei a kawtsak khuapi guah pel loin hong zuk bangin eite kiangah amah hong pai hamtang ding hi,” a ci ding uh hi.

en: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you,
zo: Ahi zongin ke’n note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na galte uh na it unla, no hong bawlsiate a dingin thu na ngetsak un.

en: “Salt is good, but if it loses its saltiness, how can you make it salty again? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace with each other.”
zo: Ci hoih hi; ahi zongin a alna mang leh bangci alsakkik thei ding na hi uh hiam? Note in ci al bangin hoihna nei unla, khatlekhat kilem un,” a ci hi.

en: Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured back to you.”
zo: Midangte tungah pia un. Tua hileh Pasian in note tungah zong hong pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh midangte na piakna uh tawh kizui-in a henhen, a tahtah, a dimletin Pasian in note tungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Jesus declared, “I am the bread of life. He who comes to Me will never go hungry, and he who believes in Me will never be thirsty.”
zo: Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei pen nuntakna an ka hi hi. Ka kiangah hong paite gilkial ngei nawn lo ding a, kei hong umte dangtak ngei nawn lo ding hi.

en: “Look,” he said, “I see heaven open and the Son of Man standing at the right hand of God.”
zo: “En un! Vantung kihong a, Pasian’ taklamah Mihing Tapa a ding ka mu hi,” a ci hi.

en: For sin shall not be your master, because you are not under law, but under grace.
zo: Note pen thukham’ sawlna hangin nasem hi loin Pasian’ hong lah thuhoihte’ hangin nasem na hih uh manin mawhna’ sawlna mangin na gamta nawn kei un.

en: Therefore, as it is written: “Let him who boasts boast in the Lord.”
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “A kisathei mite, Topa’ hang bekin kisathei ta hen,” ci-in na kigelh hi.

en: So we fix our eyes not on what is seen, but on what is unseen. For what is seen is temporary, but what is unseen is eternal.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh a kimuthei nate a mitsuan ka hi kei uh a, a kimu thei lo nate a mitsuan ka hi uh hi. A kimuthei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu thei lo nate a tawntungin a kip ahi hi.

en: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision has any value. The only thing that counts is faith expressing itself through love.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin vun-atna le vun-at lohna a thupi tuan om lo a, Khrih i upna hangin midangte i itna a thupi hi bek hi.

en: But now in Christ Jesus you who once were far away have been brought near through the blood of Christ.
zo: Ahi zongin a gamlapi-ah a om ngei hinapi-in tu-in Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawlna hangun ama sihna in Pasian kiang hong tunpih hi.

en: Each of you should look not only to your own interests, but also to the interests of others.
zo: Note’ phattuam nading bek ngaihsun kei unla, midangte’ phattuam nading ngaihsutsak zaw un.

en: Children, obey your parents in everything, for this pleases the Lord.
zo: Tate aw, na nu na pate uh thu man’ tawntung ding pen na Khristian nasep uh ahi hi. Tua bang thumanna in Pasian lungdamsak hi.

en: Do not quench the Spirit.
zo: Kha Siangtho nasepna dongtangsak kei unla,

en: Therefore, we ourselves boast about you in the churches of God for your perseverance and faith in all the persecutions and trials you are enduring.
zo: Bawlsiatna le gimna na thuakna khempeuh uhah na upna uh khahsuah loin thuakzo paisuak na hih manun midangte kiangah Pasian’ pawlpi ka na kisialhpih uh hi.

en: For physical training is of some value, but godliness has value for all things, holding promise for both the present life and the life to come.
zo: Pumpi kisekin kisinna manpha hi. Ahi zongin kha thu-ah kisekin kisinna pen tuhun laitak le a hong tung ding hunah nuntakna hong piathei ahih manin manphazaw lai hi,

en: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
zo: Ahi zongin nang na hih leh thu khempeuhah na lungsim ki-ukin haksatnate na thuak inla, Pasian’ thugen nasep semin, na nasepna-ah maa na tun in.

en: Our people must learn to devote themselves to doing what is good, in order to provide for urgent needs and not be unproductive.
zo: I mite ommawk loin, thu kisam a phamawhte huh thei-in, na hoih na phate a septheih nadingun na hilh in.

en: And do not forget to do good and to share with others, for with such sacrifices God is pleased.
zo: Khatlekhat tungah thuhoih kibawlin na kihuh ding uh mangngilh kei un. Hih bang gamtatnate pen Pasian a lungkimsak thei biakna ahi hi.

en: If anyone considers himself religious and yet does not bridle his tongue, he deceives his heart and his religion is worthless.
zo: Mi khatpeuh in Khristian ka hi hi, ci napi-in kampau a kidopzawh kei leh amahmah a kikhemtawm hi lel a, ama biakna neih a mawkna ahi hi.

en: For Christ also suffered once for sins, the righteous for the unrighteous, to bring you to God. He was put to death in the body but made alive in the Spirit,
zo: Khrih mahmah zong note a dingin si a, Pasian’ kiangah hong tunpih theih nadingin mihoih khat pen mihoih lote’ mawhna hangin khatvei a si hi. Mite in ama leitung pumpi that a, ahi zongin Pasian in kha nuntakna a pia hi.

en: We also have the prophetic message as something completely reliable, and you will do well to pay attention to it, as to a light shining in a dark place, until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts.
zo: Tua ahih manin kamsangte’ gen thute a man taktak ahihna thu ka teltheih uh hi. Note’ lungsimah Zingsol hong suakin khua a hong vak matengin khuamial lak a mei taang bangin hih thute ngaihsun le-uhcin hoih mahmah ding hi.

en: The one who does what is sinful is of the devil, because the devil has been sinning from the beginning. The reason the Son of God appeared was to destroy the devil’s work.
zo: A kipat cil a kipanin Dawimangpa in mawhna bawl tawntung ahih manin mawhna a bawl mi khempeuhte zong Dawimangpa’ mi ahi hi. Hih Dawimangpa’ nasepna a beisak dingin Pasian’ Tapa a hong pai hi.

en: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches. To him who overcomes, I will give the right to eat from the tree of life, which is in the paradise of God.
zo: Tua ahih manin zak nading bil a neite in Kha Siangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite tungah, Pasian’ Huan sunga om nuntakna singgahte a nektheih nadingun thu ka pia ding hi.

en: “Behold, I come like a thief! Blessed is he who stays awake and keeps his clothes with him, so that he may not go naked and be shamefully exposed.”
zo: (“Na ngai un! Guta bangin kei ka hong pai hi. Mihon lakah guaktangin pai-in maizumna a ngahkhak loh nadingun a puante uh kemin, pilvang khuaphawkin a om mite a hampha ahi uh hi.”)

en: The city does not need the sun or the moon to shine on it, for the glory of God gives it light, and the Lamb is its lamp.
zo: Pasian’ minthanna vang pen khuavak hi a, Tuuno zong meivak hi khin ahih manin tua khuapi in nitaang le khataang cihte kisam lo hi.

en: But the LORD God called to the man, “Where are you?”
zo: Ahih hangin Topa Pasian in mipa samin ama kiangah, “Koi lai-ah om na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

en: he stood at the entrance to the camp and said, “Whoever is for the LORD, come to me.” And all the Levites rallied to him.
zo: giahphual kongpi sungah Moses ding a, “ Topa’ lamah kua teng om na hi uh hiam? Kei’ kiangah hong pai un,” a ci hi. Levi mite khempeuh ama kiangah hong kikaikhawm uh hi.

en: “See now that I myself am He! There is no god besides Me. I put to death and I bring to life, I have wounded and I will heal, and no one can deliver from My hand.
zo: ‘Tu-in thei un, keimah a kici pa pen kei ka hi a, kei simloh pasian dang kuamah om lo hi. Ka that a, ka nungtasak hi. Ka liamsak a, ka damsak hi. Ka khutsung pan a honkhiazo kuamah om lo hi.

en: Some trust in chariots and some in horses, but we trust in the name of the LORD our God.
zo: Mi pawlkhat in leengte kihihsakpih a, mi pawlkhat in sakolte kihihsakpih hi. Ahih hangin eite in Topa i Pasian’ min bek i kihihsakpih hi.

en: Worship the LORD with gladness; come before Him with joyful songs.
zo: Lungdamna tawh Topa’ na sem un. Ama omna-ah la sa kawmin hong pai un.

en: Where there is no vision, the people cast off restraint; but blessed is he who keeps the law.
zo: Pasian’ lamlahna a kizuih lohna gamah gam sung mite phengtat gawp uh hi. Pasian’ thukham a zui mite ahihleh a lungdam uh hi.

en: But your iniquities have separated you from your God; your sins have hidden His face from you, so that He will not hear.
zo: Ahih hangin note’ mawhnate in note le na Pasian uh kikhenna hong piangsak a, amah in note’ aw hong zak theih loh nadingin na khialhnate un ama maitang liah hi.

en: but let him who boasts boast in this, that he understands and knows Me, that I am the LORD, who exercises loving devotion, justice, and righteousness on the earth—for I delight in these things,” declares the LORD.
zo: A kisatheite in, keimah, leitungah migitna, thuman le thutang a zang ka hihna le tuate sungah nuam a sapa ka hihna thu hong theihna uhah kisathei uh hen. Topa in hih thu kong gen khin hi,” a ci hi.

en: just as the Son of Man did not come to be served, but to serve, and to give His life as a ransom for many.”
zo: Mihing Tapa zong nasem nei dingin hong pai hi loin mi dangte a’ ding na semin, mi tampi tat nading a si dingin a hong pai ahih mah bangin note zong a tuaci ding na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

en: Peace I leave with you; My peace I give to you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
zo: Note tungah keima neih bang lungnopna ka hong pia ding hi. Tua ka hong piak ding lungnopna pen leitung mite in a piaktheih a kip lo lungnopnate pawl hi lo hi. Tua ahih manin lau kei unla, zong lungkham kei un.

en: What then shall we say in response to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?
zo: Hih teng bang ahih khit ciangin bang gen ding om nawn ahi hiam? Pasian in eite hong koppih peuh leh kua in eite hong zozo ding ahi hiam?

en: But thanks be to God, who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ!
zo: Ahi zongin i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin gualzawhna a hong pia Pasian tungah i lung a dam hi.

en: made us alive with Christ even when we were dead in our trespasses. It is by grace you have been saved!
zo: i mawhna hangin kha thu tawh kisai-in misi ihih laitakin Khrih tawh eite hong nungtasak hi. Pasian’ hehpihna hangin hotkhiatna a ngah thei ihi hi.

en: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
zo: Topa sungah lungdam tawntung un, ka hong cihsa bangin tu-in zong lungdam un, ka hong ci kik hi.

en: But if we have food and clothing, we will be content with these.
zo: Tua ahih manin annek tuidawn, nikten puansilh i neih nakleh a phazo ahi hi.

en: All these people died in faith, without having received the things they were promised. However, they saw them and welcomed them from a distance. And they admitted that they were aliens and strangers on earth.
zo: Hih mite khempeuh in amaute tungah piak dingin Pasian’ ciam thute ngah nai lo uh a, gamlapi-ah a omlai galmuhin hopih thei bek uh a, hih leitungah khualmi peemta hi lel hang, ci-in kitheihna tawh omin a upna mah uh tawh a si uh hi.

en: But the one who looks intently into the perfect law that gives freedom, and continues to do this—not forgetting what he has heard, but doing it—he will be blessed in what he does.
zo: Ahi zongin mite a suaktasak thei thukham cingtaak hoihtakin a et khit ciangin a thu ngai-in a mangngilh pah hi loin, hoihtakin ngaihsun tawntungin a zuite pen a sepna khempeuh uhah Pasian in thupha a pia ding hi.

en: Beloved, I urge you as aliens and strangers in the world to abstain from sinful desires, which wage war against your soul.
zo: Ka itte aw, hih leitungah gamdang mi, a peempak bangin kingaihsun unla, na kha nuntakna uh tawh a kilehngat pumpi’ deihnate na kikham un.

en: Then one of the elders said to me, “Do not weep! Behold, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has triumphed. He is able to open the scroll and its seven seals.”
zo: Tua laitakin upate khat in kei kiangah, “Kap kei in. Judah minam sung panin Humpinelkai, David suan sung panin a lianpa gualzo khinta a, tua laizial ciaptehna sagihte lakhia-in a laizial phelthei ding hi,” a hong ci hi.

en: because Abraham obeyed My voice and kept My charge, My commandments, My statutes, and My laws.”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham in ka thu mangin, ka sawlna, ka thupiakna, ka ngeina kip le ka thu zui hi,” a ci hi.

en: But you are to select from all the people able men, God-fearing, trustworthy, and hating dishonest gain. Appoint them over the people as leaders of thousands, hundreds, fifties, and tens.
zo: Tua tham loin, mi khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak mi, a muanhuai mi le sumgolh a mudah mi, mi siamte na teelkhia ding hi. Tua bang mite pen a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a uk dingin na koih ding hi.

en: “Speak to the entire congregation of Israel and tell them: ‘Be holy, because I, the LORD your God, am holy.
zo: “Israel mihonte khempeuh kiangah hih bangin gen in: Note na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa note’ Pasian keimah ka siangtho hi.

en: But the LORD said to Moses, “Is the LORD’s arm too short? Now you will see whether or not My word comes true for you.”
zo: Topa in Moses kiangah, “ Topa’ hih theih ding zah kiciangtan sa na hi hiam? Ka thugen a manin hong tun leh hong tun loh tu-in na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: For the LORD your God is the One who goes with you to fight for you against your enemies to give you victory.”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh note tungah gualzawhna a hong pia ding, na langte uh hong dosak dingin note tawh hong kuan khawm pa pen Topa na Pasian uh ahi hi,’ ci ding hi.

en: But be very careful to keep the commandment and the law that Moses the servant of the LORD gave you: to love the LORD your God, to walk in all His ways, to keep His commandments, to hold fast to Him, and to serve Him with all your heart and with all your soul.”
zo: Topa’ nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna le thukham ahi, Topa na Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding, le na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na na sep ding uh limtakin ngaihsun un,” a ci hi.

en: So they put away the foreign gods from among them and served the LORD. And He could no longer bear Israel’s misery.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin amaute in amau’ lak panin gamdang pasian-te koih khia-in Topa a bia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te’ gentheihna ah amah a dah hi.

en: “Therefore the LORD, the God of Israel, declares: ‘I did indeed say that your house and the house of your father would walk before Me forever.’ But now the LORD declares: ‘Far be it from Me! For I will honor those who honor Me, but those who despise Me will be disdained.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Israel-te’ Pasian, Topa in thu hong genin: ‘Nangma innkuan le na behte keima mai-ah sungtumin pusuak tawntung ding hi, ci-in thu ka ciamsa hi,’ ci hi. Ahih hangin tu-in Topa in thu genin: ‘Tua bang hi nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei hong pahtawite ka pahtawi ding a, kei hong simmawhte ka simmawh ding hi.

en: Is not my house right with God? For He has made with me an everlasting covenant, arranged and secured in every part. Surely He will not make all my salvation and every desire grow?
zo: Hi hi, ka innkuan zong Pasian tawh tua bangmah hi lo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tawntung thuciamna kei tawh hong bawl a, na khempeuh a hoih a kipin hih hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah hong huhin, ka deihna khempeuh tangtungsak ding hi lo ahi hiam?

en: “Blessed be the LORD, who has given rest to His people Israel according to all that He promised. Not one word has failed of all the good promises He made through His servant Moses.
zo: “Ama hong ciamsa khempeuh tawh kizui-in ama mi Israel-te tungah tawlngakna a pia Topa in thupha ngah ta hen! A nasempa Moses tungtawnin a gensa ama thuciam hoihte khempeuh kam khat zong maimawk lo hi.

en: But the LORD was gracious to them and had compassion on them, and He turned toward them because of His covenant with Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob. And to this day, He has been unwilling to destroy them or banish them from His presence.
zo: Ahih hangin Topa in amaute hehpihin amaute khasiat a, Abraham, Isaac, le Jakob tawh a thuciamna hangin amaute lamah amah kihei a, amaute nusia lo hi. Tu dongin zong ama mite mangngilh lo hi.

en: David also said to his son Solomon, “Be strong and courageous, and do the work. Do not be afraid or discouraged, for the LORD God, my God, is with you. He will not fail you or forsake you until all the work for the service of the house of the LORD is finished.
zo: Tua ciangin David in a tapa Solomon kiangah, “Thakhauhin hang inla sem in. Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian, keima Pasian nangawn nang tawh hong om hi. Topa’ biakinn sung nasepna khempeuh a kizawh matengin amah in nang hong tamasak lo ding a, hong nusia lo ding hi.

en: He went out to meet Asa and said to him, “Listen to me, Asa and all Judah and Benjamin. The LORD is with you when you are with Him. If you seek Him, He will be found by you, but if you forsake Him, He will forsake you.
zo: Tua ciangin Asa a dawntuah dingin amah pai-in ama kiangah, “Asa, le Judah mite le Benjamin mite aw, ka thu ngai un. Note amah tawh na om laiteng uh note tawh Topa hong om hi. Amah na zon uhleh amah na mu ding uh a, ahih hangin amah na nusiat uhleh amah in note hong nusia ding hi.

en: For I was ashamed to ask the king for soldiers and horsemen to protect us from enemies on the road, because we had told the king, “The gracious hand of our God is on everyone who looks to Him, but His great anger is against all who forsake Him.”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa kiangah, “Ka Pasian un amah a zong mite khempeuh ompihin amau a dingin a hoih na sem a, amah a nusiate khempeuh tungah amah heh hi,” ci-in gen khin ka hih manun lampi-ah kote hong kha dingin galkapte le sakol tung tuangte kumpipa kiangah ka nget ding ka mai a zum hi.

en: Wherever you hear the sound of the trumpet, join us there. Our God will fight for us!”
zo: Peengkul kitum na zakna peuhpeuh panun ko kiangah hong kikhawm un. I Pasian in eite a dingin hong dosak ding hi,” ka ci hi.

en: The Spirit of God has made me, and the breath of the Almighty gives me life.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ kha in kei hong sawl a, Vanglianpa in kei tungah nuntakna hu hong pia hi.

en: As for God, His way is perfect; the word of the LORD is flawless. He is a shield to all who take refuge in Him.
zo: Hih Pasian - a thu kicing a, Topa’ kamciamna a manna kilang hi. Amah a belte khempeuh a dingin kidalna lum ahi hi.

en: Whom have I in heaven but You? And earth has nothing I desire besides You.
zo: Nang simloh vantungah kua nei ka hi hiam? Nang simloh ka deih ding leitungah kuamah om lo hi.

en: The horse is prepared for the day of battle, but victory belongs to the LORD.
zo: Galdo nadingin sakolte a baihsa-in kikoih a, ahi zongin galzawhna pen Topa’ hang hizaw hi.

en: In the day of prosperity be joyful, but in the day of adversity consider this: God has made the one as well as the other, so that man cannot discover anything that will come after him.
zo: Nopna na ngah laitakin lungdam in; haksatna na tuah ciangin hih thu ngaihsun in: Lungdamna le lungkhamna hong piapa pen Pasian hi a, mai lamah bang piang ding cih kuamah in thei lo hi.

en: “I, even I, am He who blots out your transgressions, for My own sake, and remembers your sins no more.
zo: Na thupalsatnate hong paihkhiatsak pa pen keimah ka hi a, kei ka hih manin na khialhnate ka ciamteh kei ding hi.

en: This is what the LORD says: “Cursed is the one who trusts in man, who depends on flesh for his strength and whose heart turns away from the LORD.
zo: Topa in kong cihin-ah: “Mi bek muangin mi’ hatna bek suang a, Topa tawh a lungsim a kilehngat mi in hamsiatna a ngah ahi hi.

en: I will search for the lost and bring back the strays. I will bind up the injured and strengthen the weak, but the sleek and the strong I will destroy. I will shepherd the flock with justice.
zo: Keimah in a mangte zongin, a lampialte kaikhawmin, a liamte a liamma tuamsakin, a cinate damsakin, a cidam a thahatte zong a kibangin ka en ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen a manin a gamta tuucingpa ka hi hi.

en: Now when Daniel learned that the document had been signed, he went into his house, where the windows of his upper room opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God, just as he had done before.
zo: Tua bang thupiakna lai kihawmkhia khinzo ta hi, ci-in Daniel in a theih ciangin a inn-ah a ciah hi. A inn dawl tungnungah Jerusalem lam a nga tawlet thum a om hi. Tua laitakah tawlet honsa-in a hih ngei bangin khukdinin ni khatin thumvei ta Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.

en: “Therefore everyone who hears these words of Mine and puts them into practice is like a wise man who built his house on the rock.
zo: “Ka thuhilhna za-in a zui mi khempeuhte pen suang tungah a inn a lam mipil pa tawh kibang ding hi.

en: Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.
zo: Tua ahih manin note kiangah kong genin-ah: Na khat peuhpeuh na nget uh ciangin ngah ding ci-in um un; tua hileh na nget peuhpeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi.

en: For nothing will be impossible with God.”
zo: Tua ahih manin Pasian in a bawl theih loh khat zong om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

en: The Word became flesh and made His dwelling among us. We have seen His glory, the glory of the one and only Son from the Father, full of grace and truth.
zo: Tua Thu mihing hong suakin kote lakah hong om a, itna nei-in citak mahmah ahih manin Pasian’ pianzia a neihna ka mu cian uh hi. Hih pianzia pen Pasian’ Tapa khat bek hihna tawh a neih pianzia ahi hi.

en: They devoted themselves to the apostles’ teaching and to the fellowship, to the breaking of bread and to prayer.
zo: Amaute in sawltakte tung panin thu sinin amaute tawh kikhawl uh a, amaute tawh an nekhawmin, thu zong a ngenkhawm uh hi.

en: For in the gospel a righteousness from God is revealed—a righteousness that is by faith from first to last, just as it is written: “The righteous will live by faith.”
zo: Lai Siangtho sungah, “Pasian a upna hangin amah tawh pawlkhat ahi mite nungta ding hi,” ci-in a kigelh mah bangin Pasian in amah tawh a kipawl theih nadingin mite a bawlna zia, lungdamna thu in hong kilangsak hi. Tua pen, a patna panin a tawp dongin upna hang bek tawh ahihna thu hong laktel hi.

en: The natural man does not accept the things that come from the Spirit of God, for they are foolishness to him, and he cannot understand them, because they are spiritually discerned.
zo: Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho a nei lo mite in Pasian’ Kha Siangtho in a hong piak nate sang thei lo uh hi. Kha Siangtho a nei mite bek in theithei uh ahih manin amaute in tel thei lo uh a, amau a dingin a haihuai thu khat ahi lel hi.

en: For no matter how many promises God has made, they are “Yes” in Christ. And so through Him the “Amen” is spoken by us to the glory of God.
zo: Pasian’ thuciamte khempeuh a hih pa pen amah ahi hi. Tua ahih manin Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian phatin, “Amen,” i cihna zong hih thu hang mah ahi hi.

en: Christ redeemed us from the curse of the law by becoming a curse for us, for it is written: “Cursed is everyone who is hung on a tree.”
zo: Lai Siangtho in, “Sing tungah a kikhai mi peuhmah Pasian’ samsiat mi ahi hi,” na ci ahih manin eite a dingin Khrih in samsiatna a thuak manin Thukham zuihlahna hangin samsiatna panin eite a hong tankhia ahi hi.

en: In Him we have redemption through His blood, the forgiveness of our trespasses, in accordance with the riches of His grace
zo: Khrih hong sihna hangin eite in suahtakna ngahin, i mawhnate hong kimaisak ahi hi. Tuazah dongin Pasian’ hong hehpihna thu bangzah takin lian ahi hiam?

en: What is more, I consider everything a loss compared to the surpassing greatness of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord, for whose sake I have lost all things. I consider them rubbish, that I may gain Christ
zo: Hih bang nate bek hi loin, ka Topa Jesuh Khrih ka theihna manphazaw lua sa ka hih manin na dang khempeuh ka sum ngamzaw lai hi. Khrih hangin na dang khempeuh ka nusia khin a, Khrih tawh ka kipawl theih nadingin na dang khempeuh ninneng bang lelin ka ngaihsun hi.

en: He has canceled the written code, with its regulations, that was against us and stood opposed to us; He has taken it away, nailing it to the cross.
zo: Eite a dingin a hoih lo, i mawhna a kiciamtehna khempeuh, hong phiatsak a, tuate khempeuh singlamteh tungah kilhcipin a beisak ta hi.

en: For God did not appoint us to suffer wrath but to receive salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ.
zo: Pasian in ama hehna a thuak dingin eite a hong teel hi lo a, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin hotkhiatna a ngah dingin a hong teel ahi hi.

en: and to grant relief to you who are oppressed and to us as well. This will happen when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven in blazing fire with His powerful angels,
zo: tu-a gimna a thuak note le kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Jesuh le a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin,

en: But you, O man of God, flee from these things and pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, perseverance, and gentleness.
zo: Ahi zongin Pasian’ mi ahi nangmah in tua thute khempeuh pelh inla, thuman thutak, Pasian’ deih bangin nuntakna, upna, itna, kipna, le lungnemna na neihzawh nadingin hanciam in.

en: Guard the good deposit that was entrusted to you—guard it with the help of the Holy Spirit who lives in us.
zo: Eite sungah a hong teng Kha Siangtho in a hong ap thuhoihte limtakin kem in.

en: It teaches us to say “No” to ungodliness and worldly passions, and to live self-controlled, upright, and godly lives in this present age,
zo: Eite in i lamet, a lian Pasian le eite hong Hon Jesuh Khrih a vangliatna hong kilatkik ding hun ngakin i om laitakin i biakna tawh a kituak lo thute le leitung nate deihna phiatin, lungsim hi hithiatin omin, thutangin, hih leitungah Pasian’ deihna bangin i nuntak nadingin tua hehpihna thu in eite hong hilh hi.

en: In fact, the law requires that nearly everything be cleansed with blood, and without the shedding of blood there is no forgiveness.
zo: Thukham kizatna sungah na khempeuh sisan tawh kisiansuah a, sisan a kiluansak khit ciang bekin mawhna kimaisak thei pan hi.

en: Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights, who does not change like shifting shadows.
zo: A hoih thu le na khempeuh, Pasian kiang panin hong pai hi a, vantung khuavak a Piangsak pa ahih manin amah kikheel ngei lo a, amah a kihei manin khua zong mial tuan lo hi.

en: For you have been born again, not of perishable seed, but of imperishable, through the living and enduring word of God.
zo: A sithei nu le pate sung pan hi loin a sithei lo nu le pate sung panin a nungta tawntung Pasian’ thu tawh naungek bangin a suakkik na hi uh hi.

en: The Lord is not slow to fulfill His promise as some understand slowness, but is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish but everyone to come to repentance.
zo: Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.

en: This is the message we have heard from Him and declare to you: God is light, and in Him there is no darkness at all.
zo: Ama kiang panin za-in note tungah ka hong gen uh thu in: Pasian, khuavak hi a, khuamial tawh kizopna themkhat zong nei het lo hi.

en: And on His robe and on His thigh He has a name written: KING OF KINGS AND LORD OF LORDS.
zo: A puan tung le a phei tungah, “Kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa,” ci-in a min kigelh hi.

en: Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth, for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away, and there was no longer any sea.
zo: Tua ciangin van thak khat le lei thak khat ka mu hi. Van masa le lei masa maimang khin a, tuipi zong om nawn lo hi.

en: Then the LORD rained down burning sulfur on Sodom and Gomorrah—from the LORD out of the heavens.
zo: Tua ciangin Topa in vantung panin Sodom le Gomorrah khuate tungah kaat le meikuang zusak hi.

en: And the sight of the glory of the LORD was like a consuming fire on the mountaintop in the eyes of the Israelites.
zo: Tu-in Topa’ vangliatna vang pen Israel mite’ muhna-ah mualvum dawn a kangtum meikuang tawh kibang hi.

en: I delight to do Your will, O my God; Your law is within my heart.”
zo: Nangma deih bang hihna-ah nuam ka sa hi, ka Pasian aw. Nangma thukham ka lung sungah om hi,” ka ci hi.

en: As water reflects a face, so a man’s heart reflects the man.
zo: Tui sung en leeng eima maitang i muh bangin i lungsim en leeng eima pianzia kilang hi.

en: “Come, all you who are thirsty, come to the waters; and you who have no money, come, buy and eat! Come, buy wine and milk without money and without cost.
zo: A dangtak mi peuhmah tui phualah hong pai un. An nei lote aw, hong pai unla hong ne un! Hong pai un; a man ding bangmah piak kul loin leenggahzu le bawngnawi na duh zahzah uh hong ne un.

en: “Ah, Lord GOD! You have made the heavens and the earth by Your great power and outstretched arm. Nothing is too hard for You.
zo: ‘Topa Pasian ! Nangma vangpi le na khut tawh vantung le leitung na bawl khinzo hi. Nang a dingin a haksalua khat beek om lo hi.

en: Do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul. Rather, be afraid of the One who can destroy both soul and body in hell.
zo: Pumpi a thah khit ciangin kha a that thei lote na kihta kei un. Hell khuk sungah pumpi le kha a nihin a susia thei pa na kihtazaw un.

en: So he got up and went to his father. But while he was still a long way off, his father saw him and was filled with compassion for him; he ran to his son, threw his arms around him and kissed him.
zo: Tua ahih manin amah kithawi-in a pa kiangah a ciahkik dingin a pai hi. Ahi zongin inn a tun ma-in a pa in na galmuh a, hehpihhuaisa mahmah ahih manin va delhin, a tapa ngawng kawi-in a nam hi.

en: Once again, Jesus spoke to the people and said, “I am the light of the world. Whoever follows Me will never walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.”
zo: Tua khit ciangin Jesuh in mihonte kiangah a thugenna khatah, “Kei pen leitung khuavak ka hi hi. Kei hong zuite in khuavak nuntakna nei ding uh a, khuamial gamtatna nei lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

en: “Men of Galilee,” they said, “why do you stand here looking into the sky? This same Jesus, who has been taken from you into heaven, will come back in the same way you have seen Him go into heaven.”
zo: “Galilee mite aw, bang hangin vantung lam enin ding niloh na hi uh hiam? Note kiang panin vantungah a kilato hih Jesuh pen, vantungah a paitoh na muh uh bang teekteek mahin khatvei hong paisuk kik ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

en: Therefore, I urge you, brothers, in view of God’s mercy, to offer your bodies as living sacrifices, holy and pleasing to God—this is your spiritual act of worship.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin sanggamte aw, Pasian in eite tam veipi tak hong hehpih ahih manin ama lungkim nading le ama nasep nadingin nomau mahmah a hingtangin Pasian tungah na kipiak nadingun ka hong thum hi. Tua banga kipiakna pen Pasian biakna man taktak ahi hi.

en: For as in Adam all die, so in Christ all will be made alive.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Adam tawh a kizop manin mi khempeuh si a, tua mah bangin Khrih tawh a kizom khempeuh zong kihingkiksak ding hi.

en: Carry each other’s burdens, and in this way you will fulfill the law of Christ.
zo: Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi.

en: “In your anger do not sin”: Do not let the sun go down while you are still angry,
zo: Na heh uh ciangin, tua hehna hangin khialkha kei unla, a tawntungin heh paisuak kei un.

en: Therefore, my beloved, just as you have always obeyed, not only in my presence, but now even more in my absence, continue to work out your salvation with fear and trembling.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin ka hong it sanggamte aw, note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-in ka thu na hong man’ tawntung uh mah bangin, tu-in note tawh ka hong omkhawm loh hun ciangin zong ka thu na hong man’ ding uh thupizaw lai hi. Pasian kihtakna le zahtakna tawh na maa uh nawt unla, amah in note hong hotkhiatna thu a cingtaak suaksak un.

en: For there is one God and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian khat bek om a, Pasian le mite a hong kilemsakkik thei Khrih Jesuh khat bek om hi.

en: Therefore, since we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold firmly to what we profess.
zo: Tua ahih manin eite in Pasian’ omna vantung a va tung khinsa, Siampi Lianpen ahi Pasian’ Tapa Jesuh neikhin ihih manin i sansa upna thu kiptakin len ni.

en: You too, be patient and stand firm, because the Lord’s coming is near.
zo: Note zong na lungduai un. Topa hong pai ding hun naita ahih manin na lungsim uh na thahatsak un.

en: Be shepherds of God’s flock that is under your care, serving as overseers—not because you must, but because you are willing, as God wants you to be; not greedy for money, but eager to serve;
zo: Pasian in note’ khut sungah a hong piak tuuhonte hoihtakin na cing unla, ut lo pipi hi loin, Pasian’ hong deih bangin utna lungsim takpi tawh na cing un. Sum ngahnopna bek tawh a sem hi loin utna lungsim tawh a semte na hi un.

en: After this I looked and there before me was a great multitude that no one could count, from every nation, tribe, people and language, standing before the throne and in front of the Lamb. They were wearing white robes and were holding palm branches in their hands.
zo: Tua khit ciangin ka khuadak leh mi namkim, pau namkim panin kuama sim zawh loh dingin a tam mahmah mihonpite, tokhom mai le Tuuno mai-ah ding uh a, puanpak silhin a khut uhah nisuh hiang a tawi uh ka mu hi.

en: Now the LORD was gracious to Sarah as He had said, and the LORD did for Sarah what He had promised.
zo: A gensa bangin Topa in Sarah’ tungah thupha pia a, a gensa bangin Sarah’ tungah Topa in hih hi.

en: He said, “If you listen carefully to the voice of the LORD your God and do what is right in His eyes, if you pay attention to His commands and keep all His decrees, I will not bring on you any of the diseases I brought on the Egyptians, for I am the LORD, who heals you.”
zo: “Note in Topa na Pasian uh thu limtakin na ngaih uh a, ama mai-ah a man nate hihin, ama thupiakte don a, ama ngeina kipte khempeuh na zuih uhleh, Egypt mite’ tungah ka tunsak natnate khat beek note’ tungah kong tungsak kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa , note hong damsak pa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

en: Yet in spite of this, when they are in the land of their enemies, I will not reject them or abhor them so as to destroy them completely, breaking My covenant with them. I am the LORD their God.
zo: Bangbang ahi zongin, a galte uh gam sungah amaute a om sungteng uh keimah in amaute nilkhia loin, amaute a susia maimang zah ding le amaute tawh ka thuciamna a pelhzah dingin amaute ka mudah kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa amau’ Pasian ka hi hi.

en: So Moses made a bronze snake and mounted it on a pole. If anyone who was bitten looked at the bronze snake, he would live.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Moses in sumngo gul khat bawl a, khuam khat tungah a khai hi. Gul in mi khatpeuh a tuk leh amah in tua sumngo gul enin hing pah hi.

en: It is a land the LORD your God cares for. The eyes of the LORD your God are continually on it from the beginning of the year to its end.
zo: Topa na Pasian un a kep leitang hi a, kum kipat a kipan kum bei dongin Topa note’ Pasian in tua leitang en tawntung hi.

en: All these kings and their lands Joshua conquered in one campaign, because the LORD, the God of Israel, fought for Israel.
zo: Israel-te’ Topa Pasian in Israel-te a dingin dosak ahih manin Joshua in hih kumpite khempeuh le amau’ leitang hun khat sungin a la khin hi.

en: Then Samson said, “With a donkey’s jawbone I have made donkeys of them. With a donkey’s jawbone I have slain a thousand men.”
zo: Tua ciangin Samson in, “La khaguh khat tawh a lom lomin, la khaguh khat tawh mihing tulkhat ka that hi,” a ci hi.

en: He who is the Glory of Israel does not lie or change His mind, for He is not a man, that He should change His mind.”
zo: Israel-te’ minthang Pasian in zong zuau gen lo ding a, zong kisik lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a kisik dingin amah mi hi lo hi,” a ci hi.

en: And David knew that the LORD had established him as king over Israel and had exalted his kingdom for the sake of His people Israel.
zo: Tua ciangin David in Israel-te’ tungah kumpi-in Topa in amah a kipsak khitna le Israel mite’ hangin ama kumpi gam a liatsakna a phawktel hi.

en: The ravens brought him bread and meat in the morning and bread and meat in the evening, and he drank from the brook.
zo: Tua ciangin va-akte in ama kiangah zing le nitakin anlum le sa puak a, amah in lui panin tui a dawn hi.

en: For the Lord had caused the Aramean army to hear the sound of chariots and horses and a great army, so that they said to one another, “Look, the king of Israel has hired the Hittite and Egyptian kings to attack us!”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in leengte, le galkap hon lianpite’ huging Syria galkapte zasak ahih ciangin amaute khatlekhat in, “En un, Israel kumpipa in eite a hong hih dingin Hit kumpite le Egypt kumpite cial hi,” kici uh hi.

en: They were helped against them, and the Hagrites and all their allies were delivered into their hands, because they cried out to God in the battle. He answered their prayers because they trusted in Him.
zo: Amaute a sim nadingin huhna a ngah uh ciangin Hagri mite le amau tawh a kipawl khempeuhte amaute’ khut sungah kipia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal kidona sungah amaute in Pasian’ tungah ko uh a, amaute in Pasian muang uh ahih manin amah in amaute’ thumna a pia hi.

en: He sought God during the days of Zechariah, who instructed him in the fear of God. And as long as he sought the LORD, God gave him success.
zo: Pasian zahtak ding ama tungah a hilh Zekhariah’ hun sungteng amah in Pasian zong hi. Amah in Topa a zon laiteng, Pasian in amah daupaisak hi.

en: But the eye of their God was on the elders of the Jews, so that they were not stopped until a report could go to Darius and his written reply be returned.
zo: Ahi zongin Pasian in Judah upate huh ahih manin Darias kiangah a thu va tungin ama tung pan thu a kingahkik hun dong a nasep zomna uh kikhaktan lo hi.

en: I also told them about the gracious hand of my God upon me and what the king had said to me. They replied, “Let us start rebuilding.” So they began this good work.
zo: Tua ciangin a dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna le kumpipa in kei tungah hong gen thute zong amaute tungah ka gen hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tu-in nasep kipan pah ni,” hong ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin lawp mahmahna le ngimna hoih tawh nasep a kipan uh hi.

en: “I know that You can do all things and that no plan of Yours can be thwarted.
zo: “ Topa aw, vangliatna khempeuh na neihna, na hihnop khempeuh na hih theihna thu ka thei hi.

en: The counsel of the LORD stands firm forever, the plans of His heart to all generations.
zo: Topa’ thungaihsutna kip ngitnget a, ama lungsim ngaihsutna khang tawntungin a kip hi.

en: He will not let your foot slip; He who watches over you will not slumber.
zo: Amah in ka khe taalsak lo ding a, kei hong kem pa lusu lo ding hi.

en: Blessed is the man who finds wisdom, the man who gains understanding,
zo: Pilna nei-in thu a thei mipa, a lungdam mi ahi hi.

en: I know that everything God does will endure forever; nothing can be added to it and nothing taken from it. God does it so that men will fear Him.
zo: Pasian’ sep khempeuh a kip tawntung ding ahihna ka thei hi. I behlap theih ding om lo a, i paihkhiat ding zong om lo hi. Amah i zahtak theih nadingin Pasian in tua bang ding mahin a bawl ahi hi.

en: No weapon forged against you will prevail, and you will refute every tongue that accuses you. This is the heritage of the servants of the LORD, and this is their vindication from Me,” declares the LORD.
zo: Nangmah do nadingin a kibawl hiam peuhmah maavang lo ding a, thukhenna sungah na langah a pang mi khempeuh na nialgawpzo ding hi. Hih thu pen Topa ’ nasemte’ gamhluah le keima kiang panin amaute’ dikna a kilahna ahi hi, Topa in ci hi,” a ci hi.

en: “You have seen correctly,” said the LORD, “for I am watching to see that My word is fulfilled.”
zo: Tua ciangin Topa in, “Na man hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka thugente ka tangtunsak nadingin kei zong ka ngak hi,” hong ci hi.

en: Therefore prophesy and say to them: ‘This is what the Lord GOD says: O My people, I will open your graves and bring you up from them; and I will bring you back to the land of Israel.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin ka mi Israel-te tungah thu gen inla, Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Ka mite aw, tu-in note’ hankhuk kong honsak ding a, note hong paikhiatpihin, Israel gam kong tunpihkik ding hi.

en: If we are thrown into the blazing furnace, the God we serve is able to save us from it, and He will rescue us from your hand, O king.
zo: Mei phualpi sung panin a hong honkhia thei pasian a om leh ka biak ka Pasian uh hi ding a, na khutsung panin a hong honkhia ding hi.

en: Jesus looked at them and said, “With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.”
zo: Ahi zongin Jesuh in amaute enin, “Mihingte’ hihzawh ding hi lo mah hi; ahi zongin Pasian in na khempeuh hihthei hi,” a ci hi.

en: “Abba, Father,” He said, “everything is possible for You. Take this cup from Me. Yet not what I will, but what You will.”
zo: “Pa aw, na khempeuh na hihthei hi. Hih ka thuak ding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei’ deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen,” a ci hi.

en: For my eyes have seen Your salvation,
zo: Ka mit mahmah tawh nong hotkhiatna ka mukhin a,

en: Jesus answered, “You would have no authority over Me if it were not given to you from above. Therefore the one who handed Me over to you is guilty of a greater sin.”
zo: Jesuh in, “Pasian in nang tungah hong pia lo hileh kei tungah thu na nei het kei ding hi. Tua ahih manin nangma khut sungah kei hong apte’ mawhna lianzaw hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

en: But Peter and the other apostles replied, “We must obey God rather than men!
zo: Ahi zongin Peter le sawltak dangte in, “Mite’ thu sangin Pasian’ thu ka mangzaw ding uh hi.

en: For from Him and through Him and to Him are all things. To Him be the glory forever! Amen.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh na khempeuh ama piansak hi a, na khempeuh ama hang le ama minthan nading bekin a om ahi hi. Mi khempeuh in Pasian phat tawntung ta hen! Amen.

en: For who makes you different from anyone else? What do you have that you did not receive? And if you did receive it, why do you boast as though you did not?
zo: Note in bang kisaktheihpih na hi uh hiam? Tu-a na neih khempeuh uh Pasian’ hong piak hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahihleh hong kipiasa bek ahih manin a bang kisaktheihpih na hi uh hiam?

en: For our boast is this: our conscience testifies that we have conducted ourselves in the world, and especially in our relations with you, in the holiness and sincerity that are from God—not in worldly wisdom, but in the grace of God.
zo: Kote’ kisialhpih thu in: hih leitung a ka gamtatnate uh le a diakdiakin note tungah kong gamtatnate uhah, mihingte’ pilna a zang hi loin Pasian hehpihna vang tawh, Pasian’ deihna bangin lungsim takpi tawh a gamta hi ung, ci-in ka kitheihna lungsim uh ahi hi.

en: The entire law is fulfilled in a single decree: “Love your neighbor as yourself.”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Thukham khempeuh thu khatin kigawm thei a, “Nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” cihna tawh kitomlak thei hi.

en: In Him and through faith in Him we may approach God with freedom and confidence.
zo: Amah tawh i kipawlna le amah i muanna hangin kimuang takin Pasian kiangah paitheih nading hun i nei hi.

en: For it has been granted to you on behalf of Christ not only to believe in Him, but also to suffer for Him,
