zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih’ na sep nading hunpha zong note tungah a hong kipia hi a, Khrih upna tawh ama na a sem hi bek loin, thuakna tawh zong a sem ding na hi uh hi.

en: Devote yourselves to prayer, being watchful and thankful.
zo: Lungsim takpi tawh thu ngen tawntung unla, kidawm kawmin lungdamna tawh thu ngen un.

en: For this is the will of God, your sanctification: that you abstain from sexual immorality;
zo: Note a siangtho-in nungta-in numei tunga mawhna tawh na kipelh siangtho nading uh Pasian in hong deih hi.

en: Now may the Lord of peace Himself give you peace at all times and in every way. The Lord be with all of you.
zo: Eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia thei Topa in note tungah a tawntungin nopsakna hong pia hen la, amah in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen.

en: Now to the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only God, be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen.
zo: Amah bek Pasian ahi, a kimu thei lo, a si ngei lo, tawntung Kumpipa in minthanna le pahtawina ngah tawntung tahen. Amen.

en: and which has now been revealed through the appearing of our Savior, Christ Jesus, who has abolished death and has brought life and immortality to light through the gospel.
zo: tuhun ciangin eite hong Honpa Khrih Jesuh tungtawnin a dikna hong langsak ta hi. Tua Jesuh in sihna beisak a, lungdamna thu hangin sih nawn lohna thu a hong kilangsak hi.

en: in the hope of eternal life, which God, who does not lie, promised before time began.
zo: Pasian’ sila, le Jesuh Khrih’ sawltak ahi keimah Paul in, Thuzuau a gen ngei lo Pasian in tangtawng pekin thu hong ciamin, a hunhoih a tun ciangin thuhilhna tawh a hong kilatsak nuntak tawntungna thu lametna tawh, Pasian’ teel mite’ upna le thuman thutak a theihna uhah biakna thu tawh kituakin a khan semsem nading thu a hilh dingin eite hong Hon Pasian’ thupiakna tawh nasep hong kipia ahih manin,

en: In the past God spoke to our fathers through the prophets at many times and in various ways,
zo: A beisa hunah Pasian in kamsangte zangin i pupite tungah a lam tuamtuam tawh a khen khenin thu na gen ngeizo hi.

en: because judgment without mercy will be shown to anyone who has not been merciful. Mercy triumphs over judgment!
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh hehpihna lungsim a nei lote tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin hehpih lo ding a, hehpihna lungsim a neite tungah Pasian in thu a khen ciangin a hehpihna in zozaw ding hi.

en: In this you greatly rejoice, though now for a little while you may have had to suffer grief in all kinds of trials.
zo: Tua ahih manin tu laitakin mite’ bawlsiatna a tuamtuam na thuak manun tawlkhat na lungkham uh ahi zongin hih bang thuakna hangin lungdamzaw un.

en: Simon Peter, a servant and apostle of Jesus Christ, To those who through the righteousness of our God and Savior Jesus Christ have received a faith as precious as ours:
zo: Jesuh Khrih nasem le sawltak ahi keimah Simon Peter in: Eite’ Pasian le Honpa ahi Jesuh Khrih a thumanna hangin kote’ upna zah mahin upna manpha a nei mite tungah lai ka hong khak hi.

en: Behold what manner of love the Father has given to us, that we should be called children of God!
zo: Pa Pasian in eite bangzah takin hong itna thu thei un. Ama hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin eite pen Pasian’ tate hong kici a, hong kicih mah bang ihi takpi hi. Leitung mite in tuhun ciang dong Pasian thei lo uh ahih manin eite zong a hong thei lo uh ahi hi.

en: The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave Him to show His servants what must soon take place. He made it known by sending His angel to His servant John,
zo: Hih laibu pen a piang baih ding thute, Pasian’ nasemte tungah a lah dingin Pasian in Jesuh tungah a thu pia a, Jesuh in maang sungah a lah thute ahi hi. Khrih in ama vantungmi sawl a, a nasempa Johan kiangah hih thute a kilangsak hi.

en: There will be no more night. They will not need the light of a lamp or the light of the sun, for the Lord God will give them light. And they will reign forever and ever.
zo: Topa Pasian pen amaute’ khuavak hi-in, a tawntungin amaute in uk paisuak ding uh ahih manin khuamial hun cih om nawn lo ding a, khua a vaksak ding meivak le nitaang cihte kisam lo ding uh hi.

en: When Abram was ninety-nine years old, the LORD appeared to him and said, “I am God Almighty; walk before Me and be blameless.
zo: Abram kum sawmkua le kua a phak ciangin ama tungah Topa kilang a, “Kei, Vanglian Pasian ka hi hi. Hoihtakin gamta inla, paubaang kei in.

en: And you are to place the Urim and the Thummim in the breastpiece of judgment, so that they may be over Aaron’s heart whenever he enters the presence of the LORD. Thus Aaron will always bear the means of judgment for the Israelites over his heart before the LORD.
zo: Thukhenna awmdal sungah Urim le Thummim na koih ding a, Topa’ mai-ah a pai ciangin Aaron’ lungtang tungah tuate om ding hi. Tua bangin Aaron in ama lungtang tungah Israel mite’ thukhenna Topa’ mai-ah pua tawntung ding hi.

en: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit; a broken and contrite heart, O God, You will not despise.
zo: Pasian’ san theih biakna pen lungsim kitamzan ahi hi. Pasian aw, a kitamzan, a kisik lungsim na simmawh kei ding hi.

en: When words are many, sin is not absent, but he who holds his tongue is wise.
zo: Kam tam paute tampi khial a, pau iptheite mipil hi.

en: Who has measured the waters in the hollow of his hand, or marked off the heavens with the span of his hand? Who has held the dust of the earth in a basket, or weighed the mountains on the scales and the hills in a balance?
zo: Kua in ama khutkuak sungah tuite tehin, ama khap tawh vantung teh a, leitung leivui khempeuh lawh khat sungah guangin, pongkhaina tawh mual liante khai a, tawitehna tawh mual neute teh ahi hiam?

en: “For My people have committed two evils: They have forsaken Me, the spring of living water, and have dug their own cisterns, broken cisterns that cannot hold water.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mite in mawhna nam nih a bawlzo uh hi. Nuntakna ciktui ahi keimah a hong taisanzo uh hi. Tuikhuk totawm uh a, a tuikhuk tawh uh keu-in, tui a vung thei kei hi.

en: What good will it be for a man if he gains the whole world, yet forfeits his soul? Or what can a man give in exchange for his soul?
zo: Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin a nuntakna bulpi suplawh leh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam? A nuntakna bang tawh leikik thei nawn ding ahi hiam?

en: For everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, and the one who humbles himself will be exalted.”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh a kiliansakte khempeuh in niamkhiatna thuak ding uh a, a kiniamkhiatte khempeuh a lianin kibawl ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Truly, truly, I tell you, unless a kernel of wheat falls to the ground and dies, it remains only a single seed. But if it dies, it produces many seeds.
zo: A mantakin ci lehang, mangbuhhum tang khat leilakah kituhin si masa kei leh tang khat bek mah hi ngitnget hi; ahi zongin si masa leh tang tampi tak hong nei thei hi.

en: Through Him everyone who believes is justified from everything you could not be justified from by the law of Moses.
zo: Tua tham loin Jesuh a um mite khempeuh pen Moses Thukham in a suahtaksak zawh loh mawhna khempeuh panin a suakta ahihna thu na theih ding uh ahi hi.

en: Therefore, since we have been justified through faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ,
zo: Tu-in upna hangin Pasian tawh kipawl khinta ihih manin i Topa Jesuh Khrih hangin Pasian tawh a kilemkik ta ihi hi.

en: “Everything is permissible for me,” but not everything is beneficial. “Everything is permissible for me,” but I will not be mastered by anything.
zo: “Ka ut peuhpeuh ka hihtheih nading thu om hi,” a ci omkha ding hi. Ahi zongin na khempeuh hih ding kilawm lo hi. Kei zong ka ut khempeuh ka hih theih hangin tua bang gamtatna khat peuhpeuh’ sila ka suak nuam kei hi.

en: For we live by faith, not by sight.
zo: Muhna hang tawh lungmuangin a om hi loin upna hang tawh lungmuang takin a om ka hi uh hi.

en: Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all people, especially to those who belong to the family of believers.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin hunhoih i ngah simin midangte tungah a hoihin i gamta ding a, a diakdiakin thu upna sungah i innkuanpihte khempeuh tungah i hoih gamtat ding i phawk ding hi.

en: and walk in love, just as Christ loved us and gave Himself up for us as a fragrant offering and sacrifice to God.
zo: Khrih in eite a hong it manin Pasian in eite’ mawhna hong maisak theih nadingin a namtui biakna-in Pasian kiangah a kipiak mah bangin note zong itna tawh na gamta un.

en: Therefore, my brothers, whom I love and long for, my joy and crown, stand firm in the Lord in this way, my beloved.
zo: Tua ahih manin sanggamte aw, note ka hong it mahmah a, nakpitakin ka hong goih hi. Note in nakpitakin kei na hong lungnuamsak uh a, note ka hong angtanpih mahmah hi. Tua hi a, sanggamte aw, Topa sungah kiptakin nungta un.

en: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
zo: Note pumkhat suakin a lungdam khawm dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahih mah bangin Khrih hong piak nopsakna in note’ lungsim hong uk ta hen la, lungdamin om ta un.

en: Make sure that no one repays evil for evil. Always pursue what is good for one another and for all people.
zo: Gitlohna lamsang kuamah kithuk loin, note khatlekhat tung le mi khempeuh tungah a pha kibawl ding ngaihsutpi-in na nei un.

en: Do not neglect to show hospitality to strangers, for by so doing some people have shown hospitality to angels without knowing it.
zo: Khualmite hoihtakin zin na do ding uh na phawk un. Mi pawlkhat in vantung mite zindo ahihlam a phawk lopi-in a do na hi gige uh hi.

en: We all stumble in many ways. If anyone is never at fault in what he says, he is a perfect man, able to control his whole body.
zo: Eite khempeuh a khialthei zelzelte vive ihi hi. Kampauna-ah a khial ngei lo mi a om leh a cingtaak mahmah hi a, a pumpi zong a ukzo mi ahi hi.

en: Each one should use whatever gift he has received to serve others, faithfully administering God’s grace in its various forms.
zo: Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un.

en: Those whom I love I rebuke and discipline. So be earnest and repent.
zo: Ka it mite thuhilhin ka taii hi. Tua ahih manin lungsim tak tawh na mawhna panun kisik kik un.

en: It was also called Mizpah, for he said, “May the LORD keep watch between you and me when we are out of each other’s sight.
zo: a khuam pen Mizpah, ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Laban in, “Eite khatlekhat i tuam om ciangin Topa in nang le kei’ kikalah hong encik tahen.

en: And Moses built an altar and named it The LORD is my Banner.
zo: Moses in biakna tau khat lamin a min dingin, “ Topa , keima zawhna lim ahi hi,” ci-in phuak a,

en: “You must not go about as a slanderer among your people. You must not stand against the life of your neighbor. I am the LORD.
zo: Note in na mipihte lak uhah mi gensia-in vaksuk vakto loin, na vengpa uh a sih nadingin na langpang kei ding uh hi; kei pen Topa ka hi hi.

en: When a man makes a vow to the LORD or takes an oath to obligate himself by a pledge, he must not break his word; he must do everything he has said.
zo: Mi khat in Topa’ tungah thuciamna a ciam ciang ahi a, amah in a zuih dingin kiciamna a bawl ciang ahi zongin, amah ciampel lo ding a, ama kamsung panin a gingkhiate khempeuh tawh kizui-in gamta ding hi.

en: You must have accurate and honest weights and measures, so that you may live long in the land the LORD your God is giving you.
zo: Tawisuang a cing a man na nei ding uh a, tehna a cing a man na nei ding uh hi. Topa note’ Pasian in hong piak leitangah na khan uh a sau theih nading ahi hi.

en: There was not a word of all that Moses had commanded that Joshua did not read before the whole assembly of Israel, including the women, the little ones, and the foreigners who lived among them.
zo: Moses in a thupiak kammalte khempeuh Israel mihonpite, numeite, le amaute lakah a teng peemtate mai-ah Joshua in a simloh khatzong om lo hi.

en: From the heavens the stars fought; from their courses they fought against Sisera.
zo: Vantung panin aksite in do uh a, amau paina ciat panin Sisera do uh hi.

en: Even if someone rises to pursue you and seek your life, the life of my lord will be bound securely in the bundle of the living by the LORD your God. But the lives of your enemies He will hurl away as from the pocket of a sling.
zo: Nangmah delhin hong that dingin mite hong kipat leh, nang pen Topa na Pasian’ kepna sung a hing mite lakah na om ding a, amah in suanglotna tawh lotkhiat bangin na galte lawnkhia ding hi.

en: They also brought honey and curds, sheep, and cheese from cattle for David and his people to eat. For they said, “The people have become hungry and weary and thirsty in the wilderness.”
zo: khuaizu le bawngnawi-thaukhal, le tuu le sathaukhalte, David le amah tawh a om mite’ nek dingin hong puak uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Mite gamlakah gilkialin, gimin dangtak uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

en: I will surely do today what I swore to you by the LORD, the God of Israel: ‘Solomon your son shall be king after me, and he will sit on my throne in my place.’”
zo: nangma tungah Topa , Israel Pasian’ min tawh hong kiciamin, ‘Keima nungah ka tapa Solomon maang ding a, keima tangin ka kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,’ ka cihsa mah bangin, tuni-in zong ka cikik hi,” a ci hi.

en: So they went back and told Jehu, who said, “This is the word of the LORD, which He spoke through His servant Elijah the Tishbite: ‘On the plot of ground at Jezreel, dogs will devour the flesh of Jezebel.
zo: Amaute hong paikikin Jehu kiangah a gen uh ciangin amah in, “Hih pen a nasempa, Tishbe mi Elijah tungtawnin Topa’ gensa ahi hi: ‘Jezreel khua sungah uite in Jezebel’ sa ne ding uh hi.

en: David told the leaders of the Levites to appoint their brothers as singers to raise their voices with joy, accompanied by musical instruments—harps, lyres, and cymbals.
zo: Lungdamna aw ginsak nadingin lasakna nate, harp lasakna le laiza lasaknate le a daltuahte nakpitakin tumin la a sa dingin Levi ukpite in a mipihte uh a sehna ding David in thu a pia hi.

en: “This is what Cyrus king of Persia says: ‘The LORD, the God of heaven, has given me all the kingdoms of the earth, and He has appointed me to build a temple for Him in Jerusalem of Judah. Whoever among you belongs to His people, may the LORD his God be with him, and let him go up.’”
zo: “Persia kumpipa Sairas in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Vantung Pasian, Topa in leitung kumpi gam khempeuh kei hong pia khin a, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua-ah ama a dingin biakinn khat ka lamsak ding hong sawl hi. Note lakah ama mi ahi khempeuh, Topa a Pasian uh in ompih tahen. Biakinn lam dingin Jerusalem-ah amaute paito sak un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

en: May God, who has caused His name to dwell there, overthrow any king or people who lifts a hand to alter this decree or to destroy this house of God in Jerusalem. I, Darius, have issued this decree. Let it be carried out with diligence.
zo: Hih ka thupiakna a siasak nuam, Jerusalem-a Pasian’ biakinn a susia nuam kumpi khatpeuh ahi a, mi khatpeuh ahi zongin a om leh, ama min omna dinga tua mun a bawl Pasian in tua mipa lawnthal tahen. Keimah Darias in thu kong pia hi. Ka thupiak bang teekteekin sep ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.

en: But the former governors who preceded me had laid heavy burdens on the people, taking from them forty shekels of silver, in addition to food and wine. Their assistants also lorded it over the people. But because of my fear of God, I did not act this way.
zo: Keima hun ma-in a ukte in mite tungah van gikpi suan uh a, amaute’ tung panin nisimin an le leenggahzu ngun shekel sawmli man a la uh hi. Amau’ nasemte nangawn mite tungah kiliansak lai uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian ka zahtakna hangin tua bangin kei ka gamta kei hi.

en: So they hanged Haman on the gallows that he had prepared for Mordecai. Then the king’s fury subsided.
zo: Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Tua tungah amah khailum un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Mordekai khailup nadingin a phuh khuam tungah Haman a khailum uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ hehna a dam hi.

en: And after my skin has been thus destroyed, yet in my flesh I will see God.
zo: Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi.

en: You have ascended on high; You have led captives away. You have received gifts from men, even from the rebellious, that the LORD God may dwell there.
zo: Topa nangmah Pasian tua munah na om theih nadingin a sangna-ah kahto-in salte na paipih a, mihonte le mi lehdote’ tung nangawn panin piakkhong nate na ngah hi.

en: A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
zo: Lawm citak in a tawntungin hong it a, i sanggamte pen i lungkhamna a hong thuakpih dingin a piang ahi hi.

en: “Meaningless! Meaningless!” says the Teacher. “Utterly meaningless! Everything is meaningless.”
zo: Thugen Siampa in hih bangin ci hi: A mawknapi, a mawknapi, na khempeuh a mawknapi.

en: How you have fallen from heaven, O morning star, son of the dawn! You have been cast down to the earth, you who once laid low the nations!
zo: “Nang Khuavak’ ta, Zingsol, Babylon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam? Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah leilak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam?

en: Can the Ethiopian change his skin, or the leopard his spots? Neither can you do good who are accustomed to doing evil.
zo: Ethiopia mivomte in a vun uh khek thei a, kamkei in a gial khek thei ahi hiam? A khek theih uhleh siatna bawl ding a zongsang khin note in zong a hoih na bawl thei ding uh hi.

en: Swarms of living creatures will live wherever the river flows. There will be large numbers of fish, because this water flows there and makes the salt water fresh; so where the river flows everything will live.
zo: Hih tui a luanna mun peuhpeuhah ganhing namkim le ngasa tampi om hi. Hih tui in Si Tuipi tui siangsakkikin, a luanna peuhpeuhah nuntakna omsakkik ding hi.

en: And many who sleep in the dust of the earth will awake, some to everlasting life, but others to shame and everlasting contempt.
zo: A sisa mi tampite in nuntakna a ngahkik ding uh hi. Pawlkhatte nungta tawntung ding uh a, pawlkhatte in a tawntung zumna le minsiatna a ngah ding uh hi.

en: “Where is the one who has been born king of the Jews? We saw his star in the east and have come to worship him.”
zo: “Jew mite’ kumpi ding ahi naungek a hong suak pen koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Nisuahna lam pan ama aksi hong suah ciangin ka mu uh a, amah a bia dingin a hong pai ka hi uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.

en: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ, the Son of God.
zo: Pasian’ Tapa Jesuh Khrih tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu hih bang ahi hi.

en: “I tell you,” He answered, “if they remain silent, the very stones will cry out.”
zo: Jesuh in, “Ke’n kong cihin-ah, hih mite in hong phat loin khawl ta le-uh zong, hih lamdung a suangte in phatin awng veve ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

en: And he brought him to Jesus. Jesus looked at him and said, “You are Simon son of John. You will be called Cephas” (which, when translated, is Peter).
zo: Tua ciangin Jesuh kiangah a u Simon a paipih hi. Jesuh in amah enin, “Nang pen Johan’ tapa Simon na hi hi. Tu a kipanin Sifas hong kici ding hi,” a ci hi. Sifas pen Peter tawh a kibang hi a, suangtum a cihna ahi hi.

en: The voice spoke to him a second time: “Do not call anything impure that God has made clean.”
zo: A awging in ama kiangah, “Pasian in a siangin a gensa khat peuhpeuh a ninin ngaihsun kei in,” a ci leuleu hi.

en: The God of peace will soon crush Satan under your feet. The grace of our Lord Jesus be with you.
zo: Tua hileh eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia thei Pasian in Satan tuancilin note’ khenuai mi hong hisak baih ding hi. I Topa Jesuh Khrih hong hehpihna thupha, note tungah om tahen.

en: For the foolishness of God is wiser than man’s wisdom, and the weakness of God is stronger than man’s strength.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ haina pen mite’ pilna sangin sangzaw lai a, Pasian’ thaneemna pen mite’ hatna sangin hatzaw lai hi.

en: For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that though He was rich, yet for your sakes He became poor, so that you through His poverty might become rich.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa Jesuh zong hau mahmah napi-in ama zawnna tawh note mihau na suahtheih nadingun note’ hangin mizawngin hong kibawl ahih manin i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong itna bangzah takin lian hiam, cih thu na thei uh hi.

en: who gave Himself for our sins to rescue us from the present evil age, according to the will of our God and Father,
zo: A siahuai tuhun sung panin eite a hong suahtaksak nadingin eite’ Pa Pasian’ deihna tawh kizui-in i mawhna hangin tua Jesuh Khrih amahmah a hong kipiatawm ahi hi.

en: And take the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.
zo: Siklukhu khuk bangin hotkhiatna nei unla, Kha Siangtho in a hong piak Pasian’ thu pen namsau zat bangin na zang un.

en: If you have any encouragement from being united with Christ, if any comfort from His love, if any fellowship with the Spirit, if any tenderness and compassion,
zo: Note, Khrih tawh kipawlin na nuntakna uh in note hong thahatsak hi. Kha Siangtho tawh kikhawlin, khatlekhat kihehpihin, dikna na kibawl uh hi.

en: We proclaim Him, admonishing and teaching everyone with all wisdom, so that we may present everyone perfect in Christ.
zo: Tua ahih manin a milip tungah Khrih’ thu ka hilh uh a, Khrih tawh a kipawlna uh hangin a milipin a khangcingin Pasian’ omna-ah ka tunpih theih nadingun a milip tungah hilhin ka genkhol uh hi.

en: On the contrary, we speak as men approved by God to be entrusted with the gospel. We are not trying to please men, but God, who tests our hearts.
zo: Pasian in kote hong thei-in Lungdamna Thu a hilh dingin kilawm hong sa ahih mah bangin mite’ lungdam theih nadingin thu a hilh hi loin kote’ lungsim ngimna a hong thei Pasian’ lungkim nadingin thu a hilh ka hizaw uh hi.

en: But the Lord is faithful, and He will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.
zo: Note ahihleh, Topa citak mahmah ahih manin hong thahatsak ding a, A Gilopa kiang panin hong honkhia ding hi.

en: An overseer, then, must be above reproach, the husband of one wife, temperate, self-controlled, respectable, hospitable, able to teach,
zo: Tua ahih manin siate pen paubaanna a nei lo mi, zi khat bek a nei mi, lungsim hoih hithiat mi, thu a ngaihsun thei mi, a kilawm a kituakin a gamta mi, zin le leengla do a siam mi, thuhilh a siam mi,

en: You therefore, my child, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.
zo: Ka ta aw, nang na hih leh Khrih Jesuh tawh i kipawl manin i ngah hehpihna hangin thahatin om in.

en: Remind the people to be subject to rulers and authorities, to be obedient, to be ready for every good work,
zo: Na mite in hong uk kumpite le aana neite’ thu mangin, thuhoih khempeuh a sem dingin a kigingsa-in a om ding uh phawksak inla,

en: Let us not neglect our meeting together, as some have made a habit, but let us encourage one another, and all the more as you see the Day approaching.
zo: Mi pawlkhatte in kikhop a pelh bang hi loin, eite in kikhop khawmnate pelh loin om ni. Topa’ hong pai ding Ni hong naina thu thei ihih manin khatlekhat kihanthawn semsemzaw ni.

en: Consider it pure joy, my brothers, whenever you face trials of many kinds,
zo: Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdam nadingin na ngaihsun zaw un.

en: Like newborn babies, crave pure spiritual milk, so that by it you may grow up in your salvation,
zo: Naungek suakcilte na bang unla, note khangto-in hotkhiatna na ngahtheih nadingun kha thu tawh kisai nawizu siangtho duh belin na nei tawntung un.

en: For no prophecy was ever produced by the will of man, but men spoke from God as they were carried along by the Holy Spirit.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte in a deih manin mailam thugenkholh theihna a kingah hi lo a, Kha Siangtho’ sawlna tawh Pasian’ kiang panin a hong pai thute a kigen ahi zaw hi.

en: This is love: not that we loved God, but that He loved us and sent His Son as an atoning sacrifice for our sins.
zo: Hih ka gen itna pen eite in Pasian i itna thu hi lo a, Pasian in eite hong itin, i mawhna a maitheih nadingin a Tapa a hong paisakna thu ahi hi.

en: Then I saw heaven standing open, and there before me was a white horse. And its rider is called Faithful and True. With justice He judges and wages war.
zo: Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuang pa pen a Citak a Thuman pa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi.

en: Then the angel showed me the river of the water of life, as clear as crystal, flowing from the throne of God and of the Lamb
zo: Tua ciangin vantungmi in Pasian le Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luangkhia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a tee selsel gun tui hong lak a,

en: But God sent me ahead of you to preserve for you a remnant on earth and to save your lives by a great deliverance.
zo: Note a dingin leitungah a omlai mi a hingsak ding le note a dingin a suakta mi tampi a kem dingin note’ mai-ah Pasian in kei hong sawl hi.

en: “I will surely be with you,” God said, “and this will be the sign to you that I have sent you: When you have brought the people out of Egypt, you will worship God on this mountain.”
zo: Amah in, “Nang tawh kong om taktak ding hi. Hih pen nangma a dingin nangmah kong sawlna lim hi ding hi: Nangmah in Egypt panin mihingte na paikhiatpih khit ciangin, nang in hih mualtungah Pasian na bia ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for You are with me; Your rod and Your staff, they comfort me.
zo: Topa aw, kei hong ompih na hih manin khuamial thukpi ka nawk hangin ka lau kei hi. Na molhtum le na ciangkhut in kei hong hu hi.

en: The lot is cast into the lap, but its every decision is from the LORD.
zo: Mite in bangbangin ai a san zongin, a piang ding thu pen Topa’ deihna bangbek hizaw hi.

en: The grass withers and the flowers fall, but the word of our God stands forever.
zo: Lopa vul a, pak a pulh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian’ thu kho tawntung ding hi,” hong ci hi.

en: Then the LORD reached out His hand and touched my mouth and said to me, “Behold, I have put My words in your mouth.
zo: Tua ciangin Topa in a khut tawh hong zam phei-in ka muk hong lawnsakin hong hopih hi. “En in, ka thute na kam sungah kong koih khinzo hi.

en: For My yoke is easy and My burden is light.”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh note kong suat ding ka hakkol nuam a, na puak ding uh van zong a zang mah ahi hi,” ci-in a genkhia hi.

en: to shine on those living in darkness and in the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the path of peace.”
zo: sih ding lauhuaina sungah a om mi khempeuh tungah vantung khuavak hong taangsak ding a, nopsakna lampi-ah hong kha ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: I give them eternal life, and they will never perish. No one can snatch them out of My hand.
zo: Tua ahih manin amaute tungah nuntak tawntungna pia ka hih manin si ngei nawn lo ding uh a, keima khutsung panin kuamah in amaute hong sut zo lo ding uh hi.

en: For He has set a day when He will judge the world with justice by the Man He has appointed. He has given proof of this to all men by raising Him from the dead.”
zo: Amah in leitung mi khempeuh thu a mantakin ama teel mipa a hong khensak nading ni a sehkhol khinzo hi. Tua a ngaihsutna a man taktak hi, ci-in mi khempeuh tungah a hong lah nadingin a teel mipa, sihna panin a hingkiksak zo hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.

en: I consider that our present sufferings are not worth comparing with the glory that will be revealed in us.
zo: Tuhuna i thuaknate pen Pasian in a hong piak ding minthanna tawh ka ngaihsut khawm ciangin gentham ka sa het kei hi.

en: Now we see but a poor reflection as in a mirror; then we shall see face to face. Now I know in part; then I shall know fully, even as I am fully known.
zo: Dal limlang sunga et bangin tu laitakin a kitel pha loin i mu milmial a, ahi zongin mai lamah maitang kituahin i mu ding hi. Tu laitakin i theihnate kicing lo a, ahi zongin mai lamah Pasian in eite hong theih mah bangin a kicing takin amah i thei ding hi.

en: So you are no longer a slave, but a son; and since you are a son, God has made you also an heir.
zo: Tua ahih manin note pen sila hi nawn loin Pasian’ tate na hih manun Pasian in ama tate a dingin a koih khempeuh, note tungah hong pia ding hi.

en: And you also were included in Christ when you heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation. Having believed, you were marked in Him with a seal, the promised Holy Spirit,
zo: Note in zong hotkhiatna a hong ngahsakthei Lungdamna Thu a man za-in Khrih na up uh ciangin, Pasian in a hong ciamsa bangin ama mi na hihna uh a kilat nadingin note tungah Kha Siangtho hong piakna tawh a hong ciamteh hi.

en: I want to know Christ and the power of His resurrection and the fellowship of His sufferings, being conformed to Him in His death,
zo: Jesuh Khrih thei-in, ama thawhkik bangin thokikin, kei zong sihna panin hong hingsakkik ding hi, ci-in ka lametna hangin ama thuak bangin thuakin, sihna-ah zong amah tawh ka kibat ding ka utpi pen ahi hi.

en: And having disarmed the powers and authorities, He made a public spectacle of them, triumphing over them by the cross.
zo: Amah in huihlak a ukte le vangliatna a nei khempeuh, singlamteh tungah zogawp khin a, galzote in a sal matte a kaih uh bangin mi khempeuh muhin a gualzawhna a lak hi.

en: Watch your life and doctrine closely. Persevere in them, because if you do, you will save both yourself and your hearers.
zo: Na gamtatna le na thuhilhnate-ah hoihtakin kidawmin om lecin nangmah a kipan na thugen a za mite a dingin phattuamna om ding ahih manin na nasepna-ah hoihtakin om in.

en: Unlike the other high priests, He does not need to offer sacrifices day after day, first for His own sins, and then for the sins of the people. He sacrificed for their sins once for all when He offered Himself.
zo: Siampi lianpen dangte in nisimin amau’ mawhna hangin biakna pia masa-in, tua ciangin midangte’ mawhna hangin a piak niloh bang hi loin, amah khatvei bek a kipiakna tawh a tawntung adingin a kimang paisuak ahi hi.

en: But when he asks, he must believe and not doubt, because he who doubts is like a wave of the sea, blown and tossed by the wind.
zo: Ahi zongin na nget uh ciangin hong pia takpi ding hi, ci-in muanna tawh na ngen un. A muanglah mite pen huih nunna lam peuhah a kinil kawikawi tuihualte tawh kibang lel hi.

en: Do not repay evil with evil or insult with insult, but with blessing, because to this you were called so that you may inherit a blessing.
zo: Hong bawlsiate siatna tawh thukkik loin hong samsia mite samsia kik kei unla, Pasian in note a hong sap lai-in thupha a hong piak dingin hong ciamsa ahih manin, hong siat bawlte thupha tawh na thukzaw un.

en: They will make war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will overcome them because He is Lord of lords and King of kings—and with Him will be His called, chosen, and faithful followers.”
zo: Amaute in Tuuno a sim ding uh hi. Ahi zongin Tuuno pen kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa ahih manin, amah le ama sap, a teel, citakin amah a zuite in tua kumpi sawmte a zogawp ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

en: No one in this house is greater than I am. My master has withheld nothing from me except you, because you are his wife. How then could I do such a wicked thing and sin against God?”
zo: Hih inn sungah kei sangin amah lianzaw lo hi. Nang, ama zi na hih manin, nang lobuang kei kiang panin amah in a kep tuam bangmah om lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in hih gitlohna lianpi bawlin Pasian’ tungah khial ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

en: you are to say, ‘It is the Passover sacrifice to the LORD, who passed over the houses of the Israelites in Egypt when He struck down the Egyptians and spared our homes.’” Then the people bowed down and worshiped.
zo: note in, ‘ Topa’ Paisanna hangin biakpiakna ahi hi. Amah in eite’ innkuante hong khawi-in Egypt mite a thah lai-in Egypt gam sungah Israel innkuante paisan hi,’ na ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Mite in a lu uh kunin Pasian a bia uh hi.

en: “You must not hate your brother in your heart. Rebuke your neighbor directly, so you will not share in his guilt.
zo: “Note in na lungsim sung uhah na sanggampa uh na mudah kei ding uh a, na vengte uh tawh thu na kituah lohna uh kikum khawmin na siangsak ding uh hi; tua hikeileh ama hangin khialhna na pua ding uh hi.

en: How can I curse those whom God has not cursed? How can I denounce those whom the LORD has not denounced?
zo: Pasian’ samsiat loh mite bangci samsiat ding ka hi hiam? Topa’ mawhsak loh mite bangci mawhsak ding ka hi hiam?

en: “Now therefore, fear the LORD and serve Him in sincerity and in truth. Get rid of the gods your fathers served beyond the River and in Egypt, and serve the LORD.
zo: “Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa zahtak unla, lungsim tak le thumanna tawh ama na sem un. Na pu na pate un Gun gal le Egypt gam sungah a biak uh pasian-te koihkhia unla, Topa’ na sem un.

en: “But Lord,” Gideon replied, “how can I save Israel? Indeed, my clan is the weakest in Manasseh, and I am the youngest in my father’s house.”
zo: Tua ciangin Gideon in ama kiangah, “Kong thum hi, Topa aw, Israel-te bangci hotkhiat zawh ding ka hi hiam? En in, Manasseh minam sungah keima behte a hat lo pen hi a, ka innkuan sung panin kei a neupen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

en: The LORD who delivered me from the paw of the lion and the paw of the bear will deliver me from the hand of this Philistine.” Saul said to David, “Go, and the LORD be with you.”
zo: Tua ciangin David in, “Humpinelkai khecin le vom khecin panin kei a hong honkhia Topa in hih Filistia-pa’ khutsung panin zong kei hong honkhia ding hi,” ci thuah lai hi. Tua ciangin Saul in David kiangah, “Pai in; Topa in nang hong ompih ta hen!” a ci hi.

en: Then David said to Abishai and all his servants, “Behold, my own son, my own flesh and blood, is trying to take my life. How much more, then, this Benjamite! Leave him alone and let him curse, for the LORD has told him to.
zo: Tua ciangin David in Abishai le a nasemte khempeuh kiangah, “En un, keima tapa mahmah in kei thah dingin hong zong hi; hih Benjamin mi in bangzahin tu-in hong zongzaw kan ding ahi hiam! Ama thu-in omsak un, amah hong samsiasak un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah a sawl hi kha ding hi.

en: When all Israel heard the verdict the king had given, they held the king in awe, because they saw that he had wisdom from God to administer justice.
zo: Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh in kumpipa’ piak thukhenna za uh hi. Thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in a om uh hi.

en: Now Naaman was commander of the army of the king of Aram. He was a great man in the sight of his master and highly regarded, because through him the LORD had given victory to Aram. He was a valiant soldier, but he had leprosy.
zo: Syria kumpipa’ galkap a uk Naaman pen kumpipa’ maipha a ngah ulianpi khat ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama hangin Syria mite gualzawhna pia hi. Amah a thahat a vanglian khat hi a, ahih hangin amah a phak ahi hi.

en: Wealth and honor come from You; You are the ruler of all things. In Your hands are strength and power to exalt and give strength to all.
zo: Hauhna le minphatna nangma kiang pan hong pai a, nangmah in na khempeuh tungah na uk hi. Na khut sungah vangliatna le minthanna om a, liatsakna ding le thakhauhsakna ding na khut sungah om hi.

en: And when he prayed to Him, the LORD was moved by his entreaty and listened to his plea. So He brought him back to Jerusalem and to his kingdom. Then Manasseh knew that the LORD is God.
zo: Amah in ama kiangah thu ngen a, tua ciangin Pasian in ama kutna saangin, a thumna a ngai hi. Amah in Jerusalem-ah amah paipih kikin a kumpi gam a piakik hi. Tua ciangin Topa pen Pasian ahihna Manasseh in a thei hi.

en: The people could not distinguish the sound of the shouts of joy from the sound of weeping, because the people made so much noise. And the sound was heard far away.
zo: Mite nakpitakin kiko ahih manin lungdamna awging, le kahna le thumna awgingte mite in khen thei lo uh hi. Gamlapi pek panin tua awgingte a kiza hi.

en: When all our enemies heard about this, all the surrounding nations were afraid and lost their self-confidence, because they realized that this work had been done with the help of our God.
zo: Ka galte un hih thu za-in, ka kiim uha om minam dangte in a theih uh ciangin lamdangsa a, kote’ Pasian’ huhna tawh hih nasep kizo ahihna a phawk uh hi.

en: On the thirteenth day of the twelfth month, the month of Adar, the king’s command and edict were to be carried out. On this day the enemies of the Jews had hoped to overpower them, but now the tables were turned and the Jews got the upper hand over those who hated them.
zo: A kha sawm le nihna ahi Adar kha a ni sawm le thum ni-in kumpipa’ thupiakna bangin sepkhiatna ding hun hong tung hi. Jew mite’ galte in gualzo dinga a ki-up ni teek pen amau a mudah mite’ tungah Jew mite a gualzawh ni ding hong hizaw hi.

en: In all this, Job did not sin by charging God with wrongdoing.
zo: Hih thu khempeuhah Job khial lo a, Pasian zong mawhsak lo hi.

en: May the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be pleasing in Your sight, O LORD, my Rock and my Redeemer.
zo: Topa, ka belh suangpi le keimah hong tankhia pa aw, ka kammal le ka lungsim ngaihsutnate nangma muhna-ah a sanhuai suaksak ta in!

en: He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will abide in the shadow of the Almighty.
zo: Sangpenpa’ liahna sung, Vanglianpa’ liim sungah a om mi khempeuh in

en: Above all else, guard your heart, for it is the wellspring of life.
zo: Na lungsim ngaihsutnate nuntakna nak hi a, na neihsa a manpha pen bangin na kep ding ahi hi.

en: Do not answer a fool according to his folly, or you will be like him yourself.
zo: Mihaite’ thudotna dawngdawng lecin nang zong amau mah bangin a hai na hi hi.

en: For with much wisdom comes much sorrow, and with more knowledge comes more grief.
zo: Pil semsem lehang kilunghimawh semsem a, tam thei semsem lehang hong gimsak semsem zawsop hi.

en: A voice of one calling: “In the wilderness prepare the way for the LORD; make straight in the desert a highway for our God.
zo: Awging khat in, “Gamlakah Topa ’ lampi sial unla, sehnel gam sungah i Pasian a’ ding lam lianpi khat a tangin bawl un.

en: No longer will a man teach his neighbor or a man his brother, saying, ‘Know the LORD,’ because they will all know Me, from the least of them to the greatest,” declares the LORD. “For I will forgive their iniquity and will remember their sin no more.”
zo: Kuamah in midangte le a sanggamte uh kiangah, ‘ Topa thei in,’ ci-in a kihilh nawn kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cihin-ah, amaute in a neupen panin a lianpen dongin, a vekpi-un kei a hong thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ khialhnate ka maisak ding a, amaute’ mawhnate zong phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Yet this I call to mind, and therefore I have hope:
zo: Ahi zongin ka phawk giugiau thu khat in lametna khat hong nei theisak hi.

en: So I prophesied as He commanded me, and breath entered them; they came to life and stood on their feet—a vast army.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin hong sawl bangin ka gen hi. Tua pumpite sungah hintheihna hu hong lut a, tua ciangin amaute hingin a khe-un hong ding uh hi. Galkap honpi khat zah pha-in tam mahmah uh hi.

en: The Lord our God is merciful and forgiving, even though we have rebelled against Him;
zo: Nang pen hehpihna tawh kidimin mawhna na maisak a, ahih hangin kote in nang ka hong langpan’ uh hi.

en: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death. Where, O death, are your plagues? Where, O grave, is your destruction? Compassion is hidden from My eyes.
zo: Leinuai-a misite’ omna-ah a pai nading uh panin honin, sih nading panin suaktasak ding ka hi hiam? Sihna aw, gimna na piakna-ah amaute ka hehpih kei hi. Leinuai-a misite’ gam aw, na suksiatna-ah amaute ka khasiat kei hi.

en: “Even now,” declares the LORD, “return to Me with all your heart, with fasting and weeping and mourning.”
zo: Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Tu mahmah nangawnin lungsim tak tawh kisik kikin, an tangin, kapin, thumna tawh kei kiangah hong paikik un.

en: Hate evil, love good, and establish justice in the gate. Perhaps the LORD God of Hosts will be gracious to the remnant of Joseph.
zo: Thusia mudahin thupha deih unla, thukhen zumah a manin thu khen un. Tua hileh Josef minam a suakta sunte tungah Topa, Vanglian Pasian hong thunuam khathei ding hi.

en: When God saw their actions—that they had turned from their evil ways—He relented from the disaster He had threatened to bring upon them.
zo: Pasian in amau’ hihnate mu a, a khialhna uh panin a kihei uh a muh ciangin kisik a, amau tungah hih dingin a cihsa siatna a tungsak nawn kei hi.

en: With what shall I come before the LORD and bow down before the exalted God? Shall I come before Him with burnt offerings, with calves a year old?
zo: Vantung Pasian, Topa biak nadingin bang va keng ding ka hi hiam? Amah biakna-in hal dingin bawngno thaute va paipih ding ka hi hiam?

en: O LORD, I have heard the report of You; I stand in awe, O LORD, of Your deeds. Revive them in our day; in our time make them known; in wrath remember mercy.
zo: Topa aw, nangma sepsa thute ka za a, lamdang ka sa mahmah hi. Na hih ngeisa na liante, kote’ hunin zong hong hih kik in. Na heh hun ciang nangawnin zong hehpihna lungsim hong nei in.

en: Gather yourselves together, yes, gather together, O shameful nation,
zo: A maizum thei lo minam aw, hoihtakin thu ngaihsun in.

en: This is what the LORD of Hosts says: “Consider your ways.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Vanglian Topa in ka hong cihin-ah: Tu laitak a na omzia uh limtakin ngaihsun un.

en: So tell the people that this is what the LORD of Hosts says: ‘Return to Me,’ declares the LORD of Hosts, ‘and I will return to you,’ says the LORD of Hosts.
zo: Ahi zongin tu-in kei kiangah hong ciahkik le-uhcin, kei zong note kiangah kong paikik ding hi.

en: But for you who revere My name, the sun of righteousness will rise with healing in its wings. And you will go out and leap like calves released from the stall.
zo: Ahi zongin ka thu a hong mang note tungah dikna ni hong taang ding a, tua in nizang bangin note tungah cidamna hong tun ding hi. Bawng khumna panin a kikhah bawngnote bangin suakta-in nuam na sa ding uh hi.

en: He is not here; He has risen, just as He said! Come, see the place where He lay.
zo: Hih lai-ah amah om nawn lo hi. A gensa bangin thokik khinta hi. Hong pai unla, amah a kisialna mun hong en un.

en: Then He said to them, “The Sabbath was made for man, not man for the Sabbath.
zo: Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Sabbath ni, mihingte’ phattuam nadingin a kibawl hi a, mihing pen Sabbath ni a phattuam nadingin a kibawl hi lo hi.

en: Today in the city of David a Savior has been born to you. He is Christ the Lord!
zo: Tuni-in David khuapi sungah, note a hong honkhia ding Khrih Topa a suak hi.

en: A third time He said to him, “Simon son of John, do you love Me?” Peter was grieved that Jesus asked him the third time, “Do you love Me?” He said, “Lord, You know all things; You know that I love You.” Jesus said to him, “Feed My sheep.
zo: Jesuh in a thumveina dong leuleu a, “Johan’ tapa Simon aw, kei na hong it hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Kei na hong it hiam?” ci-in thumvei tak a dotna hangin Peter zong a dah suak hi. Tua ahih manin, “Topa aw, nangmah in na khempeuh na thei a, nangmah ka hong itna thu zong na thei hi,” ci-in a dawn ciangin Jesuh in, “Ka tuute na kem in.

en: Repent, then, and turn to God, so that your sins may be wiped out, that times of refreshing may come from the Lord,
zo: Tua ahih ciangin na mawhnate uh hong sawpsiangsak theih nading, Topa kiang panin a hong pai lungsim nopna hun na ngah theih nading uh le note a dingin a sehsa Jesuh Khrih a hong sawltheih nadingin na mawhna uh kisik unla, Pasian kiang zuan un.

en: As it is written: “There is no one righteous, not even one;
zo: Lai Siangtho sungah zong, “Pasian’ muhna-ah mi man kuamah om lo a,

en: So, if you think you are standing firm, be careful that you don’t fall!
zo: Lungkip takin ka omzo hi, ci-in a kingaihsun mite a pukkhak loh nadingun kikem uh hen.

en: Remember this: Whoever sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and whoever sows generously will also reap generously.
zo: Note in na phawk ding uh thu panin: Khaici tawm a vawhte in tawm mah la ding a, tampi a vawhte in tampi mah la ding uh hi.

en: Since we live by the Spirit, let us keep in step with the Spirit.
zo: Kha Siangtho in eite hong nungtasak khinta ahih manin ama hong sawlna bangin eite a nungta ding ihi hi.

en: And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, with whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.
zo: Ni khat ni ciangin Pasian in note hong tatkhiat taktak nading thu a ciantakin hong lahna le Pasian’ neihsa na hihna uh hong ciamtehna-in Kha Siangtho hong pia ahih manin, tua Pasian’ Kha Siangtho na dahsak kei un.

en: Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,
zo: Mite’ nasem bangin kingaihsun loin, Pasian’ nasem bangin kingaihsun unla, na sep peuhpeuh uh lungsim takpi tawh lawpin sem un.

en: for you know very well that the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hong pai ding Ni pen zan a gutate bangin theihkholh lohin hong tung ding hi, ci-in note in teltakin na theihsa uh ahi hi.

en: In the name of the Lord Jesus Christ, we command you, brothers, to keep away from every brother who is idle and does not live according to the teaching you received from us.
zo: Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesuh Khrih min tawh kong sawlnop uh thu panin: Note tungah ka hong hilhsa uh thute a zui lo, a thadah gamtat thu uppih mite tawh na kikhawl kei un.

en: Do not be hasty in the laying on of hands, and do not share in the sins of others. Keep yourself pure.
zo: Topa’ na a sem dingin kipsakna-in khut nga-in thungetna pen kuama tungah zang mengmeng kei in. Midang a khialte tawh khialkhawm kha kei inla, siangtho takin na omtheih nadingin limtakin kikem in.

en: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days.
zo: Nitawp ni hun pen a lauhuai hun ahih ding lamtak phawk in.

en: He must hold firmly to the trustworthy message as it has been taught, so that he can encourage others by sound doctrine and refute those who oppose it.
zo: Upna bulpi tawh a kituak thute limtakin lenkip ding uh hi. Tua hileh thuhilhna man tawh midangte hanthawn thei ding uh a, thuman a nial mite’ khialhna zong laktel thei ding uh hi.

en: how shall we escape if we neglect such a great salvation? This salvation was first announced by the Lord, was confirmed to us by those who heard Him,
zo: Tua ahih manin a thupi mahmah hih hotkhiatna thudon loin i om leh suahtakna om thei ngei lo ding hi. A masa-in Topa mahmah in hotkhiatna thu hong pulak a, tua thu a za mite in thuman ahihna thu eite tungah hong gen leuleu uh hi.

en: But He gives us more grace. This is why it says: “God opposes the proud, but gives grace to the humble.”
zo: Lai Siangtho in, “Pasian in a kihisakte nial a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” a cih mah bangin Pasian’ hong hehpihna lianzaw hi.

en: Beloved, do not be surprised at the fiery trial that has come upon you to test you, as though something strange were happening to you.
zo: Ka itte aw, note’ upna hong kize-etna-in gimna haksate na thuak manun a thu lamdangpi-in ngaihsun kei unla, na lungkham ngaihsut kei un.

en: if this is so, then the Lord knows how to rescue the godly from trials and to hold the unrighteous for the day of judgment, while continuing their punishment.
zo: Tua ahih manin Topa in tua bang mihoihte a gimna uh panin suakta sakin, tua bang migilote Thukhen Ni hun dongin gimna pia-in a koihcip theih nading siamna a nei hi.

en: Beloved, do not believe every spirit, but test the spirits to see whether they are from God, because many false prophets have gone out into the world.
zo: Ka it lawmte aw, kha ka nei a ci mi khempeuh’ thugen um kei unla, tua thute Pasian kiang pan mah ahi hiam, ci-in kantel un. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah kamsang a kineihkhem tampi hong om khinta hi.

en: Behold, He is coming with the clouds, and every eye will see Him—even those who pierced Him. And all the tribes of the earth will mourn because of Him. So shall it be! Amen.
zo: En un, amah hong paita ding a, meiipi tawh hong tonkhawm ding hi. Teipi tawh amah a sunte a kipan mi khempeuh in a mu ding uh hi. Amah a hong pai ciangin leitung mi khempeuh lau-in a kap ding uh hi. Hih ka gen bangin hong piang takpi ding hi. Amen.

en: I testify to everyone who hears the words of the prophecy of this book: If anyone adds to them, God will add to him the plagues described in this book.
zo: Keimah Johan in hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a za mi khempeuh ka hong hilhkholh nopna panin: A thu a behlap na om uhleh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh gimnate note tungah hong behlap ding a,

en: So she called the name of the LORD who spoke to her: “You are the God who sees me,” for she said, “Here I have seen the One who sees me!”
zo: Tua ahih ciangin ama tungah thu a gen Topa pen, “Nang, a mu thei Pasian khat na hi hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Keimah in Pasian mu khin taktakin, amah ka muh khit ciangin hing lai hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

en: And the LORD said, “I will cause all My goodness to pass in front of you, and I will proclaim My name, the LORD, in your presence. I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy, and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion.
zo: Amah in, “Keima hoihna khempeuh na mai-ah ka paisak ding a, na mai-ah keima min, ‘ Topa ’ cihna ka pulak ding hi. Ka diknopna mite tungah ka dik ding a, ka hehpihnop mite ka hehpih ding hi.

en: Search me, O God, and know my heart; test me and know my anxious thoughts.
zo: Pasian aw, kei hong entel inla, ka lungsim hong thei in. Kei hong sit inla, ka ngaihsutnate hong thei in.

en: Anxiety in a man’s heart weighs it down, but a good word cheers it up.
zo: Lunghihmawhna in lungkhamna piangsak a, kampau hoih in mi lungdamsak hi.

en: Trust in the LORD forever, for the LORD, the LORD, is the Rock eternal.
zo: Topa Pasian in eite khempeuh hong hu tawntung ahih manin Topa muang tawntung un.

en: Heal me, O LORD, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for You are my praise.
zo: Topa aw, hong damsak lecin ka natna teng bei ding a, hong honkhia lecin kei ka suakta ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen ka hong phatpa na hi hi.

en: “The King will reply, ‘Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of Mine, you did for Me.’
zo: Tua ciangin Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah kong genin-ah: Hih ka sanggamte a neupen khat nangawn na limbawl uh ciangin kei tungah a hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ ci-in a dawng ding hi.

en: In My Father’s house are many rooms. If it were not so, I would have told you. I am going there to prepare a place for you.
zo: Note’ om nading mun a bawlkhol dingin a pai ding ka hi hi. Ka Pa’ inn sungah om nading mun tampi om hi. A om lo ding hileh hih bangin thu ka hong gen kei ding hi.

en: Love does no harm to its neighbor. Therefore love is the fulfillment of the law.
zo: Midangte a it mi peuhmah in amaute tungah siatna bawl het lo ahih manin itna i neih ciangin Thukham buppi a zui khinta ihi hi.

en: But by the grace of God I am what I am, and His grace to me was not without effect. No, I worked harder than all of them—yet not I, but the grace of God that was with me.
zo: Tua bang hitaseleh Pasian’ hehpihna tawh tu-a ciangah ka om a, kei tungah a hong piak ama hehpihna a mawkna suak lo hi. Sawltak dangte khempeuh sangin na nakpitakin ka sem zawsop hi. Tua ka sepzawhna pen keima hatna hang hi loin Pasian’ hong hehpihna hang ahi hi.

en: for all of you who were baptized into Christ have clothed yourselves with Christ.
zo: Khrih sungah a kiphum note in Khrih’ pianzia a nei khinta na hi uh hi.

en: making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
zo: Tuhun pen hun hoih lo hun ahih manin na hun neih khempeuh uh a hoih lamin zang un.

en: By faith he left Egypt, not fearing the king’s anger; he persevered because he saw Him who is invisible.
zo: Moses pen kumpipa’ heh ding lau hetloin Egypt gam panin paikhia a, a kimu thei lo Pasian a mu bang keekin a nungkik hetlohna zong a upna hang mah ahi hi.

en: but each one is tempted when he is dragged away and enticed by his own evil desire.
zo: Mi khatpeuh in ama deihna zui-in a gamtat ciangin mawhna a piangsak ahi hi.

en: And the God of all grace, who called you to His eternal glory in Christ, after you have suffered a little while, will Himself restore you and make you strong, firm, and steadfast.
zo: Tawlkhat na thuak khit uh ciangin, Khrih tawh na kipawlna hangun tawntung minthanna a ngah dingin note a hong sam, hehpihna kicingin a nei Pasian in note a cingtaakin hong bawl ding a, kipna, thahatna, bulkip kician hong pia ding hi.

en: Nothing impure will ever enter it, nor will anyone who does what is shameful or deceitful, but only those whose names are written in the Lamb’s book of life.
zo: Ahi zongin a siang lo, a hoih loin a gamta mi, zuau a gen mite kuamah lut thei lo ding uh a, a nungta mite a kigelhna Tuuno laibu sungah a min a omte bek tua khuapi sungah lutthei ding uh hi.

en: And God said to him, “Though your name is Jacob, you will no longer be called Jacob; your name will be Israel.” So God named him Israel.
zo: Pasian in ama kiangah, “Na min Jakob ahi hi. Ahi zongin tu-a kipanin nangma min pen Jakob kici nawn lo ding a, Israel, hong kici ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Israel, kici hi.

en: I will take you as My own people, and I will be your God. Then you will know that I am the LORD your God, who brought you out from under the yoke of the Egyptians.
zo: Keima mi dingin note kong la ding a, kei pen note’ Pasian ka hi ding hi. Egypt mite’ sila hihna panin note a hong paikhiatpih pa, Topa na Pasian uh ka hihna note in na thei ding uh hi.

en: “If one of your countrymen becomes poor and is unable to support himself among you, you must help him as you would an alien or temporary resident, so he can continue to live among you.
zo: “Na sanggampa uh zawngin, note bangin amah a kivak zawh kei leh, note in amah na vak ding uh hi. Khualmi le peemta bangin amah pen note tawh hong om ding hi.

en: Whenever the cloud lifted from above the Tent, the Israelites would set out, and wherever the cloud settled, there the Israelites would camp.
zo: Puanbuk tung san panin meii a kilaktoh khit ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh a, meii a kiphuhna munah Israel mite in giahphual a sat uh hi.

en: Oh, that their hearts would be inclined to fear Me and keep all My commandments always, so that it might go well with them and their children forever!
zo: Amaute le a suan a khakte uh a nopsak tawntung theih nadingun keimah zahtak ding le ka thupiak khempeuh zuih ding hih bang ngaihsutna nei tawntung le-uh ka deih ahi hi.

en: Only be strong and very courageous; be careful to act in accordance with all the law that My servant Moses commanded you. Do not turn from it to the right or to the left, that you may have success wherever you go.
zo: Thahatin hang inla, ka nasem Moses in nang hong piak thukhamte khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat ding limtakin ngaihsun in. Na paina peuhah hoihtakin na lamzan’ theih nadingin tuate khat zong pelh kei in.

en: In those days Israel had no king; everyone did what was right in his own eyes.
zo: Tua hun lai-in Israel-te sungah kumpi om lo a, amau’ hoihsak bang ciatin mi khempeuh a gamta uh hi.

en: Talk no more so very proudly; let no arrogance come from your mouth, for the LORD is a God of knowledge, and by Him deeds are weighed.
zo: Tua bangin kiphatsakna tawh pau nawn kei inla, na kamsung pan kihihsakna gingkhiasak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen a thei Pasian hi a, amah in gamtatnate a tawi khai hi.

en: “Saul and Jonathan—beloved and delightful, they were not parted in life or in death. They were swifter than eagles, they were stronger than lions.
zo: “Saul le Jonathan, ki-it uh a, it-huai uh! A sih a hinin amaute kikhen lo a, muvanlai sangin zaptel zaw uh a, humpinelkai sangin thahat zaw uh hi.

en: The seventh time the servant reported, “A cloud as small as a man’s hand is rising from the sea.” So Elijah said, “Go and tell Ahab, ‘Hitch up your chariot and go down before the rain stops you.’”
zo: A sagihveina ciangin amah in, “Khuttum cia bang meii tawmno khat tuipi panin hong kaito hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Paito-in Ahab kiangah, ‘Guah in hong khak kha ding ahih manin na leeng kithawi in la paisuk in,’ va ci in,” a ci hi.

en: Then he took the cloak that had fallen from Elijah, struck the water, and said, “Where now is the LORD, the God of Elijah?” When he had struck the water, it divided to the right and to the left, and Elisha crossed over.
zo: Tua ciangin amah in ama tung panin a kiakhia Elijah’ puan la-in tui sat a, “Elijah’ Pasian, Topa koi-ah om na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in tui a sat khit ciangin a pang khat le a pang langkhatah a tui kikhen hi. Tua ciangin Elisha pai-in a galkah hi.

en: Then King David said to the whole assembly, “My son Solomon, the one whom God has chosen, is young and inexperienced, and the task is great, for this palace is not for man, but for the LORD God.
zo: Tua ciangin Kumpi David in a kikhawm khempeuhte kiangah, “Pasian in amah bek a teelsa ka tapa Solomon pen khangno-in pumpi tawh sinna om nai lo a, nasep ding pen lian mahmah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih biakinn lianpi pen mihing a’ ding hi lo a, Topa Pasian a’ ding ahi hi.

en: You will not have to fight this battle. Take up your positions, stand firm, and see the salvation of the LORD on your behalf, O Judah and Jerusalem. Do not be afraid or discouraged. Go out to face them tomorrow, and the LORD will be with you.’”
zo: Note in hih kidona-ah na do ding uh kisam lo hi. Judah gam mite le Jerusalem khuamite aw, na panmun uh la-in taang loin ding unla, note’ tangin Topa’ gualzawhna mu un,’ ci hi. Kihta kei unla, lungkia kei un. Zing ciangin amaute a do-in pai un. Topa in note hong ompih ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Whoever among you belongs to His people, may his God be with him, and may he go up to Jerusalem in Judah and build the house of the LORD, the God of Israel, the God who is in Jerusalem.
zo: Note lakah ama mi peuhmah a Pasian in ompih hen la, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua-ah paito hen la, Israel Pasian, Topa’ biakinn lamkik hen. Amah pen Jerusalem-ah a om Pasian ahi hi.

en: Then I commanded the Levites to purify themselves and to go and guard the gates in order to keep the Sabbath day holy. Remember me for this also, O my God, and show mercy to me according to Your great loving devotion.
zo: Tua ciangin Sabbath ni a siangtho-in a omsak theih nadingun amaute kisiansuah tawmin kongpite hong cin nadingun Levi mite ka sawl hi. Ka Pasian aw, hih thu-ah zong hong phawk inla, na itna tawh kizui-in siatna panin kei hong pengsak in.

en: “All the king’s officials and the people of the royal provinces know that for any man or woman who approaches the king in the inner court without being summoned, there is but one law: that he be put to death. The only exception is for the king to extend the gold scepter to him and spare his life.
zo: “Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin sap lohpi-in mi khat peuhpeuh kumpipa’ omna inn sungah a va lut leh upadi khat bek om a, tua pen, thah ding ahi hi; kumpipa in ama lamah a kham kumpi ciangkhut a na zan leh tua mipa suakta bek ding ahihna thu kumpipa’ nasemte le ama ukna gam mi khempeuh in a theih ciat uh ahi hi. Tu-in kumpipa kiangah a pai dingin hong kisap loh zawh ni sawmthum bang pha ta hi,” a ci hi.

en: “Listen to this, Job; stop and consider God’s wonders.
zo: “Job aw, tawlkhat khawlin ngai inla, Pasian’ bawlsa na lamdangte ngaihsun dih in.

en: Those who know Your name will trust in You, for You, LORD, have never forsaken those who seek You.
zo: Topa aw, nang a hong zongte nusia lo na hih manin, na min a theite in nang hong muang uh hi.

en: Teach me Your way, O LORD, that I may walk in Your truth. Give me an undivided heart, that I may fear Your name.
zo: Topa aw, nang tungah hong thumanin nangma lampi ka zuih theih nadingin kei hong hilh inla, nangma min a zahtakte tawh keima lungsim pumkhat hong bangsak in.

en: Listen, my son, to your father’s instruction, and do not forsake your mother’s teaching.
zo: Ka ta aw, na pa’ hong thuhilhna hoihtakin zui inla, na nu’ hong thugente ngai in.

en: A good name is more desirable than great riches; to be esteemed is better than silver or gold.
zo: Hauhna sangin min hoihna deihhuai zaw a, kham le ngun sangin mi’ hong thusimna deihhuai zaw hi.

en: Do not be quick with your mouth, do not be hasty in your heart to utter anything before God. For God is in heaven and you are on earth, so let your words be few.
zo: Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau inla, Pasian’ tungah thu mawk ciampak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau ding a kilawm zahval pau kei in.

en: Woe to those who call evil good and good evil, who turn darkness to light and light to darkness, who replace bitter with sweet and sweet with bitter.
zo: A phate sia ci-in, a siate pha ci a, khuavak dingin khuamial koihin, khuamial dingin khuavak koih a, a khum dingin a kha koihin, a kha dingin a khum a koihte in gimna ngah tahen.

en: Therefore this is what the LORD says: “If you repent, I will restore you that you may serve Me; and if you utter worthy, not worthless, words, you will be My spokesman. Let this people turn to you, but you must not turn to them.
zo: Tua ahih manin Topa in, “Na hong kilehkik leh kong koihna ngei-ah kong koihkik ding a, ka na na sem kik ding hi. Thu manpha lo gen loin thu manpha bek na gen leh, ka kamsang dingin ka hong zang ding hi. Nang kiangah amaute hong pai ding uh a, nang na hih leh amau’ kiangah na pai kei ding hi.

en: It is good for a man to bear the yoke while he is young.
zo: Na khangno lai-in thuakzawh hat ding kisin leteh hoihpen hi.

en: For I take no pleasure in the death of anyone, declares the Lord GOD. So repent and live!
zo: Kuama sih ding ka deih kei hi. Tua ahih manin na mawh gamtatna uh khawlin nungta un, Topa Pasian in ci hi,” a hong ci hi.

en: “As I looked, thrones were set in place, and the Ancient of Days took His seat. His clothing was as white as snow, and the hair of His head was like pure wool. His throne was flaming with fire, and its wheels were all ablaze.
zo: Ka et laitakin kumpi tokhomte a hong kikoih hi. A nungta tawntung mipa tua tokhomte khat tungah a tu hi. A puante vuk bangin ngo a, a samte tuumul hoih tawh a kibang hi. A tokhom pen meikuang leengpei tungah kinga-in mei kuang zuazua a,

en: Whoever is wise, let him understand these things. Whoever is discerning, let him know them. For the ways of the LORD are right, and the righteous walk in them, but transgressors stumble in them.
zo: Mipil, thu ngaihsun theite in hih thute theitelin limtakin ciamteh tahen. Topa’ lampi tang mahmah a, a thutang mite in tua lampi a tawn uh hi. Mawhneite in tua lampi tawn lo ahih manin a puk uh hi.

en: Do not be afraid, O land; be glad and rejoice. Surely the LORD has done great things.
zo: “Lote aw, lau nawn kei unla, lungdam kipakin om un. Topa in note a dingin a lianpi hong bawlsak zo hi.

en: And the LORD said to me, “What do you see, Amos?” “A plumb line,” I replied. Then the Lord said, “Behold, I am setting a plumb line among My people Israel; I will not spare them again.
zo: Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, “Amos aw, bang na mu hiam?” hong ci hi. Kei zong dawngin, “Khaukhai khat mu ing,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “En in, ka mi Israel-te a khialhna uh a kitheih nadingin hih khaukhai tawh ka en hi. Amaute gim ka piak ding ka khiakik nawn kei ding hi.

en: But as for me, I watch in hope for the LORD, I wait for God my Savior; my God will hear me.
zo: Ahi zongin ke’n ahihleh Topa mah ka en ding a, kei hong suaktasak Pasian ka ngak ding hi. Ka Pasian in ka thu hong ngai ding hi.

en: Then the LORD answered me: “Write down the vision and make it plain on tablets so that a herald may run with it.
zo: Tua ciangin Topa in hih bangin hong dawng a, “Nangmah ka hong muhsak thu khempeuh a simnop mahmah dingin tungman peek tungah gelh in.

en: Sing, O Daughter of Zion; shout aloud, O Israel! Be glad and rejoice with all your heart, O Daughter of Jerusalem!
zo: Zion tanu aw, nakpitakin la sa inla, Israel aw, lungdamin kiko in. Jerusalem tanu aw, na lungsim khempeuh tawh lungdam in.

en: The angel said to those who were standing before him, “Take off his filthy clothes.” Then he said to Joshua, “See, I have taken away your iniquity, and I will clothe you with rich vestments.”
zo: Vantung mi in ama sawltak van midangte kiangah, “Hih mipa’ silh a puan ninte suahkhiatsak un,” ci-in thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin vantungmi in Joshua kiangah, “Na mawhna teng kong paihkhiatsak khin a, tu-in na silh dingin puan thak ka hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Bring the full tithe into the storehouse, so that there may be food in My house. Test Me in this,” says the LORD of Hosts, “and see if I will not throw open the floodgates of heaven and pour out so much blessing that you will not have room enough for it.
zo: Ka biakinn-ah an a om theih nadingin sawm-ah-khat a kimin hong paipih un. Kei hong ze-et un; vantung kongkhakte hongin, note a dingin na hoih tampi kong piakna na mu ding uh hi.

en: “Come, follow Me,” Jesus said, “and I will make you fishers of men.”
zo: Jesuh in amaute kiangah, “Kei hong zui un; nga mat bangin pawl tampi a ngah thei mi kong suaksak ding hi,” ci hi.

en: Then, because so many people were coming and going that they did not even have a chance to eat, He said to them, “Come with Me by yourselves to a quiet place and get some rest.”
zo: Mi a ciah leh a kuan kiphamat uh ahih manin Jesuh le a nungzuite in annek nading hun nangawn nei man lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin Jesuh in, “Ei guak i om theih nading mun khatah paikhia ni; tua lai-ah na tawlnga thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

en: The good man brings good things out of the good stored up in his heart, and the evil man brings evil things out of the evil stored up in his heart. For out of the overflow of the heart, the mouth speaks.
zo: Mihoih pa in a lungsim sunga thuhoih omteng hong suahkhia a, migilo pa in a lungsim sunga a gitlohna teng hong suahkhia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite pen amau’ lungsim sunga a om bangbang a hong paukhia uh ahi hi.

en: but whoever drinks the water I give him will never thirst. Indeed, the water I give him will become in him a spring of water welling up to eternal life.”
zo: ahi zongin keima piak ding tui a dawn khempeuh dangtak kik nawn lo ding uh hi. Tua ka piak tui a dawnte sungah nuntakna tuinak piang ding a, a nungtasak paisuak ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: For I am with you, and no one will attack and harm you, for I have many people in this city.”
zo: Hih khua sungah keima mi tampi om a, nang hong ompih ka hih manin kuamah in nang bangmah hong cih lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: Accept him whose faith is weak, without passing judgment on disputable matters.
zo: Upna neu mite pawlbawl unla, na ngaihsutna uh a kituah kei leh zong mawhsak kei un.

en: To the weak I became weak, to win the weak. I have become all things to all men so that by all possible means I might save some.
zo: Upna neu mite lakah na ka sep ciangin amaute ka ngahzawh nadingin amaute mah bangin ka gamta hi. Tua ahih manin ahih theihna lam peuhpeuhah mite ka ngahzawh nadingin mi khempeuh’ ngeina ka zui hi.

en: We demolish arguments and every pretension that sets itself up against the knowledge of God, and we take captive every thought to make it obedient to Christ.
zo: Mite’ ngaihsutna a man lote ka thalnial gawpzo uh a, Pasian’ thu theih nading a khaktan thei nate ka susiagawp uh a, mi khempeuh’ ngaihsutna zo gawpin Khrih’ thu a mang dingin ka bawl uh hi.

en: Each one should test his own actions. Then he can take pride in himself, without comparing himself to somebody else,
zo: A kuamah peuh in ama gamtatna ciat entel henla, kisialh nading a om leh ama gamtatna siksanin kisial henla, midangte tawh ki-ettehin kisial kei hen.

en: to equip the saints for the work of ministry, for building up the body of Christ,
zo: Hih nasep a tuamtuamte khempeuh a sem dingin Pasian’ mi khempeuh kigingkhol sakin Khrih a dingin na semin Khrih pumpi a khansak theihna ding deihna ahi hi.

en: I am torn between the two: I desire to depart and be with Christ, which is better by far;
zo: Hih thu nih khentat hak ka sa mahmah hi. Kei a dingin hoihzaw thampek ahih manin leitung pumpi si-in Khrih tawh omkhawm ding ka ut hi.

en: My purpose is that they may be encouraged in heart and united in love, so that they may have the full riches of complete understanding, in order that they may know the mystery of God, namely, Christ,
zo: Note, lungsim hanna tawh kidimin, thu a man taktakin na theihna hangun lungkip takin omin, itna tawh pumkhat na suahtheih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua hileh Pasian’ thusim ahi Khrih mahmah na thei ding uh hi.

en: But since we belong to the day, let us be sober, putting on faith and love as a breastplate, and the hope of salvation as a helmet.
zo: Ahi zongin eite pen khuavak gamtatna a nei sun khuavak mi ihih manin pilvang ni. Awmdal bangin upna le itna bulhin, siklukhu bangin i lamet hotkhiatna khu ni.

en: not to become easily unsettled or alarmed by some prophecy, report, or letter supposed to have come from us, saying that the day of the Lord has already come.
zo: Topa’ hong pai ding ni hong tung khinta hi, ci-a thu kigenna hangin lunghimawhin lungmangin om kei un. Thuhilh khat peuhpeuh in hih bang thu hong genkha thei ding a, tua thu pen kote’ gen leh gelh hi, ci-in zong genkha ding uh hi.

en: Likewise, I want women to adorn themselves with proper clothing, with modesty and self-control, not with braided hair, gold, pearls, or expensive clothes,
zo: Tua mah bangin numeite zong a kilawm a kituak bekin kizemin kipuahin, sam khawng a uanglua-in bawl loin, a khengvalin kizepna a tuamtuamte zang loin,

en: But as for you, continue in what you have learned and have become convinced of, because you know those from whom you learned it,
zo: Ahi zongin nang na hih leh na theihsa na upsa thute ah kip paisuak in. Nang tungah thu hong hilhte kua mi ahi hiam cih na theihsa hi a,

en: Teach the older men to be temperate, worthy of respect, self-controlled, and sound in faith, in love, and in endurance.
zo: Pasal khanghamte a kilawm a kituakin a omtheih nading, thu ngaihsun thei mi ahih nading, a kikemzo mite ahih theih nading, upna man a neihtheih nading, itna man a neihtheih nading uh le a manin lungkipin a thuakzawh nadingun na gen in.

en: No discipline seems pleasant at the time, but painful. Later on, however, it produces a harvest of righteousness and peace for those who have been trained by it.
zo: Thuhilhna tawh gim hong kipiak ciangin nuam kisa hetloin na kisa mahmah sam a, ahi zongin tua thuhilhna a mangzote in thuman nuntakna hangin nopsakna thaman a nung ngah uh hi.

en: Above all, my brothers, do not swear—not by heaven or by earth or by anything else. Let your “Yes” be yes, and your “No,” no, or you will be condemned.
zo: Hih thute khempeuh banah, sanggamte aw, thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh ciangin kiciam se kei un. Vantung ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh tawh ahi zongin kiciam kei un. Pasian’ thukhenna na thuakkhak loh nadingun a hite, “Hi,” ci lel unla, a hilote, “Hilo,” na ci lel un.

en: Show proper respect to everyone: Love the brotherhood of believers, fear God, honor the king.
zo: Mi khempeuh zahtak bawlin thu uppih mite na it unla, Pasian zahtak bawlin kumpipa zong na zahtak un.

en: If they have escaped the corruption of the world by knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ and are again entangled in it and overcome, they are worse off at the end than they were at the beginning.
zo: I Topa le Honpa Jesuh Khrih theihna hangin leitung siatna sung panin suakta khin napi-un, leitung siatna-ah awk kikin a lelte pen, a masa a pianzia uh sangin a nunung a pianzia uh siahuaizaw hi.

en: And this is the promise that He has promised us—eternal life.
zo: Khrih in eite tungah piak dingin a hong ciamsa thu pen hih nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.

en: To him who overcomes and does My will to the end, I will give authority over the nations.
zo: A gualzo, a tawp dongin keima deihna bangin a gamtazo mite tungah, keimah in ka Pa tung panin ka ngah vangliatnate mah ka pia ding hi. Minam dangte tungah ukna a neih nading uh aana ka pia ding a, leibeel satkhap bangin sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte satgawp ding uh hi.

en: But the cowardly, the unbelieving, the vile, the murderers, the sexually immoral, those who practice magic arts, the idolaters and all liars—their place will be in the fiery lake of burning sulfur. This is the second death.”
zo: Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate, le zuaugente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

en: So Abraham called that place The LORD Will Provide. And to this day it is said, “On the mountain of the LORD it will be provided.”
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Abraham in tua mun pen, “ Topa in hong sik hi,” ci-in min phuak a, tuni dongin Topa’ mual tungah hong kisik hi, a kici hi.

en: “Honor your father and your mother, so that you may live long in the land the LORD your God is giving you.
zo: “ Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un.

en: Taste and see that the LORD is good; blessed is the man who takes refuge in Him.
zo: Topa tawh kikhawl phot unla, ama hoihna thei un! Amah a beel mite mi lungdam ahi uh hi.

en: He who walks with the wise grows wise, but a companion of fools suffers harm.
zo: Mipil tawh kikhawl lecin na pil ding a, mihai tawh kikhawl lecin gimna na thuak ding hi.

en: The LORD will guide you always; He will satisfy your needs in a sun-scorched land and will strengthen your frame. You will be like a well-watered garden, like a spring whose waters never fail.
zo: Tua ciangin note lam kong lak tawntung ding a, na hoihte tawh kong lungkimsak ding hi. A cidam a thahatin kong omsak ding hi. Tui tampi a ngah tawntung huan, a kang ngei lo ciktui tawh na kibang ding uh hi.

en: Also, seek the peace and prosperity of the city to which I have carried you into exile. Pray to the LORD for it, because if it prospers, you too will prosper.”
zo: Note salin kong koihna khuapi’ phattuamna ding bawl unla, tua khuapi a dingin Topa’ tungah thu ngetsak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua khuapi in phattuamna ngah leh no zong phattuamna a ngah mah na hi uh hi.

en: In the same way, let your light shine before men, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
zo: Midangte in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantungah a om na Pa uh min a phat theih nadingun mite mai-ah na gamtat hoihna uh khuavak bangin na kilangsak un.

en: Then Jesus told His disciples a parable to show them that they should always pray and not give up.
zo: Tua ciangin amaute in thu ngen tawntungin a lungkiat ngei loh nading uh a hilh nopna-in Jesuh in a nungzuite kiangah thugentehna khat gen a,

en: You did not choose Me, but I chose you and appointed you to go and bear fruit—fruit that will last. Then the Father will give you whatever you ask in My name.
zo: Note in kei na hong teel kei uh a, ahi zongin keimah in note ka hong teel a, note va pai-in a kimang tawntung ding gah a gah dingin ka hong seh hi. Tua ahih manin keima min suangin Pa kiangah na nget peuhpeuh uh hong pia ding hi.

en: Rejoice with those who rejoice; mourn with those who mourn.
zo: A lungdam mite lungdampih unla, a dah mite dahpih un.

en: Do everything in love.
zo: Na sepna khempeuh uhah ki-itna tawh na gamta un.

en: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not be encumbered once more by a yoke of slavery.
zo: Khrih in eite hong khahkhiat khitna hangin mi suaktate hi khinta ihih manin tua suahtakna thu-ah kipin om unla, sila va suakkik nawn kei un.

en: Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.
zo: Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.

en: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
zo: Khrih in a hong piak vangliatna tawh hihte khempeuh nawkzawh nading thahatna a nei ka hi hi.

en: Let us then approach the throne of grace with confidence, so that we may receive mercy and find grace to help us in our time of need.
zo: Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huh dingin hehpihna le dikna thupha i ngahtheih nadingin, kimuanna lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.

en: If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.
zo: Pilna kisam na om uhleh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi.

en: He Himself bore our sins in His body on the tree, so that we might die to sin and live for righteousness. “By His stripes you are healed.”
zo: Eite, mawhna lamah misi bangin, thuman lamah nungta-in i gamtat theih nadingin Khrih mahmah in eite’ mawhna ama pumpi mahmah tawh singlamteh tungah a pua hi. Ama liamna hangin note in damna na ngah uh hi.

en: Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears My voice and opens the door, I will come in to him and dine with him, and he with Me.
zo: Kongkhakah dingin kong ka hong kiu hi. Ka aw za-in kong hong honte kiangah lutin an ka nekhawm ding uh hi.

en: And not only that, but we also rejoice in our sufferings, because we know that suffering produces perseverance;
zo: Haksatna i thuak laitak nangawnin i lungdam veve hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh haksatna in thuakzawh hatna piangsak a,

en: In the same way, the Spirit helps us in our weakness. For we do not know what to pray for as we ought, but the Spirit Himself intercedes for us with groanings too deep for words.
zo: Tua ahih manin eite bangzahin ginalo hitalehang eite a hong huh dingin Kha Siangtho a hong pai hi. Eite in a kilawm bangin thunget ding nangawn i thei kei a, ahi zongin Kha Siangtho mah in tauna tawh eite a dingin a hong thumsak hi.

en: Furthermore, it is required of stewards that they be found faithful.
zo: Nasem i cih mite pen a topa uh tungah citakin a thuman ding uh kisam hi.

en: Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.
zo: Kiniamkhiatin, thunemin, lungduai-in om tawntung un. Khatlekhat kihuhna tawh na ki-itna uh kilangsak un.

en: Bear with each other and forgive any complaint you may have against one another. Forgive as the Lord forgave you.
zo: Note lakah khatlekhat a kilungkim lo na om uh ciangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh kimaisakin na kihuh ciat un. Topa in note’ mawhna hong maisak bangin note zong khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ding uh hi.

en: Give thanks in all circumstances, for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.
zo: bangbang hong piang taleh na lungdamna uh Pasian tungah ko tawntung un. Khrih Jesuh tawh kipawlin na nuntakna sung uhah hih bangzia-in na om ding uh Pasian in a hong deih ahi hi.

en: But when you pray, go into your inner room, shut your door, and pray to your Father, who is unseen. And your Father, who sees what is done in secret, will reward you.
