zo: Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu-in ciah un. Anlim tuilim ne-in thadim unla, a nei zo lote zong va kholh un; bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa a dingin tuni pen biakna ni siangtho ni ahi hi; dah kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ hong piak lungdamna in note hong thahatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: and said: “Naked I came from my mother’s womb, and naked I will return. The LORD gave and the LORD has taken away. Blessed be the name of the LORD.”
zo: Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka nu sung panin guaktangin ka suak a, guaktang mahin ka ciahkik ding hi. Topa in hong pia a, Topa mah in hong lakik hi. Topa’ min kiphat ta hen,” a ci hi.

en: So teach us to number our days, that we may present to You a heart of wisdom.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin pilna lungsim ka ngah theih nadingun ka nuntak hun uh a tomlam ka theih nadingun hong hilh in.

en: As iron sharpens iron, so one man sharpens another.
zo: Sik in sik mah hiamsak thei a, mi in midang pilsak thei hi.

en: When all has been heard, the conclusion of the matter is this: Fear God and keep His commandments, because this is the whole duty of man.
zo: Hih thute khempeuh banah gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipiansakna a thu bulpi pen in: Pasian zahtakna le a thupiakte manna ahi hi.

en: “Come now, let us reason together,” says the LORD. “Though your sins are like scarlet, they will be as white as snow; though they are as red as crimson, they will be like wool.
zo: Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Tu-in hong pai unla, thu kikumkhawm ni. Na mawhnate uh puansan a bat hangin vuk bangin hong ngo ding hi. Na mawhnate uh si bangin a san hangin tuumul bangin hong kang ding hi.

en: “But this is the covenant I will make with the house of Israel after those days, declares the LORD. I will put My law in their minds and write it on their hearts. I will be their God, and they will be My people.
zo: Ahih hangin Topa in kong cihin-ah, tua hun hong tun ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: Amaute’ sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute’ lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute pen keima mite ahi ding uh hi.

en: I will give you a new heart and put a new spirit in you; I will remove from you your heart of stone and give you a heart of flesh.
zo: Note sungah lungtang thak le lungsim thak kong guan ding a, na suang lungtang uh hong lakkhiatsakin mihing lungtang kong guan ding hi.

en: In the days of those kings, the God of heaven will set up a kingdom that will never be destroyed, nor will it be left to another people. It will crush all those kingdoms and bring them to an end, but it will itself endure forever.
zo: Tua kumpite a maan laitakun vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngei lo ding kumpi gam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpi gam kuamah in zo zo lo ding a, tua gam in gamdang khempeuhte zogawpin a kip tawntung ding hi.

en: “Blessed are the poor in spirit, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
zo: “Kha thu lamah zawngkhal a kisate sungah vantung ki-ukna thu om ahih manin thupha ngah mi ahi uh hi.

en: So then, this is how you should pray: ‘Our Father in heaven, hallowed be Your name,
zo: Tua ahih manin thu na nget uh ciangin hih bangin na ngen un: ‘Vantunga om kote’ Pa aw, na min siangtho kizahtak hen.

en: There He was transfigured before them. His face shone like the sun, and His clothes became as white as the light.
zo: Tua lai mun panin amaute’ muhtangpi mahin Jesuh a mel kikheel a, a maitang ni bangin taangin, a puante khuavak bangin a ngo hi.

en: “Father, if You are willing, take this cup from Me. Yet not My will, but Yours be done.”
zo: “Pa aw, nangma ngaihsutna bang ahihkhak leh hih ka thuak ding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hi ta hen,” a ci hi.

en: When Jesus had received the sour wine, He said, “It is finished.” And bowing His head, He gave up His spirit.
zo: Jesuh in tua leenggahzu-hau ciamin, “Man khinta hi,” a cih khit ciangin a lu puksukin a si ta hi.

en: All of them were filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak in other tongues as the Spirit enabled them.
zo: Amaute khempeuh Kha Siangtho tawh kidim uh a, tua Kha in minam dangte’ pau tawh amaute a pau theisak hi.

en: I am not ashamed of the gospel, because it is the power of God for salvation to everyone who believes, first to the Jew, then to the Greek.
zo: Lungdamna Thu ka muang mahmah hi. Tua thu pen a masa-in Jew mi, tua zomin minam dangte, thu um mi khempeuh a honkhiazo Pasian’ vangliatna ahi hi.

en: For the message of the cross is foolishness to those who are perishing, but to us who are being saved it is the power of God.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna a thuak mite a dingin singlamteh tungah Khrih sihna thu pen a haihuai thu ahi hi. Ahi zongin hotkhiatna a ngah eite a dingin Pasian’ vangliatna ahi hi.

en: Now we have this treasure in jars of clay to show that this surpassingly great power is from God and not from us.
zo: Ahi zongin vangliatna taktak Pasian a’ hi a, kote a’ hi lo hi, ci-in a kilat nadingin kha tawh kisai na manpha a nei kote pen na kikoihna leibeel tawh a kibang bek ka hi uh hi.

en: Carry each other’s burdens, and in this way you will fulfill the law of Christ.
zo: Thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin khatlekhat na kihuh un. Tua hileh Khrih’ thukham a zui na hi uh hi.

en: For we are God’s workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.
zo: Eite a hong bawlpa pen Pasian hi a, Jesuh Khrih tawh i kipawl ciangin i nuntakna-ah gamtat hoih a nei dingin a hong bawl ihi hi. Hih pen eite’ omzia dingin a na ngaihsut kholhsa ahi hi.

en: For to me, to live is Christ and to die is gain.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrih a’ ding bekin a nungta ka hi a, si taleng zong kei a dingin hoihzaw semsem lai hi.

en: And He is the head of the body, the church; He is the beginning and the firstborn from among the dead, so that in everything He might have the supremacy.
zo: Na khempeuhah amah a lianpen ahih theih nadingin, amah pen pawlpi ahi ama pumpi lutang hi a, pawlpi’ nuntakna a kipatna hi a, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa cil ahi hi.

en: Rejoice always,
zo: Lungdam tawntungin,

en: and to grant relief to you who are oppressed and to us as well. This will happen when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven in blazing fire with His powerful angels,
zo: tu-a gimna a thuak note le kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Jesuh le a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin,

en: This is a trustworthy saying: If anyone aspires to be an overseer, he desires a noble task.
zo: Mi khatpeuh, pawlpi sia nasep a ut leh a hoih mahmah ahi hi, a cihna thu a man ahi hi.

en: I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.
zo: Kidemna-ah ka hat tawpin ka hih khin a, a mong dongin ka tai khin a, upna thu khotakin lenin ka zokhin hi.

en: So if you consider me a partner, welcome him as you would welcome me.
zo: Tua ahih manin nasepna-ah pawlkhat taktakin kei na hong ngaihsut nakleh kei na hong limbawl ding zahin amah na limbawl in.

en: The Son is the radiance of God’s glory and the exact representation of His being, sustaining all things by His powerful word. After He had provided purification for sins, He sat down at the right hand of the Majesty in heaven.
zo: Tua Tapa in Pasian’ minthanna vang hong taangkhiasak a, Pasian’ lim taktak mah hong pua-in, ama kampauna tawh leitung vantung buppi pai-in a kip hi. Mihingte a mawhna panun a siansak khit ciangin Vanglian pipa Pasian’ taklam, vantungah a tu hi.

en: but no man can tame the tongue. It is a restless evil, full of deadly poison.
zo: Ahi zongin siattheih nading gukhal tawh a kidim, a omkhong thei lo leii pen zualsakin a ukzo kuamah om lo hi.

en: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ! By His great mercy He has given us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,
zo: I Topa Jesuh Khrih’ Pa Pasian tungah lungdam ni. Ama hong hehpih mahmahna hangin sihna panin Jesuh Khrih a thawhkik sakna tawh eite tungah nuntakna thak a hong pia hi. Tua ahih manin i lametna kiam ngei lo a,

en: The Lord is not slow to fulfill His promise as some understand slowness, but is patient with you, not wanting anyone to perish but everyone to come to repentance.
zo: Mi pawlkhatte’ ngaihsut bangin Topa in a kamciamna a hong tungsak hak hi zenzen lo hi. Note khat beek in siatna na thuakkhak ding uh deih loin na vekpi-un na kisik ding uh deih ahih manin hong pai nai lohna pen note hong khualna hizaw hi.

en: Behold what manner of love the Father has given to us, that we should be called children of God. And that is what we are! The reason the world does not know us is that it did not know Him.
zo: Pa Pasian in eite bangzah takin hong itna thu thei un. Ama hong itna lian mahmah ahih manin eite pen Pasian’ tate hong kici a, hong kicih mah bang ihi takpi hi. Leitung mite in tuhun ciang dong Pasian thei lo uh ahih manin eite zong a hong thei lo uh ahi hi.

en: In a loud voice they were saying: “Worthy is the Lamb, who was slain, to receive power and wealth and wisdom and strength and honor and glory and praise!”
zo: Amaute in nakpitakin la sa uh a, “A kigo Tuuno in vangliatna le hauhna, pilna le thahatna, pahtawina, minthanna, le phatna, a ngah dingin kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.

en: Let us rejoice and be glad and give Him glory! For the wedding of the Lamb has come, and His bride has made herself ready.
zo: Tuuno’ zineih ding hun hong tungta a, a Lawmnu a kithawisa-in omkhin ahih manin lungdam kipakin amah phat ni.

en: And I will put enmity between you and the woman, and between your seed and her seed. He will crush your head, and you will strike his heel.”
zo: Nang le numei kikal na suanlekhakte le ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim ding a, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: But He said, “You cannot see My face, for no one can see Me and live.”
zo: Ahih hangin nangmah in ka maitang na mu thei kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mi in kei hong mu leh tuami nungta lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: The LORD your God will raise up for you a prophet like me from among your own brothers. You must listen to him.
zo: “ Topa na Pasian un note lak ahi na sanggamte uh lak panin note a dingin kei tawh a kibang kamsang khat hong khangsak ding hi. Note in ama thu na ngai ding uh hi.

en: I will proclaim the decree of the LORD: He said to Me, “You are My Son; today I have become Your Father.
zo: Topa’ thukhenna tu-in ka hong gen ding hi: Amah in keima tungah, “Nang pen ka tapa na hi a, tuni-in na Pa ka suak hi.

en: But now, this is what the LORD says—He who created you, O Jacob, and He who formed you, O Israel: “Do not fear, for I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are Mine.
zo: Ahih hangin Jakob aw, nangmah hong piangsak pa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, Topa in tu-in hih bang ci hi: “Hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in. Na min tawh kong sam khinzo a, nang pen kei-a’ na hi hi.

en: The LORD is good to those who wait for Him, to the soul who seeks Him.
zo: Amah a muangte a dingin Topa a hoih hi.

en: For I desire mercy, not sacrifice, and the knowledge of God rather than burnt offerings.
zo: Keima deih pen nong it tawntung ding uh hizaw a, gan tawh nong biakna uh ka deih pen hi lo zaw hi. Gan tawh nong biakna uh sangin kei nong theih ding uh ka deihzaw hi.

en: Rend your heart and not your garments. Return to the LORD your God, for He is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger, and abounding in loving devotion. And He relents from sending disaster.
zo: Na dah taktakna uh lungkhamna tawh langsak unla, na puante uh a balkek bek hi kei un,” hong ci hi. Topa , note’ Pasian kiangah ciahkik un. Amah migi mahmahin hehpihna a nei hi a, a lungduai-in hong huh nuam tawntung a, gim hong pia loin hong maisak nuam tawntung hi.

en: He will judge between many peoples and arbitrate for strong nations far and wide. They will beat their swords into plowshares and their spears into pruning hooks. Nation will not take up sword against nation, nor will they train for war anymore.
zo: Amah in minam tampite’ thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla pekah a om, minam vangliante’ thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lokhawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uh hi. Minam khatlekhat kido nawn lo ding uh a, galkidona theikha nawn lo ding uh hi.

en: Rejoice greatly, O Daughter of Zion! Shout, O Daughter of Jerusalem! Behold, your King is coming to you, righteous and having salvation, gentle and riding on a donkey, on a colt, the foal of a donkey.
zo: Zion mite aw, nakpitakin lungdam un. Jerusalem mite aw, lungdamin awng un. En un, na kumpipa uh hong pai hi. Amah, gualzawhna tawh hong pai hi. Ahi zongin kiniamkhiatna tawh hong pai a, sin nai loh lano tungah hong tuang hi.

en: May peoples serve you and nations bow down to you. Be master over your brothers, and may your mother’s sons bow down to you. Cursed be those who curse you, and blessed be those who bless you.”
zo: Mite in nangma na hong sem hen la, minamte na mai-ah hong kun ta uh hen. Na sanggamte’ tungah topa hi inla, na sanggamte’ suanlekhakte, na mai-ah hong kun uh hen. Nang hong samsia peuhmah in samsiatna ngah hen la, thupha hong pia peuhmah in thupha ngah ta hen,” a ci hi.

en: When the dew settled on the camp at night, the manna fell with it.
zo: Zanin giahphual tungah daitui a kiat ciangin manna tawh kia khawm hi.

en: And all these blessings will come upon you and overtake you, if you obey the voice of the LORD your God.
zo: Topa na Pasian uh thu na man’ uhleh hih thuphate khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding hi.

en: In those days Israel had no king; everyone did what was right in his own eyes.
zo: Tua hun lai-in Israel sungah kumpi om lo a, mi khempeuh amau’ hoihsak bang ciatin gamta uh hi.

en: And all the people at the gate, along with the elders, said, “We are witnesses. May the LORD make the woman entering your home like Rachel and Leah, who together built up the house of Israel. May you prosper in Ephrathah and be famous in Bethlehem.
zo: Tua ciangin kulhkongpi-a om mite khempeuh le upate in, “Kote, teci ka hi uh hi. Topa in Israel-te’ pianna Rachel le Leah bangin na innkuan sunga hong pai numei bawl tahen. Efrathah-ah na dau pai hen la, Bethlehem-ah na min thang tahen.

en: And he said to Jeroboam, “Take ten pieces for yourself, for this is what the LORD, the God of Israel, says: ‘Behold, I am about to tear the kingdom from the hand of Solomon and give ten tribes to you.
zo: Tua ciangin amah in Jeroboam kiangah, “Nang a dingin bek sawm la in; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘En in, Solomon’ khut panin kumpi gam a balkhia ding ka hi a, nangma tungah minam sawm kong pia ding hi.

en: They rejected His statutes and the covenant He had made with their fathers, as well as the warnings He had given them. They followed worthless idols and became worthless themselves, following the nations around them that the LORD had commanded them not to imitate.
zo: Amaute in ama thukhamte, le a pu a pate uh tawh a bawl a thuciamna, le amaute tungah a piak hilhkholhnate simmawh uh hi. Amaute in a mawkna milimte zui-in a mawkna suak uh a, amaute tawh kibangin gamta kei un ci-in Topa in a thupiak tawh kisai-in, amaute in amau’ kiima om minamte zui uh hi.

en: And though Judah was the strongest of his brothers and a ruler came from him, the birthright belonged to Joseph.
zo: A sanggamte lakah Judah a thahat suakin ama sung panin ulian khat a om hangin innluahza pen Josef a’ ahi hi.)

en: Blessed be the LORD, the God of our fathers, who has put such a thing as this in the king’s heart, to glorify the house of the LORD in Jerusalem,
zo: Tua ciangin Ezra in, “Jerusalem-a om Topa’ biakinn tua bangin a minthangsak thuah dingin kumpipa lungsimah suak a, kumpipa le a thu lamlakte le a uliante kei tungah a thunuam dingin a bawl i pu i pate’ Pasian ahi Topa in thupha ngah ta hen!” a ci hi. Tua hi a, Topa ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna thei ka hih manin ka lungsim hong hang a, kei hong zui dingin Israel makaite ka khawm hi.

en: They said to me, “Those who survived the exile and are back in the province are in great trouble and disgrace. The wall of Jerusalem is broken down, and its gates have been burned with fire.”
zo: Salsuahna panin a suakta, tua gam a omsuakte in haksatna lianpi le maizumna a ngahna uh, le Jerusalem kulh kicimin kulhkongpite mei in a kattumna thu a hong gen uh hi.

en: For if you remain silent at this time, relief and deliverance for the Jews will arise from another place, but you and your father’s house will perish. And who knows but that you have come to the kingdom for such a time as this?”
zo: Hih bang hunin bangmah hih loin na omcip leh, Jew mite’ suahtakna ding le noptuamna ding thu mundang khat pan hong piang veve ding a, nangmah le na innkuanpihte na simang ding uh hi. Hih kumpi inn na tunna pen hih bang huna mah dinga a tung na hih mel zong kua in thei ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

en: I have been young, and now I am old, yet I have not seen the righteous forsaken or their children begging bread.
zo: Thuman mi a kinusiacip, a suanlekhakte ngen tawmin a kivak, ka neu lai a kipanin tu-a ka teek hun ciang dong ka mu ngei nai kei hi.

en: A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
zo: Kam nemin dawnna in hehna damsak a, kam khauh in hehna piangsak hi.

en: You will keep in perfect peace the mind that is steadfast, because it trusts in You.
zo: Topa aw, nang hong muang a, nangma tungah a lungsim khempeuh a koih mipa lungnopna kicing pia ta in.

en: “Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations.”
zo: “Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khinzo hi. Na suah ma-in nang kong teelkhia khinzo a, minam dangte tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khinzo hi,” hong ci hi.

en: And those who are wise will shine like the brightness of the heavens, and those who lead many to righteousness, like the stars forever and ever.
zo: A pilte ahih uhleh vantung khuavak tawh a taangkhawm ding uh hi. A pha-in gamtat ding mi tampi a hilhte pen aksi bangin a taang tawntung ding uh hi.

en: And I will sow her for Myself in the land. I will show mercy to ‘No Mercy.’ I will say to ‘Not My People,’ ‘You are My people,’ and they will say, ‘You are my God.’”
zo: Leitungah ka mite kipsakin a cithei-in ka bawl ding a, hehpih loh, a kici mite ka hehpih ding a, ka mi hi lo, a kici mite, ka mi na hi uh hi, ka ci ding a, amaute in, “Nang pen kote’ Pasian na hi hi,” hong ci ding uh hi, Topa in a ci hi.

en: Surely the Lord GOD does nothing without revealing His plan to His servants the prophets.
zo: Topa Pasian in ama nasem kamsangte tungah ama geelna theisak masa lopi-in bangmah hih het lo hi.

en: And should I not be concerned about the great city of Nineveh, which has more than 120,000 people who cannot tell their right hand from their left, and many cattle as well?”
zo: Tua ahihleh keimah in ganhing tampi tham lo, a taklam khut le a veilam khut nangawn a khenthei nai lo naupang tul za le tul sawmnih sangin a tamzawte’ tenna, a lian mahmah Nineveh khuapi pammaih sa lo ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawngkik hi.

en: The LORD is slow to anger and great in power; the LORD will not leave the guilty unpunished. His way is in the whirlwind and the storm, and clouds are the dust of His feet.
zo: Topa lungduai mahmah a, a vang zong lian mahmah a, ahih hangin mimawhte khahkhong ngei lo hi. A paina peuhpeuhah huihpi nungin pingpei kipei a, ama paina hanga leivui leeng meiipi kai tawh kibang hi.

en: Though the fig tree does not bud and there are no grapes on the vines, though the olive crop fails and the fields produce no food, though there are no sheep in the pen and no cattle in the stalls,
zo: Theigahte a hut khin a, leengguite a gah kei zongin, oliv kungte gah lo a, lo-ah an a piang kei zongin, tuu khempeuh a si khin a, ganbuk khempeuh a hawm khin zongin,

en: Seek the LORD, all you humble of the land, who carry out His justice. Seek righteousness, seek humility; perhaps you will be sheltered on the day of the LORD’s anger.
zo: Kiniamkhiatin, Topa’ thupiakna a mang Judah gammi khempeuh aw, Topa’ kiang zuan un. A manin gamta unla, kiniamkhiat un. Tua hileh Topa’ hehna hong kilat ciangin, tua hehna hangin gimna panin na peng khathei ding uh hi.

en: And I will pour out on the house of David and on the inhabitants of Jerusalem a spirit of grace and supplication. And they will look on Me, the One they have pierced; and they will mourn for Him as one mourns for an only son, and grieve bitterly for Him as one grieves for a firstborn.
zo: “David’ suanlekhakte le Jerusalem khuamite’ tungah hehpihna lungsim le thungetna lungsim ka guan ding hi. Amaute in a sutlup uh mipa enin, ta khat neihsun a sihsuah mite bangin kap ding uh a, tacil a khuaisuahte bangin nakpitakin kapin thum ding uh hi.

en: “Behold, I will send you Elijah the prophet before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the LORD.
zo: “Ahi zongin tua a lauhuai lian mahmah Topa’ ni hong tun ma-in note kiangah kamsang Elijah kong paisak ding hi.

en: And I tell you that you are Peter, and on this rock I will build My church, and the gates of Hades will not prevail against it.
zo: Ke’n kong genin-ah: Nang pen suangneu a cihnopna Peter na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka lam ding a, sihna nangawn in zo zo ngei lo ding hi.

en: “The time is fulfilled,” He said, “and the kingdom of God is at hand. Repent and believe the gospel!”
zo: “A hunhoih hong tungta a, Pasian’ Uk ding hun hong kipanta hi. Na mawhna uh kisikkik unla, hih Lungdamna Thuthak um un,” ci-in a hilh hi.

en: “Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace to men on whom His favor rests.”
zo: “Van a sang belna-ah a om Pasian’ min thang hen la, ama pahtak leitung mite tungah nopna om ta hen,” a ci uh hi.

en: The next day John saw Jesus coming toward him and said, “Look, the Lamb of God, who takes away the sin of the world!
zo: A zing ciangin Johan in ama kiangah Jesuh hong pai a muh ciangin, “En un, leitung mawhna a lakhia Pasian’ Tuuno hih lai-ah hong pai hi.

en: Then Peter began to speak: “I now realize how true it is that God does not show favoritism,
zo: Tua ciangin Peter a kam ka-in thu hilh ding kipan a, “Pasian in kuamah angvan’ tuam nei loin,

en: that if you confess with your mouth, “Jesus is Lord,” and believe in your heart that God raised Him from the dead, you will be saved.
zo: Jesuh pen Topa hi, ci-in mite kiangah genin, Pasian in sihna panin amah hingkiksak zo hi, ci-in na lungsim sung uhah na up taktak uhleh hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi.

en: Now to each one the manifestation of the Spirit is given for the common good.
zo: Mi khempeuh a dingin phattuamna a omtheih nadingin Kha Siangtho’ hong ompihna a nam tuamtuamin hong kilang hi.

en: But He said to me, “My grace is sufficient for you, for My power is perfected in weakness.” Therefore I will boast all the more gladly in my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may rest on me.
zo: Ahi zongin Topa in kei kiangah, “Na tha a nem ciangin keima vangliatna hat mahmah ahih manin nangma kisapna pen keima hehpihna hi bek hi,” ci-in hong dawng hi. Tua ahih manin keima sungah Khrih vangliatna hong omtheih nadingin lungdam takin ka thaneemna ka kisialhpih semsem hi.

en: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not be encumbered once more by a yoke of slavery.
zo: Khrih in eite hong khahkhiat khitna hangin mi suaktate hi khinta ihih manin tua suahtakna thu-ah kipin om unla, sila va suakkik nawn kei un.

en: Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.
zo: khatlekhat kihehpihin, lungsim nem tawh na kihozaw unla, Khrih’ hangin Pasian in note’ mawhna hong maisak mah bangin khatlekhat na mawhna uh na kimaisak ta un.

en: Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
zo: Thu khat peuhpeuhah lunghimawh lua kei unla, na kisap bangbang uh, lungdamna tawh Pasian kiangah na ngen un.

en: Since, then, you have been raised with Christ, set your hearts on things above, where Christ is seated at the right hand of God.
zo: Note pen Khrih tawh a thokik khinte na hih manun, Pasian’ taklam a kumpi tokhom tungah Khrih a tutna mun vantung thute ngaihsutin nei un.

en: For the Lord Himself will descend from heaven with a loud command, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trumpet of God, and the dead in Christ will rise first.
zo: Pasian’ thupiakna awging lianpi, vantungmi mangpa’ thugenna, le Pasian’ peengkul hong ging ding a, vantung panin Topa mahmah hong paisuk ding hi.

en: Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a worker who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth.
zo: Pasian’ thuman a mantakin hilhin, na nasepna-ah maizumna thuak loin, Pasian’ pahtakna na ngahtheih nadingin na siam tawpin hanciam in.

en: Let us then approach the throne of grace with confidence, so that we may receive mercy and find grace to help us in our time of need.
zo: Tua ahih manin a kisap hunin, eite a hong huh dingin hehpihna le dikna thupha i ngahtheih nadingin, kimuanna lungsim tawh hehpihna tokhom va zuan ciat ni.

en: If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.
zo: Pilna kisam na om uhleh Pasian kiangah ngen un. Mi khempeuh tungah Pasian dikin cingh mahmah ahih manin hong pia ding hi.

en: He Himself bore our sins in His body on the tree, so that we might die to sin and live for righteousness. “By His stripes you are healed.”
zo: Eite, mawhna lamah misi bangin, thuman lamah nungta-in i gamtat theih nadingin Khrih mahmah in eite’ mawhna ama pumpi mahmah tawh singlamteh tungah a pua hi. Ama liamna hangin note in damna na ngah uh hi.

en: Through these He has given us His precious and magnificent promises, so that through them you may become partakers of the divine nature, now that you have escaped the corruption in the world caused by evil desires.
zo: Amah in piak dingin a hong ciam a manpha mahmah nate hih bangzia-in hong pia a, hih ama hong piak nate hangin leitungah a om siatna a piangsak thei duhluatna le deihluatnate panin na suakta uh a, Pasian’ pianziate na nei uh hi.

en: This is the confidence we have before Him: If we ask anything according to His will, He hears us.
zo: Eite in ama deihna tawh kituakin i nget nakleh i nget khempeuh Pasian in hong pia ding hi, ci-in kimuanna lungsim i nei hi.

en: I am the Living One; I was dead, and behold, I am alive forever and ever! And I hold the keys of Death and of Hades.
zo: a nungta mipa zong ka hi hi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hi hi. Sihna le misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uh hi.

en: The Spirit and the bride say, “Come!” And let the one who hears say, “Come!” And let the one who is thirsty come, and the one who desires the water of life drink freely.
zo: Kha Siangtho le Mothak in Jesuh kiangah, “Hong pai in,” a ci uh hi. Hih thu a za mi khempeuh in zong Jesuh aw, “Hong pai in,” ci ta uh hen. A dangtak mi khempeuh hong pai uh hen la, a deih khempeuh in nuntakna tui a khongin hong la ta uh hen.

en: This is the account of Noah and his family. Noah was a righteous man, blameless among the people of his time, and he walked with God.
zo: Noah’ tangthu hih bang ahi hi. Noah a thuman mi khat hi a, ama khangah paubaang lo hi. Noah pen Pasian tawh kikhawl hi.

en: “And let them make Me a sanctuary, that I may dwell among them.
zo: Amaute’ lakah kei ka om theih nadingin kei a dingin biakbuk khat amaute bawlsak in.

en: This is to be a lasting ordinance for you: Atonement is to be made once a year for all the sins of the Israelites.” And it was done, as the LORD commanded Moses.
zo: Hih pen Israel mite a dingin amau’ khialhnate khempeuh hangin kum khatin khatvei kilemna a kibawlsak theih nadingin note a dingin a om tawntung ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Topa in amah a thupiak bangin Moses a gamta hi.

en: He is the Rock, His work is perfect; for all His ways are just. A God of faithfulness without injustice, righteous and upright is He.
zo: “Eite’ belh Topa, a nasepna kicing a, ama sepna khempeuh thumanna ahi hi. Thumanna nei-in, mawhna a nei lo Pasian hi a, amah thutangin thuman hi.

en: Then the LORD said to Cain, “Where is your brother Abel?” “I do not know,” he replied. “Am I my brother’s keeper?”
zo: Tua ciangin Topa in Kain tungah, “Na sanggampa Abel koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka thei kei hi. Kei, ka sanggam a kem pa ka hi hiam?” ci hi.

en: Then they said, “Come, let us build ourselves a city, with a tower that reaches to the heavens, so that we may make a name for ourselves and not be scattered over the face of the whole earth.”
zo: Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hong pai un, leitung buppi-ah eite i kithehthang gawp loh nadingin ei a dingin khuapi khat bawlin, a dawn in vantung a ban ding tausang khat lamin, eite’ minthan nading khat bawl ni,” ci uh hi.

en: And he had a dream, and behold, a stairway was set on the earth with its top reaching to heaven; and behold, the angels of God were ascending and descending on it.
zo: Amah in mang man a, leitungah kahlei khat kiphutin, a kahlei dawn in van ban hi. Pasian’ vantung mite tua kahlei tungah kah to-in a kum suk a mu hi.

en: The blood will be a sign for you on the houses where you are. And when I see the blood, I will pass over you. No plague will fall on you to destroy you when I strike the land of Egypt.
zo: Note’ omna inn tunga sisan pen note a dingin lim hi ding hi. Sisan ka muh ciangin note kong paisan ding a, Egypt leitang ka vatgawp ciangin note hong susia ding gimna note’ tungah hong tung lo ding hi.

en: And the priests who carried the ark of the covenant of the LORD stood firm on dry ground in the middle of the Jordan, while all Israel passed over on dry ground, until the whole nation had completed the crossing on dry ground.
zo: Israel-te khempeuh lei keu tungah a galkah sung, minam bup in Jordan a khen’ khit mateng, Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite Jordan gun laizang lei keu tungah ding uh hi.

en: Then Samson called out to the LORD, “O Lord GOD, please remember me. Strengthen me, O God, just once more, and let me with one blow get revenge on the Philistines for my two eyes.”
zo: Tua ciangin Samson in Topa samin, “ Topa Pasian aw, kei hong phawk in, kong thum hi. Tu-a ka mittang nihte’ tang dingin Filistia mite ka thuktheih nadingin hong thahatsak in, tu-a bek kong thum hi,” a ci hi.

en: Then the LORD came and stood there, calling as before, “Samuel! Samuel!” And Samuel answered, “Speak, for Your servant is listening.”
zo: Topa hong pai-in hong ding a, a hun dangte-a mah bangin, “Samuel! Samuel!” ci-in a sam hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Hong gen in, na nasempa in za hi,” a ci hi.

en: So give Your servant a discerning heart to govern Your people and to distinguish between right and wrong. For who is able to govern this great people of Yours?”
zo: Tua ahih ciangin keimah in a sia le a pha ka theihtheih nadingin na mite uk nading thu theihtelna lungsim na nasempa hong pia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih a lian a tam na mite kua in ukzo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

en: So he went down and dipped himself in the Jordan seven times, as the man of God had told him, and his flesh was restored and became clean like that of a young boy.
zo: Tua ahih ciangin Pasian mipa’ kamgen bangin amah paisukin Jordan gun sungah sagihvei kidiah hi. Tua ciangin a cilesa naupangno cilesa bangin a ngei bangkikin amah a siang hi.

en: because your heart was tender and you humbled yourself before God when you heard His words against this place and its inhabitants, and because you have humbled yourself before Me and have torn your clothes and wept before Me, I have heard you,’ declares the LORD.
zo: hih mun le a tunga tengte langpanna ama kammal na zak ciangin na lungsim kisikin Pasian’ mai-ah na kiniamkhiat a, keima mai-ah nang kiniamkhiatin na puante balkekin ka mai-ah kap na hih manin, kei zong nang kong za hi, Topa in ci hi.

en: I praise You, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Marvelous are Your works, and I know this very well.
zo: Kihtak dingin a kilawm na hih manin nang ka hong phat hi. Na nasepnate lamdang mahmah! Nangmah in kei nong lim theih mahmah hi.

en: A wife of noble character, who can find? She is worth far more than rubies.
zo: Zi hoih pen suangmanpha sangin manphazaw pek a, ahi zongin zi hoih ngah ding haksa mahmah hi.

en: Set me as a seal over your heart, as a seal upon your arm. For love is as strong as death, its jealousy unyielding as the grave. It burns like a blazing fire, like a mighty flame.
zo: Kei simloh kuamah ngai kei inla, kei simloh kuamah kawi kei in. Itna zong sihna zahin thahat a, ngaihna zong sihna zahin khauh hi. Itna, mei bangin kuangkhia a, meikuang lianpen a suak hi.

en: The Spirit of the Lord GOD is on Me, because the LORD has anointed Me to preach good news to the poor. He has sent Me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives and freedom to the prisoners,
zo: Gimna a thuak mite tungah thuhoih a puak dingin Topa in kei hong teelin hong sawl ahih manin keima sungah Topa Pasian ’ kha hong om hi. Lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding, salin a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, a kikhum mite a dingin thong kong a hong ding,

en: “Son of man, I have made you a watchman for the house of Israel. Whenever you hear a word from My mouth, you must give them warning from Me.
zo: “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, Israel minamte’ galvil pa dingin nang kong koih hi. Nangma tungah ka hong gen hilhkholhnate khempeuh amaute tungah na gensawn ding hi.

en: “Look!” he answered. “I see four men, unbound and unharmed, walking around in the fire—and the fourth looks like a son of the gods!”
zo: “Tua ahihleh bang hangin meikuang sungah mihing li a kawi paipai mu ka hi hiam? Amaute lah kihencip lo a, liam zong liam tuak beek lo uh hi. A lina pen pa hoh pasian-te khat tawh a kibang hi,” ci-in a dong hi.

en: My God sent His angel, and He shut the mouths of the lions. They have not hurt me, because I was found innocent in His sight. And also before you, O king, I have done no wrong.”
zo: Pasian in a vantungmi hong sawl a, ka liam loh nadingin humpinelkaite’ kam a humcipsak hi. Kumpipa aw, mawhna ka bawl lohlam leh, nang tungah zong khialhna ka bawl lohna amah in hong thei ahih manin tua bangin a hong bawl hi,” a ci hi.

en: And a voice from heaven said, “This is My beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased!”
zo: Tua sung mahin vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Hih pen ka it mahmah ka Tapa hi a, ama tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a hong ci hi.

en: “Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
zo: “Ngen un; na nget uhleh hong kipia ding hi. Zong un; na zon uh leh na mu ding uh hi. Kongkhak na kiu un; na kiuh uhleh hong kihon ding hi.

en: Taking her by the hand, He said to her, “Talitha koum!” (which means, “Little girl, I say to you, get up!”).
zo: Tua ciangin numeino’ khut lenin, “Numeino aw, tho in,” a cihna, “ Talitha kumi ,” a ci hi.

en: He answered, “‘Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength and with all your mind’ and ‘Love your neighbor as yourself.’”
zo: Amah in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na nuntakna khempeuh, na hatna khempeuh, le na pilna khempeuh tawh na it inla, nangmah na ki-it bangin na vengte na it in,” ci-in kigelh hi, ci-in a dawng hi.

en: “Truly, truly, I tell you,” Jesus declared, “before Abraham was born, I am!”
zo: Jesuh in, “A taktakin ci lehang, Abraham a pian’ ma-in kei ka omkhin hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

en: “Who are You, Lord?” Saul asked. “I am Jesus, whom you are persecuting,” He replied.
zo: Saul in, “Topa aw, kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Nangmah in na hong bawlsiat Jesuh ka hi hi.

en: They replied, “Believe in the Lord Jesus, and you will be saved—you and your household.”
zo: Amaute in, “Topa Jesuh um in. Tua hileh nang le na innkuanpihte in hotkhiatna na ngah ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.

en: But God proves His love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
zo: Ahi zongin eite mawhna nei ihih laitakin eite a dingin Khrih hong si ahih manin Pasian in eite hong it mahmahna thu hong lak khin hi.

en: No temptation has seized you except what is common to man. And God is faithful; He will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, He will also provide a way out so that you can endure it.
zo: Na tuah uh ze-etnate khempeuh pen mite’ tuah ngeingeite mah ahi hi. Pasian in citakin a thuciamna lenkip ahih manin note’ thuak zawh loh ding ze-etna hong tuaksak lo ding hi. Ze-etna na tuah hun uh ciangin zong na thuakzawh nading uh thahatna hong guan ding ahih manin na suahtak zawh nading uh lampi hong honsak ding hi.

en: God made Him who knew no sin to be sin for us, so that in Him we might become the righteousness of God.
zo: Khrih tawh i kipawlna hangin eite zong Pasian tawh a kibangin midik i suahtheih nadingin mawhna a nei lo Khrih pen eite’ tang dingin Pasian in mawhnei mi a suaksak hi.

en: For you, brothers, were called to freedom. But do not use your freedom to indulge the flesh; rather, serve one another in love.
zo: Sanggamte aw, note ahihleh a suakta mi ahi dingin Pasian in a hong sap ahi hi. Ahi zongin tua suahtakna pen na pumpi uh ut bangbangin gamtat theih nadingin paulam zonna-in nei kei unla, itna tawh khatlekhat kikhualna-in zangzaw un.

en: Put on the full armor of God, so that you can take your stand against the devil’s schemes.
zo: Dawimangpa’ hong hih nading khempeuh na dalzawh nadingun Pasian’ galvan namkim na zang un.

en: that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, in heaven and on earth and under the earth,
zo: Tua ahih manin vantung, leitung, leinuai-a om mi khempeuh in Jesuh pahtawi-in khukdin ding uh a,

en: For in Christ all the fullness of the Deity lives in bodily form,
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing hong suahna sungah Khrih in Pasian’ pianzia khempeuh a kimtakin nei a,

en: May God Himself, the God of peace, sanctify you through and through. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be kept blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
zo: Nopsakna a hong pia Pasian in na khempeuhah sianthona le kicinna hong pia hen la, na kha uh, na nuntakna uh, le na pumpi uh hoihtakin hong kem hen la, i Topa Jesuh Khrih hong pai ciangin mawhna khat zong a nei het lo dingin hong bawl tahen.

en: For even when we were with you, we gave you this command: “If anyone is unwilling to work, he shall not eat.”
zo: Note tawh ka hong omkhawm lai-un, “Na a sem nuam lo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un,” ci-in ka hong gen uh hi.

en: This is a trustworthy saying, worthy of full acceptance: Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners, of whom I am the worst.
zo: Khrih Jesuh, mawhneite a honkhia dingin leitungah hong pai hi, cihna thu a man hi a, a uphuai a sanhuai thu ahi hi. Keimah zong tua mawhnei mite lakah a mawhpha bel ka hi hi.

en: For this reason I also suffer these things. But I am not ashamed, for I know whom I have believed, and I am convinced that He is able to guard what I have entrusted to Him for that day.
zo: Tua ahih manin hih bangteng a thuak ka hi hi. Ahi zongin ka up pa ka thei a, ama tungah ka apte tua Ni dong hong kepsakzo ding hi, ci-in thei ka hih manin ka maizum het kei hi.

en: For the grace of God has appeared, bringing salvation to all men.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in hotkhiatna a ngahtheih nadingun Pasian in ama hehpihna hong lak khinzo hi.

en: Therefore He is able to save completely those who draw near to God through Him, since He always lives to intercede for them.
zo: Tua hi a, mite a dingin a thumsak thei dingin amah nungta tawntung ahih manin ama tungtawnin Pasian kiang a zuante khempeuh, tu a kipanin a tawntungin a honkhia thei ahi hi.

en: And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to Him must believe that He exists and that He rewards those who earnestly seek Him.
zo: Upna lo tawh kuamah in Pasian lungkimsak zo lo hi. Pasian kiang a zuan mi peuhmah in Pasian a om takpi ahihna thu le amah a zongte Pasian in thaman pia hi, ci-in a up ding kisam hi.

en: You believe that there is one God. Good! Even the demons believe that—and shudder.
zo: Pasian khat bek om hi, ci-in na um hi. Tua pen hoih mahmah hi. Dawite nangawn in zong tua bangin umin lau-in ling deldel uh hi.

en: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
zo: Tua ahih manin Pasian’ thu na mang un. Dawimangpa na nial un. Nial le-uhcin no kiang panin taikhia ding hi.

en: Each one should use whatever gift he has received to serve others, faithfully administering God’s grace in its various forms.
zo: Pasian’ piak na a zatsiamte bangin Pasian’ kiang panin na ngah uh nate, midangte’ phattuam nadingin na zang un.

en: But do not forget this one thing, dear friends: With the Lord a day is like a thousand years, and a thousand years are like a day.
zo: Ahi zongin ka itte aw, na mangngilh loh ding uh ka deih thu in: Topa a dingin ni khat le kum khat, kum tulkhat le ni khat a kilamdan’ luatna om lo hi.

en: Do not love the world or anything in the world. If anyone loves the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
zo: Hih leitung nate le Pasian tawh a kizom lo thute deihluatin nei kei un. Mi khatpeuh in hih leitung nate a deihluat leh amah in Pa Pasian it taktak thei lo hi.

en: We love because He first loved us.
zo: Pasian in eite hong it masa ahih manin eite in itna i nei thei hi.

en: But I have this against you: You have abandoned your first love.
zo: Ahi zongin note ka hong mawhsakna khat om a, tua in: A masa lai-a kei na hong it bangun tu-in na hong it nawn kei uh hi.

en: So, because you are lukewarm—neither hot nor cold—I am about to spit you out of My mouth.
zo: Ahi zongin note pen vot lah vot vet lo, sa lah sa vet loin a laklawhin om na hih manun ka kam sung panin ka hong siakhia ding hi.

en: They have conquered him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony; and they did not love their lives so as to shy away from death.
zo: I sanggamte in Tuuno sisan le thuman a genna uh tawh amah na zo uh a, a nuntakna nangawn uh na pia ngam uh hi.

en: And He who was seated on the throne said, “Behold, I am making all things new.” Then He said, “Write this down, for these words are trustworthy and true.”
zo: Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tupa in, “Tu-in na khempeuh a thakin ka bawl hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin, “Hih thute thumanin muantaak ahih manin lai-ah gelh in,” hong ci lai hi.

en: “Behold, I am coming soon! My reward is with Me, and I will give to each person according to what he has done.
zo: Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei ka hong pai baihta ding a, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.

en: The grace of the Lord Jesus be with all the saints. Amen.
zo: Topa Jesuh hong hehpihna thupha, note khempeuh tungah hong om tahen. Amen.

en: Abram believed the LORD, and He credited it to him as righteousness.
zo: Amah in Topa muang hi. Tua ahih manin ahi ding bangin Abram gamta hi, ci-in Topa in a ciamteh hi.

en: And He passed in front of Moses, proclaiming, “The LORD, the LORD, the compassionate and gracious God, slow to anger, and abounding in loving devotion and faithfulness,
zo: Ama mai-ah Topa pai-in, “Topa , Topa , hehpihna nei-in a dik Pasian; lungduai-in itna kip le thutakna tawh a dim;

en: So you shall consecrate the fiftieth year and proclaim liberty throughout the land to all its inhabitants. It shall be a Jubilee for you.
zo: Note in a kum sawmngana siangthosakin, gam sunga a teng mi khempeuh tungah suahtakna thu na zasak ding uh hi. Note in nomau’ neihsa ciat ngahkikin, sila-in a kizuak mite nomau’ innkuanpihte ciat kiangah na ciahkik uh ciangin note a dingin jubilee hi ding hi.

en: And among the cities you give to the Levites, you are to designate six cities of refuge, to which a manslayer may flee.
zo: Levi mite tungah na piak uh khuapite pen bukna khuapi gukte hi ding a, mi thatte tua lai-ah na taisak ding uh a, tuate’ banah khuapi sawmli le nih na pia thuah ding uh hi.

en: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you; He will never leave you nor forsake you.”
zo: Thahat unla, hang un. Lau kei unla, amaute kihta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note tawh hong pai pa pen Topa na Pasian uh ahi hi. Note hong cimawhsak lo ding a, hong nusia lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: So the sun stood still and the moon stopped until the nation took vengeance upon its enemies. Is this not written in the Book of Jashar? The sun stopped in the middle of the sky and delayed going down about a full day.
zo: Tua ciangin hih minamte in a galte uh a zawh khit mateng ni ding cipin kha a khawl hi. Hih thute, Jashar’ Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Vankim lai-ah ni khawlin ni khat bup bang tumsuk lo hi.

en: “So may all Your enemies perish, O LORD! But may those who love You be like the sun when it rises in its strength.” And the land had peace for forty years.
zo: “Tua ahih ciangin na gal khempeuh si khin uh hi, Topa ! Ahih hangin na lawmte pen a vangliatna tawh a suak ni bang ta hen,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin tua gam in kum sawmli sung tawlngakna hun a nei hi.

en: He raises the poor from the dust and lifts the needy from the ash heap. He seats them with princes and has them inherit a throne of honor. For the foundations of the earth are the LORD’s; upon them He has set the world.
zo: Amah in leivui panin mizawngte phongto a, amah in a cimawhte a lungkhamna panun a phongto hi. Uliante tawh tukhawmsak a, minphatna ngahsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khuampite Topa a’ hi a, tuate tungah amah in leitung pumpi a koih hi.

en: Then David said to Nathan, “I have sinned against the LORD.” And Nathan replied, “The LORD has taken away your sin. You will not die.
zo: David in hih thu a zak ciangin Nathan kiangah, “ Topa’ tungah ka khial khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, “ Topa in zong na khialhna hong maisak khinzo hi; nang na si kei ding hi.

en: When all the people saw this, they fell prostrate and said, “The LORD, He is God! The LORD, He is God!”
zo: Mi khempeuh in tua thu a muh uh ciangin a mai uh leilam ngatin puk uh hi. Amaute in, “ Topa pen Pasian ahi hi; Topa pen Pasian ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

en: “Go back and tell Hezekiah, the ruler of My people, ‘This is what the LORD, the God of your father David, says: I have heard your prayer; I have seen your tears. Behold, I will heal you.
zo: “Kileh kik inla keima mite’ makai Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen in: Na thungetna ka za khin a, na khituite ka mu khin hi. En in, nang kong damsak ding a, ni thum ni-in Topa’ biakinn-ah na paito ding hi.

en: Give thanks to the LORD, for He is good; His loving devotion endures forever.
zo: Amah hoih ahih manin Topa’ tungah lungdamna ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip a tawntungin a kho hi!

en: For the eyes of the LORD range throughout the earth to strengthen those whose hearts are fully committed to Him.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh ama lamah a lungsim a paubaang lo mite’ tangin ama vangliatna a lak dingin Topa’ mit in leitung khempeuh en kawikawi hi. Hih thu-ah na hai gamtat khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tu a kipan gal na do ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: And they sang responsively with praise and thanksgiving to the LORD: “For He is good; for His loving devotion to Israel endures forever.” Then all the people gave a great shout of praise to the LORD, because the foundation of the house of the LORD had been laid.
zo: Tua ciangin amaute in Topa phatna le lungdamkohna a kidawngin sa uh a, “ Topa hoih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te hong itna kip tawntung hi,” a ci uh hi. Topa’ biakinn bulpi kiphut khin ahih manin mi khempeuh in nakpitakin Topa phat uh hi.

en: But I know that my Redeemer lives, and that in the end He will stand upon the earth.
zo: “Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah kei hong panpih ding a nungta tawntung khat vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi.

en: But his delight is in the law of the LORD, and on His law he meditates day and night.
zo: Ama nopsakna pen Topa thu sung bek mah hi a, sun le zanin ama thu a ngaihsunsun mi ahi hi.

en: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
zo: Nangma thu pen lam hong lak ding meivak hi a, ka paina lampi-ah khuavak ahi hi.

en: He who oppresses the poor taunts their Maker, but he who is gracious to the needy honors Him.
zo: Mizawngte bawlsiatna pen a piangsak Pasian simmawhna hi a, mizawngte tungah citna pen Pasian zahtakna ahi hi.

en: I have seen something else under the sun: The race is not to the swift, nor the battle to the strong, nor does food come to the wise, or wealth to the brilliant, or favor to the learned; but time and chance happen to them all.
zo: Hih leitungah ka phawk dang thu khat in: A taihat mite in tai kidemna-ah zo tawntung lo a, galhang thahatte in gal zo tawntung lo hi. A pilte in an a kham ngah tawntung lo a, a pilte hau tawntung lo hi. Hih theih siamna a neite milian suak tawntung lo hi. Mi khempeuh tungah kamsiatna vive tung hi.

en: Do you not know? Have you not heard? The LORD is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He will not grow tired or weary, and His understanding no one can fathom.
zo: Thei nai lo a, za nai lo na hi hiam? Topa pen tawntung Pasian hi a, leitung mong khempeuh dong a Piangsak pa ahi hi. Amah gim lo a, zong tawl lo hi. Ama thu theihtelna kigen zo lo hi.

en: “Can a man hide in secret places where I cannot see him?” declares the LORD. “Do I not fill heaven and earth?” declares the LORD.
zo: Mi khat peuhpeuh kei’ muh loh dingin busim thei ding ahi hiam, Topa in kong ci hi. Leitung, vantung, mun khempeuhah ka om lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam, Topa in kong ci hi.

en: Though He brings grief, He will show compassion, according to the abundance of His loving devotion.
zo: Dahna hong thuaksak thei ding a, ahih hangin eite a hong itna muanhuai-in kip tawntung hi.

en: Behold, every soul belongs to Me; the soul of the father is as much Mine as the soul of the son. The soul who sins is the one who will die.
zo: Mi khempeuh keima a’ hi a, pate ahi a, tate ahi zongin keima-a’ ahi hi. A mawh mipa bek si ding hi.

en: And the second is like it: ‘Love your neighbor as yourself.’
zo: A nihna pen a masa mah tawh kibang a, nangma pumpi na it bangin na vengte na it in, cihna ahi hi.

en: Immediately the boy’s father cried out, “I do believe; help my unbelief!”
zo: Thakhatin naupang’ pa kiko a, “Ka um hi; ka upna a kicin nadingin hong huh in,” a ci hi.

en: But the tax collector stood at a distance, unwilling even to lift his eyes to heaven. Instead, he beat his breast and said, ‘God, have mercy on me, a sinner.’
zo: Ahi zongin siahdongpa pen a gamla simah ding a, vantung lamah zong dak ngam loin a dip humin kuncip a, ‘Pasian aw, kei mimawh mi khial pa hong hehpih in,’ ci-in a ngen hi.

en: God is Spirit, and His worshipers must worship Him in spirit and in truth.”
zo: Pasian pen Kha ahi hi; amah a biate in tua Kha’ lamlahna le thuman taktak tawh a bia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

en: But I consider my life of no value to myself, if only I may finish my course and the ministry I received from the Lord Jesus, to testify to the gospel of God’s grace.
zo: Ahi zongin Topa Jesuh in kei sep dingin a hong piak, Pasian hehpihna hangin Lungdamna Thu, mite kiangah gen ding nasep ka tangtut zawh nakleh kei nuntakna-ah bangbang hong piang taleh a thupi-in ka ngaihsun kei hi.

en: For the kingdom of God is not a matter of eating and drinking, but of righteousness, peace, and joy in the Holy Spirit.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Ukna pen nekledawn tawh a kisai thu hi lo a, Kha Siangtho hangin i ngah Pasian’ deih bangin gamtatna, kilemna, lungdamna, cihte hizaw hi.

en: But God chose the foolish things of the world to shame the wise; God chose the weak things of the world to shame the strong.
zo: Ahi zongin Pasian in mipilte a maizumsak nadingin mihaite hong teel a, mi thahatte a maizumsak nadingin mi thaneemte a hong teel hi.

en: Each one should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver.
zo: Pasian in piaknopna lungsim tawh a pia mite bek deih ahih manin, a kuamah peuh in na lungsim sung uhah na ngaihsutsa zah ciat uh na pia unla, pia nuam lopipi le sawlzawh thu bek tawh na pia kei un.

en: Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
zo: Tua ahih manin na hoih sep ding cimtak kei ni. Lungkia loin i sep nakleh a hun ciangin thaman i ngah ding hi.

en: For He Himself is our peace, who has made the two one and has torn down the dividing wall of hostility
zo: Khrih mahmah in Gentail mite le Jew mite pawlkhatin hong bawl ahih manin eite tungah nopsakna a hong piapa ahi hi. Hih minam nihte khenin gal a piangsak dalna pen Khrih in ama pumpi tawh a satkham hi.

en: But our citizenship is in heaven, from which we also eagerly wait for a Savior, the Lord Jesus Christ.
zo: Ahi zongin eite ihih leh vantung gam mite ihi a, vantung panin a hong pai ding Topa Jesuh Khrih, eite’ Honpa, lawptakin a ngakte ihi hi.

en: He has rescued us from the dominion of darkness and brought us into the kingdom of the Son He loves,
zo: Amah in khuamial vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia-in, a lungmuanhuaina mun, a it a Tapa’ ukna sungah hong koih a,

en: But godliness with contentment is great gain.
zo: Pasian biakna hangin a neihsateng tawh a lungkim mite pen biakna in mihau a suaksak takpi mah ahi hi.

en: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses, entrust to reliable men who will also be qualified to teach others.
zo: Mi tampite’ theihin ka thuhilh, na zaksa thu khempeuh, midangte a hilhsawn thei dingin a citak mite tungah hoihtakin a zuih dingun na hilh in.

en: But avoid foolish controversies, genealogies, arguments, and quarrels about the law, because these are unprofitable and worthless.
zo: Ahi zongin a haihuai thu kiselna, min kigual deudau khangsimna, kitotna, thukham kitotlawhna cihte na pelh in. Tuate a kimanna a om lo, a mawkna thu hi lel hi.

en: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever.
zo: Jesuh Khrih pen zani, tuni, a tawntungin kibang ngitnget hi.

en: Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.
zo: Tua ahih manin na ci uh a dam nadingin khatlekhat tungah na mawhna uh kipulakin thu na kingetsak ta un. Mihoihte’ thungetna in vang nei a, na lianpi semzo hi.

en: Be sober-minded and alert. Your adversary the devil prowls around like a roaring lion, seeking someone to devour.
zo: Note pilvangin khua phawk un. Na gal uh ahi Dawimangpa, humpinelkai bangin a nektheih ding zongin vak kawikawi hi.

en: His divine power has given us everything we need for life and godliness through the knowledge of Him who called us by His own glory and excellence.
zo: Ama minthanna le a hoihnate a neikhawm dingin a hong sampa i theihna hangin Pasian’ deih bangin biakna mantak i nuntak theih nadingin ama vangliatna in eite’ kisap na khempeuh a hong pia hi.

en: Beloved, we are now children of God, and what we will be has not yet been revealed. We know that when He appears, we will be like Him, for we will see Him as He is.
zo: Ka lawm itte aw, eite’ pianzia ding taktak a telin hong kilat nai loh hangin tu-in Pasian’ tate ihi hi. Ahi zongin Khrih hong kilat ciangin ama pianzia ahi bang teekteekin mu ding ihih manin amah i bat nading thu teltakin i thei hi.

en: Now to Him who is able to keep you from stumbling and to present you unblemished before the presence of His glory with great joy,
zo: Ama minthanna mai-ah paubaanna om hetloin lungdam takin a hong paipih theih nadingin note na pukkhak nading panun a hong kem,

en: and from Jesus Christ, the faithful witness, the firstborn from the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth. To Him who loves us and has freed us from our sins by His blood,
zo: thuman takin teci a pang, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa upa, leitung kumpite tungah ukna aana a nei Jesuh Khrih kiang panin note tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tung tahen. Tua Jesuh Khrih in eite hong it a, ama sihna tawh i mawhna panin eite hong suaktasak a,

en: Each of the four living creatures had six wings and was covered with eyes all around and within. Day and night they never stop saying: “Holy, Holy, Holy, is the Lord God Almighty, who was and is and is to come!”
zo: Tua ganhing lite in kha guk ciat nei-in, tua a khate’ sunglam le a pualamah mittang a dimtakin om a, a sun a zan tawlnga loin la sa uh a, “A beisa, tuhun, le a tawntungin a om Vanglian Topa Pasian, siangtho hi, siangtho hi, siangtho hi,” a ci uh hi.

en: For the Lamb at the center of the throne will be their shepherd. He will lead them to springs of living water, and God will wipe away every tear from their eyes.”
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh Tokhom laizangah a om Tuuno, amaute a kem pa hi ding a, nuntakna tui omna-ah amaute paipih ding a, Pasian in a khitui khempeuh uh nulsak ding hi,” hong ci hi.

en: Then the seventh angel sounded his trumpet, and there were loud voices in heaven saying: “The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our Lord and of His Christ, and He will reign forever and ever.”
zo: Tua ciangin a sagihna vantungmi in a peengkul hong tum a, vantungah nakpitakin aw hong ging a, “Leitung uk nading aana neihna pen i Topa Khrih a’ hong suakkhin a, amah in a tawntungin uk paisuak ding hi,” hong ci hi.

en: and they sang the song of God’s servant Moses and of the Lamb: “Great and marvelous are Your works, Lord God Almighty! Just and true are Your ways, O King of the nations!
zo: Amaute in Pasian’ nasem Moses la le Tuuno la sa uh a, “A Vanglian Topa Pasian aw, na nasepnate lamdangin lian mahmah hi. Khang tawntung a Kumpipa aw, na nasepnate-ah thumanin na thutang hi.

en: And I heard a loud voice from the throne saying, “Behold, the dwelling of God is with man, and He will dwell with them. They will be His people, and God Himself will be with them and be their God.
zo: Tokhom panin nakpitakin awging khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian omna inn pen mite tawh omkhawm ta hi. Pasian in amaute ompih ding a, amaute pen ama mite hi ding uh hi. Pasian mahmah amaute tawh omkhawm ding a, amah pen amaute’ Pasian hi ding hi.

en: I have set My rainbow in the clouds, and it will be a sign of the covenant between Me and the earth.
zo: Meii sungah ka sakhituihup ka kaisak a, tua pen kei le leitung kikalah thuciamna lim hi ding hi.

en: When the Israelites saw it, they asked one another, “What is it?” For they did not know what it was. And Moses said to them, “It is the bread that the LORD has given you to eat.
zo: Israel mite in a muh uh ciangin amaute khatlekhat in, “Bang ahi hiam?” kici uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in tua pen bang hiam cih thei lo uh hi. Moses in amaute’ kiangah, “ Topa in nek dinga note’ tungah hong piak an ahi hi.

en: Fire came out from the presence of the LORD and consumed the burnt offering and the fat portions on the altar. And when all the people saw it, they shouted for joy and fell facedown.
zo: Topa’ mai panin mei hong piangkhia-in meihal biakna le biakna tau tunga om sathau a kang hi. Mi khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin awng uh a, lei maingatin a kunsuk uh hi.

en: Then the LORD opened the donkey’s mouth, and she said to Balaam, “What have I done to you that you have beaten me these three times?”
zo: Tua ciangin Topa inla pau theisak a, la in Balaam kiangah, “Thumvei dong nong sat nadingin nang bang hong cih ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

en: The eternal God is your dwelling place, and underneath are the everlasting arms. He drives out the enemy before you, crying, ‘Destroy!’
zo: Tawntung Pasian pen nangma omna hi a, nangmah huh dingin tawntung khutte a om hi. Amah in na mai-ah galte nawtkhia-in, ‘Susia un,’ ci hi.

en: When we heard this, our hearts melted and everyone’s courage failed because of you, for the LORD your God is God in heaven above and on earth below.
zo: Tua thu ka zak phetun ka lungsim uh bei a, note’ hangin mite’ lungsimah hanna bei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian uh, tunga om vantung le nuai-a om leitungah Pasian ahi hi.

en: behold, I will place a wool fleece on the threshing floor. If there is dew only on the fleece and all the ground is dry, then I will know that You will save Israel by my hand, as You have said.”
zo: en in, ancilna sual tungah tuumul lom khat ka koih hi. Tuumul tung bekah daitui omin leilak dang khempeuh a keu leh, na gensa bangin keima tha tawh Israel-te na honkhia ding hi, cih ka thei ding hi,” a ci hi.

en: He said to his men, “The LORD forbid that I should do such a thing to my master, the LORD’s anointed, or lift my hand against him; for he is the anointed of the LORD.”
zo: Amah in a mite kiangah, “Amah pen Topa’ sathau nilh pa hi, ci-in a thei gegupi-in ama tungah ka khut ka ngak ding, Topa’ sathau nilh pa ahi ka topa tungah hih bang ka hih ding Topa in hong kham hi,” a ci hi.

en: “How the mighty have fallen in battle! Jonathan lies slain on your high places.
zo: “A vanglianpa bangci-in tuk galphual sungah! Jonathan aw, na mual sangte tungah nang hong kithat hi.

en: The temple was built with stones finished at the quarry, so that no hammer, chisel, or any other iron tool was heard in the temple while it was being built.
zo: Biakinn a kilam ciangin a kitawhna mun panin a kibawlsa suangte tawh kilam hi. Tua ahih manin a kilam laitakin hei ahi a, sek ahi a, sik nazat khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a gingte biakinn huang sungah kiza lo hi.

en: Then Elisha prayed, “O LORD, please open his eyes that he may see.” And the LORD opened the eyes of the young man, and he saw that the hills were full of horses and chariots of fire all around Elisha.
zo: Tua ciangin Elisha in thu ngenin, “ Topa aw, kong thum hi; amah in a muh theih nadingin ama mitte honsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tangvalpa’ mitte honsak a, tua ciangin amah in mu hi. En in, Elisha’ kimkot mualtung khempeuh sakolte le mei leengte tawh kidim hi.

en: And you, my son Solomon, know the God of your father and serve Him with a whole heart and a willing mind, for the LORD searches every heart and understands every intent of the thoughts.
zo: “Tu-in nang, ka tapa Solomon aw, na pa’ Pasian thei inla, na lungsim khempeuh le utna lungsim tawh ama na sem in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in lungsim sung zong a, ngimna le ngaihsutna khempeuh thei hi. Nangmah in amah na zon le nangmah in amah na mu ding hi. Ahih hangin amah na nusiat leh amah in nang hong paaikhia paisuak ding hi.

en: Hear the supplications of Your servant and of Your people Israel when they pray toward this place. Hear from heaven, Your dwelling place, and when You hear, forgive.
zo: Amaute in hih mun lam nga-in thu hong nget uh ciangin na nasempa le na mi Israel-te’ hong thumnate nangmah in ngai in. Na tenna mun vantung panin hong za takpi inla, na zak ciangin hong maisak in.

en: and I prayed: “O my God, I am too ashamed and disgraced to lift up my face to You, my God, for our iniquities have risen higher than our heads, and our guilt has reached to the heavens.
zo: “Ka biak Pasian aw, ka mawhnate un ka lu dawn dong uh hong vuknelhin vantung dong banto ahih manin nangma lam kong et ding maizumin ka mai a san hi, ka Pasian aw.

en: My ears had heard of You, but now my eyes have seen You.
zo: Nidangin mi’ gensawn bekin nang ka hong thei a, tu-in keima mit mahmah tawh nang ka hong mu ta hi.

en: what is man that You are mindful of him, or the son of man that You care for him?
zo: na ngaihsut tham dingin mihing bang hi lel a, na phawk tham dingin mihing’ ta bang hi lel ahi hiam?

en: By the rivers of Babylon we sat and wept when we remembered Zion.
zo: Zion khuapi i ngaihsut khak ciangin Babylon luite gei-ah eite tusukin i kapkap hi.

en: Go to the ant, O sluggard; consider her ways and be wise.
zo: Thadahpa aw, miksite kiangah pai inla, amau’ nuntakzia va en in.

en: What has been will be again, what has been done will be done again; there is nothing new under the sun.
zo: A omsa mah bangin hong piang kik ding a, a kisemsa bangin hong kisem kik ding hi. Leitungah a thak na khat beek om lo hi.

en: The wolf will live with the lamb, and the leopard will lie down with the goat; the calf and the lion and the yearling together, and a little child will lead them.
zo: Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lumkhawm ding hi. Bawngno le humpinelkai le ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawlzo ding hi.

en: But if I say, “I will not mention Him or speak any more in His name,” His word is in my heart like a burning fire, shut up in my bones. I am weary of holding it in; indeed, I cannot.
zo: Keimah in, “Ama thu ka gen kei ding a, ama min ka lo kei ding hi,” ci mah leng zong, ama thu ka lungsim sungah mei bangin hong kuang a, ka guh ka tang sungah kikhumcip ahih manin ka ki-ipipna-in ka gimlua a, gen loin ka om thei kei hi.

en: Like the appearance of a rainbow in the clouds on a rainy day, so was the radiance around Him. This was the appearance of the likeness of the glory of the LORD.
zo: Tua a taang khuavak in meii lakah sakhituihup a kai ciangin a neih mel nam tuamtuam khempeuh a nei kim hi. Topa’ vangliatna lim pen tu-a ka gen bang ahi hi. Hih bang ka muh ciangin leilakah ka boksuk a, tua ciangin awging khat ka za hi.

en: Incline Your ear, O my God, and hear. Open Your eyes and see our desolation and the city that bears Your name. For we are not presenting our petitions before You because of our own righteousness, but because of Your great mercy.
zo: Pasian aw, kong thungetnate uh hong ngai inla hong za in. Hong en inla, kote’ siatna le na min a pua khuapi a siatna hong mu in. Kote’ gamtatna pha a suang hi loin nangma migitna suangin thu ka hong ngen uh hi.

en: “I will heal their apostasy; I will love them freely, for My anger has turned away from them.
zo: Tua ciangin Topa in, “Ka mite tungah heh nawn lo ka hih manin ka kiangah ka mite ka samkik ding a, lungsim takpi tawh amaute ka it ding hi.

en: “I will repay you for the years that the swarming locust has eaten—the young locust, the other locusts, and the locust swarm—My great army that I sent among you.
zo: Note a hong sim dingin ka hong sawl kauphe honpi, a tuan kauphe, a susia kauphe, a pettan kauphe, hih ka galkap honte in a hong neksak kum sungin a piang ding teng tang kong piakik ding hi.

en: And He told them many things in parables, saying, “A sower went out to sow.
zo: Amah in thugentehna a tuamtuam zangin thu tampi hilhin a genin-ah: “Khaici vawhpa khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi.

en: On hearing this, Jesus said to them, “It is not the healthy who need a doctor, but the sick. I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners.”
zo: Jesuh in hih thu a zak ciangin amaute kiangah, “Cidamte in siavuan kisam lo uh a, cina mite bek in kisam uh hi. Mite in a zahtak mihoihte a kisik nadingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi kei a, mite in a pampaih mite a kisik nadingun a sam dingin a hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

en: And Mary said: “My soul magnifies the Lord,
zo: Tua ciangin Mary in, “Ka lungsim in Topa phat a,

en: Then He declared, “Truly, truly, I tell you, you will see heaven open and the angels of God ascending and descending on the Son of Man.”
zo: Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Ke’n a mantak kong genin-ah, vantung a kihong na mu ding uh a, Mihing Tapa le vantung kikalah Pasian’ vantung mite a kumsuk a kahto na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

en: It seemed good to the Holy Spirit and to us not to burden you with anything beyond the following requirements:
zo: A kisam mahmah hih a nuai-a thute simloh, note tungah vangik dang suat ding pen Kha Siangtho le kote ka thukim kei uh hi.

en: For we maintain that a man is justified by faith apart from works of the Law.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khatpeuh Pasian tawh a kipawl theihna pen Thukham zuihzawhna hang hi loin upna hang hi, ci-in i genzo hi.

en: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
zo: Itna neite a lungduai-in migi hi. Itna neite in hazatna lungsim nei loin, zong kisathei lo hi.

en: And we, who with unveiled faces all reflect the glory of the Lord, are being transformed into His image with ever-increasing glory, which comes from the Lord, who is the Spirit.
zo: Tua ahih manin eite khempeuh i maitang hong kiliah nawn loin Topa’ minthanna vangtaang i kilangsak hi. Topa kiang panin a hong pai Kha Siangtho ahi tua minthanna vang in amah tawh a kibang dingin eite hong bawlpha a, minthanna khat panin minthanna sangzaw-ah hong omsak hi.

en: You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus,
zo: Khrih Jesuh tawh na kipawl manun note khempeuh Pasian’ tate na suahtheihna uh pen na upna hang uh ahi hi.

en: For He chose us in Him before the foundation of the world to be holy and blameless in His sight.
zo: Ama mai-ah eite pen paubaanna a nei lo, mi siangthote ahi ding le Khrih hangin ama mite ahi dingin leitung a pianma pek nangawnin Pasian in a hong teelsa ihi hi.

en: for it is God who works in you to will and to act on behalf of His good pleasure.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh note in utna lungsim na neih nading uh le ama deihna na zuihzawh nadingun note sungah Pasian in a tawntungin na a hong sem ahi hi.

en: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly as you teach and admonish one another with all wisdom, and as you sing psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs with gratitude in your hearts to God.
zo: Khrih thu a cingtakin note lungsimah hong om hen la, pilna tawh khatlekhat thu kihilhin na kitai un. Pasian tungah lungdam kohna-in Thuciam Lui sunga late, la thakte, le biakna late na sa un.

en: because our gospel came to you not only in word, but also in power, in the Holy Spirit, and with deep conviction.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiangah Lungdamna Thu ka hong hilh lai-un kam bek tawh a hong gen hi loin, Kha Siangtho’ vangliatna le Lungdamna Thu a man taktak hi, ci-in theihna tawh a hong pai ka hi uh hi. Note kiangah ka om laitakun note’ phattuam nadingin ka sep ka bawlna khempeuh uh na thei uh hi.

en: Now may our Lord Jesus Christ Himself and God our Father, who has loved us and given us eternal comfort and good hope by grace,
zo: I Topa Jesuh Khrih mahmah leh, eite hong itin, a hong hehpihna tawh thakhauhna le lametna a hong pia tawntung eite’ Pa Pasian in

en: First of all, then, I urge that petitions, prayers, intercessions, and thanksgivings be made for all people,
zo: A masa penin kong gennop thu in: Mi khempeuh a dingin Pasian tungah ngetna, thungetna, thumna le lungdamkohna na neih ding uh ahi hi.

en: Preach the word; be prepared in season and out of season; correct, rebuke, and encourage with great patience and careful instruction.
zo: hunhoih hunsia cih khen tuan loin Pasian’ thu hilh ding na kin ngaihsut nading, lungduaina tawh mite’ lungsim zo-in, mite taii-in, hanthawnin na hilh nadingin thu a hong pia ka hi hi.

en: He must hold firmly to the trustworthy message as it has been taught, so that he can encourage others by sound doctrine and refute those who oppose it.
zo: Upna bulpi tawh a kituak thute limtakin lenkip ding uh hi. Tua hileh thuhilhna man tawh midangte hanthawn thei ding uh a, thuman a nial mite’ khialhna zong laktel thei ding uh hi.

en: I always thank my God as I remember you in my prayers,
zo: Pasian’ mite khempeuh na itna thu le Topa Jesuh na upna thu na zakhin ka hih manin Pasian kiangah thu ka nget simin nangmah hong phawkin Pasian tungah lungdamna thu ka ko tawntung hi.

en: We have this hope as an anchor for the soul, firm and secure. It enters the inner sanctuary behind the curtain,
zo: I lungsim a hong kipsak dingin tu-a bang lametna a nei ihi hi. Tua i lametna kician mahmah a, vantung biakinn siangtho tawngnung sung ciang dong tung khinta hi.

en: Consider it pure joy, my brothers, whenever you face trials of many kinds,
zo: Sanggamte aw, thuhaksa a tuamtuam na thuak uh ciangin lungdam nadingin na ngaihsun zaw un.

en: Though you have not seen Him, you love Him; and though you do not see Him now, you believe in Him and rejoice with an inexpressible and glorious joy,
zo: Amah mu ngei lo napi-in na it uh a, amah mu ngei lo napi-in a thu umin kama genzawh loh zah dongin nakpitakin na lungdam uh hi.

en: But in keeping with His promise, we are looking forward to a new heaven and a new earth, where righteousness dwells.
zo: Eite in Pasian’ hong ciamsa, thuman bekbek a kizat nading mun van thak le lei thak a ngak ihi hi.

en: But if we walk in the light, as He is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus His Son cleanses us from all sin.
zo: Ahi zongin amah, khuavak ahih mah bangin eite in zong khuavak gamtatnate i gamtat takpi leh eite pawlkhat ihi a, ama Tapa Jesuh’ sisan in i mawhna khempeuh panin eite hong siangsak hi.

en: And they sang a new song: “Worthy are You to take the scroll and to open its seals, because You were slain, and by Your blood You purchased for God those from every tribe and tongue and people and nation.
zo: Amaute inla thak khat sa uh a, “Nang Tuuno, tua laizial a lakhia ding le a ciamtehnate a lakhia dingin na kilawm hi. Nang hong kigo khin ahih manin mi namkim le pau namkim a pau mite sung panin na sisan tawh Pasian a dingin mite na lei khin a,

en: I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.
zo: Kei pen a masa le a nunung, a kipatna le a tawpna a cihnopna ahi Alfa le Omega ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.

en: God blessed them and said to them, “Be fruitful and multiply, and fill the earth and subdue it. Rule over the fish of the sea and the birds of the air and over every living creature that moves on the ground.”
zo: Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate khempeuh tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.

en: “Remember the Sabbath day by keeping it holy.
zo: “Sabbath ni a siangtho-a zat ding phawk un.

en: For I am the LORD who brought you up out of the land of Egypt to be your God; therefore be holy, because I am holy.
zo: Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ Pasian ahi dingin Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpih pa pen keimah Topa ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin kei siangtho ka hih manin note na siangtho ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

en: Then Caleb silenced the people before Moses and said, “We should go up and take possession of the land, for we can certainly do it.”
zo: Ahih hangin Kaleb in Moses’ mai-ah mite gamdaisakin, “Thakhatin paito-in va luah ni; bang hang hiam cih leh eite pen a zo thei mahmah ding ihi hi,” a ci hi.

en: The secret things belong to the LORD our God, but the things revealed belong to us and to our children forever, that we may follow all the words of this law.
zo: “ Topa i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theih nadingin hong lakkhia a, eite le i suan i khakte’ zuih tawntung ding ahi hi.

en: And the people said to Joshua, “We will serve the LORD our God and obey His voice.”
zo: Mite in Joshua kiangah, “ Topa i Pasian’ na ka sem ding uh a, ama thu ka mang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

en: Then the LORD raised up judges, who saved them out of the hands of these raiders.
zo: Tua ciangin, amaute’ na a sutgawp mite’ vangliatna panin amaute a honkhia thukhente Topa in khangsak hi.

en: Where you die I will die, and there I will be buried. May the LORD do so to me and more also if anything but death separates you and me.”
zo: Na sihna-ah si-in ka kivui ding hi. Sihna cih lohbuang thudang hangin kong nusiat taak leh Topa in kei hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi.

en: But now your kingdom will not endure; the LORD has sought out a man after His own heart and appointed him ruler of His people, because you have not kept the command of the LORD.”
zo: Ahih hangin tu-in na ukna kizomsuak lo ding a, Topa in ama lungsim bangin mi khat zong khin hi. Topa in nang hong thupiak zui lo na hih manin ama mite tungah ulian dingin Topa in amah seh khin hi,” a ci hi.

en: And David, wearing a linen ephod, danced before the LORD with all his might,
zo: Tua ciangin a tha neih khempeuh tawh Topa’ mai-ah David lam hi. David in saihadial siampipuan khat silh hi.

en: The jar of flour was not spent and the jug of oil did not run dry, according to the word of the LORD spoken by Elijah.
zo: Elijah’ tungtawnin Topa’ thugen bangin beel sunga annel bei lo a, um sunga sathau zong kiam ngei lo hi.

en: Neither before nor after Josiah was there a king like him who turned to the LORD with all his heart and with all his soul and with all his strength, in accordance with all the Law of Moses.
zo: Ama hun ma-in, amah tawh a kibang, Moses thukham tawh kizui-in a lungsim khempeuh, a nuntakna khempeuh, le a thahatna khempeuh tawh Topa’ lamah a kihei kumpi om lo a, ama nungah zong amah tawh a kibang khat zong hong khang nawn lo hi.

en: Now set your heart and soul to seek the LORD your God. Get started and build the sanctuary of the LORD God, so that you may bring the ark of the covenant of the LORD and the holy vessels of God into the temple that will be built for the Name of the LORD.”
zo: Tu-in Topa na Pasian uh a zong dingin na ngaihsutna uh le na lungsim uh kipsak un. Topa’ min dingin a kilam biakinn sungah Topa’ Thuciamna Singkuang le Pasian’ umlebeel siangthote a kipaipih theih nadingin kithawi unla Topa Pasian’ biakinn lam un,” a ci hi.

en: For if you return to the LORD, your brothers and your children will be shown compassion by their captors and will return to this land. For the LORD your God is gracious and compassionate. He will not turn His face from you if you return to Him.”
zo: Bang hang hiam na cih uhleh Topa’ lamah note na kilehkik uhleh, na sanggamte uh le na tate un amau a mante’ tung panin hehpihna ngahin hih gamah hong ciahkik ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian uh dikna le hehpihna a nei hi a, ama lamah na kiheikik nak-uhleh note kiang panin a maitang heikhia lo ding hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.

en: Then the people of Israel—the priests, the Levites, and the rest of the exiles—celebrated the dedication of the house of God with joy.
zo: Tua ciangin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, le sal a suaksa a hong ciahkik mi khempeuh in lungdamna lianpi tawh Pasian’ biakinn apna a bawl uh hi.

en: So I sent messengers to them with this reply: “I am carrying on a great project and cannot come down. Why should the work stop while I leave it and come down to you?”
zo: Tua ahih ciangin kei zong amaute kiangah kamtaite ka sawl a, “Tu laitakin nasep thupi ka nei hi; kong pai thei kei ding hi. Kei hong pai leng, kong pai sung ka om loh kalteng nasep kitawlnga ding hi,” ka ci hi.

en: Then Queen Esther answered, “If I have found favor with you, O king, and if it pleases the king, grant me my life—this is my petition. And spare my people—this is my request.
zo: Tua ciangin Kumpinu Esther in dawngin, “Kumpipa in nong hehpihzawh a, kumpipa in hoih na sak leh, kong nget kong thumnop thu pen keimah le ka mipihte sihna tawh nong kipelhsakna ding ahi hi.

en: Though He slay me, yet will I hope in Him; I will surely defend my ways to His face.
zo: Pasian in kei hong that mah taleh zong, phamawh ka sa kei hi. Ahi zongin ama mai-ah ka thu ka gen veve ding hi.

en: You make known to me the path of life; in Your presence there is fullness of joy; at Your right hand are pleasures forevermore.
zo: Nangmah in nuntakna lampi keimah nong lak hi. Nangma omna munah lungdamna lianpi om a, nangma taklamah nop tawntungnate a om hi.
